name: Ryan Walker
subject: “Garbage” That’s what Joe Biden just called MILLIONS of Americans.
body: Here’s why it doesn’t surprise me that Biden slandered half of America Pleasesee a special message from our sponsor. If you would like to unsubscribe,visit thislink “Garbage.” That’s what Joe Biden just called MILLIONS ofAmericans. It’s disgusting that the President would slander half of thecountry he serves, but it doesn’t surprise me. The Biden-Harris administrationhas ignored the Americans hurt by their inflation and families who lost lovedones to fentanyl for years. My name is Ryan Walker, and I’m the Executive VicePresident of Heritage Action. We’re the conservative group fighting the Biden-Harris policies that leave millions of Americans behind. If, like me, you’redisgusted not only by what Kamala Harris and Joe Biden have said but also bywhat they have done in office, thenjoining Heritage Action’s team is the firststep in fighting back. Heritage Action is the country's #1 most effectiveconservative organization, with thousands of grassroots activists in stateslike yours fighting back against the radical Left’s dangerous policies. We’vefought and won against the Biden-Harris administration on everything from theborder to election integrity and government overreach. In 2022, Adam Frischnearly defeated Lauren Boebert. He lost by just 546 votes. That scared LaurenBoebert so much that she came running to my district. But the voters ofeastern Colorado don’t want a carpetbagging extremist more concerned withgetting on Fox News than the needs of her constituents. Even Republicans aredone with Boebert: 57% voted for someone else in the primary! We can finallykick Lauren Boebert out of Congress in November, but the only way I’ll be ableto win is if we hit every fundraising goal and have the resources to fullyfund my campaign. We’ve set a goal of raising another $250,000 before ourfinal end-of-month fundraising deadline, but right now, we’re still incrediblyshort. So I have to ask: Please, if you can afford to, will you make adonation to my campaign – every dollar you can spare – to help me defeatLauren Boebert?[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_calvarese?refcode=em20241031pm3-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=df8bfc39-e497-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_calvarese?refcode=em20241031pm3-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=df8bfc39-e497-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_calvarese?refcode=em20241031pm3-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=df8bfc39-e497-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_calvarese?refcode=em20241031pm3-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=df8bfc39-e497-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_calvarese?refcode=em20241031pm3-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=df8bfc39-e497-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_calvarese?refcode=em20241031pm3-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=df8bfc39-e497-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_calvarese?refcode=em20241031pm3-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=df8bfc39-e497-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Every dollar you give today will bring us one step closer to finally sendingLauren Boebert packing, and truly no amount you can afford is too small. sender: The Voter Action Project GOTV Team
name: Voter Action Project Team
subject: All in
body: At this point all the chips are all the table. 2024's elections are just ahandful of days away, and opponents of voting rights are all-in. Now thepress, the pundits, and the political strategists are all watching to see ifwe -- along with our pro-democracy partners -- can produce record-breakingpro-voter turnout nationwide and help defend ballot access, drop boxes, mail-in voting, and so much more. We have the grassroots team to get the job done,but we need your help to get over the finish line. Team, can you fuel our workwith $25 or more for our Voter Mobilization Fund and help turn out the voteacross the country on Tuesday? >> [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?refcode=103124_4&amount;=25] Voter Action Project Logo[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-weekly?refcode=103124_4&amount;=25]Seven more days, Team. It's time to get fired up and ready to turn out as manysupporters of voting rights as we can on November 5th![https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/EA/EA007/1/89215/images/LetsGo.gif]It's on us to protect mail-in ballots, voter accessibility, same-dayregistration, and more. To do that we've got to turn out early voters,Election Day voters, and new voters through same-day registration. We've allgo to stand up and fight for the rights and country we deserve. Can you stepup today and fuel our GOTV and voter registration work for this last week incritical states with $25 or whatever you can give to help protect votingrights? >> [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?refcode=103124_4&amount;=25] If you've saved your payment informationwith ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: GIVE $15 NOW➜ [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?express_lane=true&refcode;=103124_4&amount;=15] GIVE $25 NOW ➜[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?express_lane=true&refcode;=103124_4&amount;=25] GIVE $50 NOW ➜[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?express_lane=true&refcode;=103124_4&amount;=50] GIVE $100 NOW ➜[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?express_lane=true&refcode;=103124_4&amount;=100] GIVE $250 NOW ➜[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?express_lane=true&refcode;=103124_4&amount;=250] Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-gotv?refcode=103124_4&amount;=35] Wecan do this. We know we can, because we've done it before. We just need tostep it up these last few days! Onward for democracy, The Voter Action ProjectGOTV Team http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-weekly?refcode=103124_4&amount;=25 [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-weekly?refcode=103124_4&amount;=25] https://www.facebook.com/[https://www.facebook.com/] https://twitter.com/ [https://twitter.com/]https://instagram.com/ [https://instagram.com/] https://www.linkedin.com/[https://www.linkedin.com/] Integrity First Voter Action Project is dedicatedto expanding ballot access and increasing voter participation across thecountry. Since the Supreme Court gutted key provisions in the Voting RightsAct, extreme politicians have taken advantage to pass harsh laws that restrictaccess to the ballot box. These restrictions particularly affect disadvantagedcommunities and people of color. It’s our goal to bring awareness to theselaws wherever they may crop up and organize voters to take action to ensurethe right to vote is available to everyone in their states and communities.Your support is crucial to our efforts. Will you donate today to help usprotect voting rights? name: Elissa Slotkin
subject: Real urgency
body: Team — If your inbox is anything like mine, you are bombarded with emailstelling you that the sky is falling and all hope is lost. You will never getthat fake urgency from me. On the flip side, I also will never sugarcoatthings. There *are* real needs that we have right now if we’re going to win.Real needs, because we are seeing our margin in public polls start to tighten,and our opponent is trumpeting that his campaign’s internal polls show a tiedrace. Real needs, because if we lose here in Michigan, Republicans will almostcertainly take control of the U.S. Senate. Real needs, because voting hasalready begun here in Michigan and we are just 5 days out from Election Day.So I am concretely asking: will you split a donation of $5 between New Demsand my campaign for U.S. Senate in Michigan? At this point in the campaign,the vast majority of our contributions come from people like you in responseto emails like this one. name: CAPT Hung Cao
subject: I’ve waited my whole life to send you this
body: Friend, I’ve waited my whole life to send you this email. The Democrats inpower are TERRIFIED I’d reach out to you. They think they can shut us up &marginalize people like you & me. Hi, I’m Hung Cao. I’m a ret. Navy Captainwho served in Special Forces for 25 years. I was a refugee from Vietnam in1975 & my family, by the grace of God, came to America the right way—legally.My wife April & I have 5 beautiful kids that we homeschool. Look, my life’sstory is not what the liberal media & Democrat mob claims conservatives shouldbe. I represent EVERYTHING they hate the most. Biden and the Radical Dems havealready announced $45 MILLION to destroy our GOP candidates. They’ll mock us &smear our records with lies & insults. That’s why I’m humbly asking for just afew bucks before my October deadline tonight at midnight: CHIP IN A FEW $$TODAY → We’re out of time. I’m a veteran & not someone who normally asks forhelp, but everything rests on this. My candidacy is in your hands. If you’regoing to give $5 or $10 this election – make it count, make it THIS race. Igive you my word as a veteran & proud American, I will never, never let youdown. DONATE TODAY → In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao, USN (Ret) TEXT HUNG TO21412 I came to America with little besides the clothes on my back. But withfaith, dedication, and hard work, my family and I made it in America. I’mrunning for Senate to defend the American Dream that gave me everything.TheLeft is on a war path against the values that make us the greatest country onEarth. I didn’t put my life on the line defending those values in SpecialOperations in the Navy to let the Left destroy them. I know we can win thisbattle for our future, but I need your help.Can you chip in just $5 now tofuel our fight? We are fueled by grassroots patriots like you. Even just adollar or two makes all the difference.Thank you for standing with us! JOINTEAM CAO! Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, job titles,and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense. Email sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com by HungCao for Virginia Unsubscribe.

name: Mark Hamill
subject: yes,
body: The Force is strong with Trisha. | _Unsubscribe_ ![](https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP50/1/111662/images/Calvarese-Logo-Email-620x115.png.png)  ![](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/920/953/original/hamill.png) Hey Peter, it’s Mark Hamill. **In a moment, I’m going to ask you to make a donation to Trisha Calvarese, the official Democratic nominee running against Lauren Boebert in Colorado.** But before I do, let me explain why right-wing extremists like Boebert scare me. **Lauren Boebert isn’t just a national embarrassment – she has an actual vote in Congress.** Boebert is ready to pass a national abortion ban, gut Medicare and Social Security, and throw our veterans under the bus if she’s reelected again. _And don’t even get me started on Project 2025…_ The Force is strong with Trisha. That’s why I am so excited about Trisha’s campaign: **New polling shows that Trisha can win and defeat Lauren Boebert! But Trisha can only flip this seat blue if she is able to raise enough money and fully fund her campaign.** I’m ready to help Trisha Calvarese take on Lauren Boebert and finally kick her out of Congress, and I am asking you to join me today: **Please, will you make a donation right now to Trisha Calvarese’s campaign to help her defeat Lauren Boebert this November? Winning this seat and turning it blue not only means getting rid of Boebert, but it will also get us one step closer to taking back the House for Democrats.** _Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation through ActBlue:_ | | | **DONATE $10** ---  | **DONATE $25** ---  | | **DONATE $35** ---  | **DONATE $50** ---  | | **DONATE $100** ---  | **Other Amount** ---  This election is about integrity and decency. subject: Falling behind

name: rebecca cooke (personal)
subject: getting out the vote in WI-03:
body: I’ll keep it quick, Peter. With the election in Wisconsin’s Third Districtjust five days away, I wanted to reach out personally to thank all of ourcampaign’s incredible grassroots supporters. We wouldn’t be in the strongposition it is today without the unwavering support I’ve received from eachand every one of you. From the bottom of my heart, thank you, Peter. You’vebeen with me every step of the way, so I’m hoping you’ll chip in one moregrassroots contribution to help us meet our October goal before midnighttonight. This last push is crucial for our efforts to get out the vote onElection Day. As things stand, we still need to raise $2,480 to hit our goal.With just a few supporters chipping in, we can get there. Will you step up bychipping in before midnight to help us get out the vote and defeat extremistDerrick Van Orden? Here’s a link:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cooke-q4-2024 Van Orden has shown that heisn’t interested in improving the lives of people in his district. He’sembarrassed us time and again with childish outbursts and radical, anti-choicepositions. It’s time to unseat Van Orden, and with the people-powered movementwe’ve built, we can do it together. I know you’re ready to bring Wisconsin’sThird District the working-class, homegrown leadership we deserve. So pleaseconsider contributing whatever you’re able to put us in a strong position towin this election next week. Here’s the link again:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cooke-q4-2024 Thank you again for yoursteadfast support, Peter. name: OKGOP
subject: Day 3 of Early Voting is
body: Peter, Friday November 1st marks the 3rd day of early voting here in Oklahoma.So what are the three things you need to know? First of all, there just sohappen to be 3 judges of the Oklahoma Supreme Court on the ballot. And theyare ALL liberal. They are all THREE appointed by Democrat Governors. And wehave the chance to remove all three at once. If WE vote NO on all threeliberal Supreme Court judges, they will be removed and can no longer be ableto force their liberal agenda on Oklahoma. The question on your ballot will beif Edmonson, Gurich, & Kauger should be retained in their current positions.And the answer is NO, they should not be retained. All three must go, so wemust all VOTE NO! Secondly, you’ll be voting on several candidates beyond justthe President. We can all compare the economic boom with 4 years of PresidentTrump to the disastrous 4 years under Biden-Harris. If your mind isn’t alreadymade up on who to vote for as President think of how much better off you were4 years ago & realize we can have that again. There are other candidates onthe ballot, so the easiest way to vote is to choose “Republican” straightparty voting. That’ll make your selection for all those races & help put inRepublicans at the State & local level to help restore our economy & keep moremoney in your pockets. And third, you’ll also have two State Questions on yourballot. SQ833 creates new tax structures. Many people are torn on how to votefor this, but we’ll just put out there that we don’t believe the governmentneeds MORE ways to tax us. If you agree we don’t need more tax options, you’llvote no on this one. As for SQ834 it would clarify that ONLY citizens can votein Oklahoma elections. It’s obvious part of the Biden-Harris open border planis to get more people voting, including non-citizens. In fact a dozen citiesalready allow non-citizens to vote INCLUDING Washington DC! We must secure ourelections by allowing ONLY citizens to vote. Otherwise liberal court judges(refer to the first item listed above!) will allow law-breaking foreigners tovote in our elections. So there you have it, the three things you need toknow. 1) Vote no on all THREE Supreme Court judges. 2) Vote Republicanstraight party. 3) On the State Questions vote for lower taxes & ONLY citizensvoting. -Team OKGOP -=-=- Paid for by OKGOP and not authorized by anycandidate or candidate's committee. www.OKGOP.com - (405) 528-3501. 4031 N.Linconln Blvd., Oklahoma City, OK 73105 This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. To stop receiving emails:https://okgop.nationbuilder.com/unsubscribe -=-=- Created with NationBuilder -https://nationbuilder.com/

name: Angus King
subject: Long days and long nights
body: Team, I’d like to share a message (below) from Angus King, with whom I havethe honor of serving in the United States Senate. Angus is a critical partnerof mine in the U.S. Senate, and we can’t afford to lose his thoughtfulapproach to policy making. He’s running for reelection in Maine, and I’d liketo ask you to support his campaign by splitting a contribution between ourcampaigns. There’s just too much on the line — from reproductive rights toaccess to the ballot box — to risk losing Angus and letting Republicans takeback the Senate majority. Please chip in today if you can.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/blumenthal-email-2024-king?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk1383-bu-text – Sen.Blumenthal Team: As of today, there are only 5 days until Election Day. And asyou might know, I am up for reelection. With time running out and the futureof our democracy on the line I could really use your support.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/blumenthal-email-2024-king?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk1383-bu-text Can youdonate any amount right now to be split between my campaign and my friend Sen.Blumenthal so that we can keep delivering for the American people?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/blumenthal-email-2024-king?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk1383-bu-text Here in theSenate, there are often long days and late nights. It’s not always glamorous,but I wouldn’t change it for the world – it’s the job you hired me to do. Fromhelping address the cost of living to speaking on the Senate floor in defenseof women’s rights, this work is incredibly rewarding. I can’t wait to keepfighting for you and your communities in the Senate if you give me theopportunity. But friend, I need your support – large or small, it doesn’tmatter – if I’m going to win my re-election campaign in November. Can you makea donation large or small to be split between myself and Sen. Blumenthal rightnow? With the clock ticking, I promise every single dollar counts.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/blumenthal-email-2024-king?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk1383-bu-text Politics aremore divisive than ever. Partisan bickering and extremism have become the newnormal. But I truly think that we Americans agree on far more than we disagreeon, and we should find common-sense solutions that work for everyone. Everyday I go to work in the Senate, I aim to rise above that partisanship to fightfor the solutions that benefit all Americans. Are you with me? —Angus --------This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. subject: Derek Tran

They are the future of this country. One race I have beenwatching closely is here in California’s 45th district. Folks, Derek Tran hasa real chance to flip this seat and deliver the House for the Democrats, buthe is up against the fundraising arm of the Republican party. With just 5 daysleft, Derek needs the support of folks like you to flip this seat from red-to-blue and restore the Democratic Majority. His story would be improbable anywhereelse. Derek enlisted in the Army, serving the country that had given hisparents refuge from the communist regime in Vietnam. name: Nella Domenici
subject: At the border
body: Nella for Senate I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. Friend, I was just boots on the ground at the border in New Mexico, once again assessing the situation and reminding voters justhow bad Kamala Harris and Martin Heinrich have allowed it to become. Of course, “bad” is the understatement of the century. Words and phrases like “horrifying,” “deadly,” and “worst in history” get closer to appropriate descriptions of what has happened under their watch. And it’s not like they just allowed it to happen – they curated this disaster! There’s NO WAY we can allow Harris or Heinrich to continue failing us in Washington, D.C., and I need your help to defeat them and their radical agenda here in New Mexico. I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. We’re so close to the finish line, and I need your help to get across. Please rush $10 or more to help us keep fighting every minute all the way until the end, when we’ve flipped this seat, secured the Senate, and ensured we have the ability to get our country back on track. Thank you, Nella Domenici Help Elect Nella and Secure the Border » ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. name: Hung Cao
subject: Re: my last email
body: Fellow Patriot, We are just DAYS AWAY from the final end-of-month deadline ofthe election. This is the last email I’ll send you on the matter. We’re stillshort of where we need to be, and we can’t miss our goal. This is the mostIMPORTANT Senate race in the country, so I don’t want you to sit on thesidelines. This race is going to be close, and your contribution could be theone that pushes us over the edge to victory. But if we don’t have theresources we need to fight back against the establishment, we could lose thisrace and hand over six more years to career politician Tim Kaine. Ourgrassroots team is one of the strongest in the country, and I know that if weall do our part, we CAN flip Virginia RED!! But I need your help, and I needit ASAP. name: eric sorensen (personal)
subject: help us get out the vote:
body: | Here we go, Peter. Election Day is just five days away, and I wanted totake the opportunity to thank each and every one of our dedicated grassrootssupporters. Without folks like you, we wouldn’t be in a strong position todefend IL-17 and defeat my radical opponent Joe McGraw. I truly appreciateyour steadfast support. But we can’t take anything for granted. This race willbe razor-close, and it could determine control of the House for the next twoyears. These last few days are vital for our efforts to get out the vote onTuesday. Right now, we’re $2,721 short of our October goal, but with a fewmore supporters chipping in, we can get there by midnight. Please considercontributing today. Here's a good link:**https://secure.actblue.com/donate/es-q4-2024** For candidates like me whodon’t rely on big special interests, grassroots support is essential. Andthanks to folks like you, my campaign has been able to compete with millionsof dollars from our opponent’s super PAC allies. But here’s the blunt truth:If IL-17 flips red, chances are that Congress will flip red, too. ARepublican-led House would be devastating for reproductive freedom, the middleclass, and, frankly, the future of American democracy. Help us make a strongfinal push and continue the momentum you’ve helped us build. Let’s keep IL-17blue. Here’s the link once more:**https://secure.actblue.com/donate/es-q4-2024** Thank you — and HappyHalloween! Now let’s go win this election. -Eric --- | --- | Paid For By Eric Sorensen for Illinois ---   P.O. Box 1172 Moline, IL 61265 United States   | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. Whenever Trump gets near a microphone, it’s almost a given that he’s going to attack me. He even threatened to use the military against me for holding him accountable. His goal is simple, Derek: sabotage my campaign and silence anyone standing in his way. It’s clear Trump and his allies still see me as a threat — and the closer we get to Election Day, the worse and more frequent the attacks will become. name: Dave McCormick
subject: More lies from the Left
body: Please read this full message Fellow Patriot, At West Point, we had a code:cadets don't lie, cheat, steal, or tolerate those who do. First the New YorkTimes lied about my childhood and family, and now CNN is lying about mybusiness record. And what’s worse, they are doing it all because I’m withinstriking distance of an entrenched career politician, Bob Casey, in the #1swing state in the nation that will determine control of the U.S Senate. BobCasey is getting Leftist news sources to do his dirty work, and I WON’TTOLERATE IT. Here's the truth: this is a long message and I hope you will readall the way to the end. I grew up in Bloomsburg, Pennsylvania. We lived oncampus at Bloomsburg State College and my parents owned a farm ten minutesdown the road. I had summer jobs baling hay and trimming Christmas trees atnearby farms. My dad started his career teaching history, economics, &democracy at Punxsutawney High. My mom began teaching fourth through sixthgraders at a public school near Pittsburgh. I’m incredibly proud that my dadwas chosen to be president of Bloomsburg State College (now BloomsburgUniversity) at only 34 years old. I’m so proud of my parents’ teachingcareers and to have been raised in Bloomsburg. It was there that I wrestledand played football and was nominated to the U.S. Military Academy at WestPoint. And it was there that I came home to a parade after serving in combatduring the Gulf War. After the Army, I earned a Ph.D. in internationalrelations before moving to Pittsburgh to start a career in business. I workedmy way up to become the CEO of FreeMarkets, a successful tech startup thatemployed hundreds in Western Pennsylvania. I was then called to serviceagain, this time in the highest levels of government as Under Secretary ofTreasury and as Deputy National Security Advisor. Following this, I joinedBridgewater Associates, one of the largest, most successful investment firmsin the world, which manages the pension plans of groups including teachers,firefighters and law enforcement. I have lived the American Dream, and I amrunning for Senate to bring my decades of experience and love for our countryto fix our broken economy that is a direct result of policies supported by myopponent, who has spent 18 years in Washington with NOTHING to show for it. Iknew getting into this race could mean things would get nasty, but it’s sad tosee we’ve fallen so far that these media outlets like the New York Times andCNN are pushing the Democrats’ baked narrative about my upbringing and mybusiness record. I’ve opened myself and my family up to attacks from theleft, and every day feels like a battle. But I’m no stranger to fighting forwhat is right andif we don’t elect leaders to go to DC to clean up the messthe career politicians made, we will lose America as we know it! Here’s whereI need your help, Fellow Patriot. We need to combat these lies with the TRUTHabout me. The Democrats are seeing the same polls you and I see. They know ifKamala Harris and Bob Casey lose Pennsylvania, they lose it ALL, and they aregoing to do WHATEVER IT TAKES to try and defeat me. I hate asking for money —I’m not a career politician, and it’s not in my nature — but I have no choicebut to ask if we’re going to hit our fundraising goal for the final stretch ofthe campaign.Will you chip in $30 or more right now to fight back against thelies from the Left? Chuck Schumer and his allies are working overtime toobliterate my campaign. They have committed to spend whatever it takes todefeat me.They know if I win this race in Pennsylvania, it’ll be IMPOSSIBLEfor Democrats to keep their majority in the Senate. If we don’t show theDemocrats we can win this race, it’s game over. That’s why I’m hoping you canspare$29, $50, or even $100 to help me fight back against the lies. DONATEYour donation will take us one step closer to victory, and I am so gratefulfor your support. Thank you, Dave McCormick P.S. Democrats from all over thecountry are pouring money into this race to defeat me because they know thisrace could flip the Senate red.Will you chip in $29 or more to make sure Ihave the resources to WIN? DONATE Paid for by Friends of Dave McCormick. Ourmailing address is: PO BOX 23537 PITTSBURGH, PA 15222 Privacy PolicyUnsubscribe

name: Nella Domenici
subject: Fired up!
body: Nella for Senate We’re on the cusp of flipping New Mexico red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I’m fired up, Peter! The energy at President Trump’s rally in Albuquerque today was palpable. We’re on the cusp of flipping this state red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I need you to keep fighting every single day, every single moment, until the polls close on Tuesday. Our campaign is working 24/7 to reach remaining undecided voters and get out the vote. We need to keep resources flowing into this campaign to ensure our funding for these operations doesn’t run dry. Your $5 or $10 contribution, in addition to your vote, is needed to help us secure more votes. Please chip in anything you can, and let’s win this thing! Let's Flip New Mexico RED! Thank you, Nella Domenici ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. Iasked twice. I’m asking you one FINAL TIME before the clock strikes midnighttonight and we potentially miss our last fundraising goal before Election Day:Will you please stand with our movement and help us hit this critical $25,000goal by chipping in $ tonight? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-oct24?amount=] DONATE NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-oct24?amount=] I’m not going to lie — I’m stressed. I know you’ve got a lot ofemails asking for your support, but in this make-or-break moment, I hopeyou’ll join me by throwing $ or whatever you can spare to help us hit our$25,000 goal before midnight tonight. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-oct24?amount=] If you’re on board, I’ve got a link for you here:secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-oct24[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-oct24?amount=] Thank you. — Raulhttps://www.facebook.com/DrRaulRuiz/ [https://www.facebook.com/DrRaulRuiz/]https://www.instagram.com/doctorraulruiz[https://www.instagram.com/doctorraulruiz] https://twitter.com/Dr_RaulRuiz[https://twitter.com/Dr_RaulRuiz] https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer] The son ofhardworking farmworkers, Dr. Ruiz grew up in Coachella, CA and learned at anearly age that the key to attaining the American Dream is hard work and agreat education. In the summer of 1990, Raul walked in the desert heat frombusiness to business in the Coachella Valley asking them to invest in theircommunity by contributing to his education. With each investment for college,he made a promise to come back home and serve his community as a physician. In2012, he decided to take his service to the community to the next level byrunning for Congress. subject: 5 days
body: Kamala Harrishttps://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/jr4harris?refcode2=khp_em_20241031_b1_kdh_jr_fl&refcode;=jtk4860-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 $5. That’s the donation I am asking you to splitbetween my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s campaign. I’ll explain more, but if thatis all you need to hear, you can make a donation at this link below:https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/jr4harris?refcode2=khp_em_20241031_b1_kdh_jr_fl&refcode;=jtk4860-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 In 5 days, Nevada will decide who they want astheir next U.S. senator and their next president. Ultimately, this election isabout two different visions for our nation. One focused on the future. And onefocused on the past. Jacky Rosen and I believe in a future where every personhas the opportunity not just to get by, but to get ahead. Where no child hasto grow up in poverty. Where every worker has the freedom to join a union.Where every person has affordable health care, child care, and paid leave.Where every senior can retire with dignity. But Donald Trump and his extremistRepublican allies want to take our country backward. They intend to cut SocialSecurity and Medicare, to give tax breaks to billionaires and big corporationsand to make working families foot the bill, and end the Affordable Care Act.America has tried these failed policies before. We are not going back.Generations of Americans before us led the fight for freedom. Now, the batonis in our hands. To protect the right to vote. To get assault weapons off ofour streets. To restore reproductive freedom, reversing Donald Trump's extremeabortion bans. Jacky Rosen is running for reelection to continue deliveringfor Nevadans. In the Senate, she has never hesitated to take on powerfulspecial interests to bring down costs for hardworking Nevada families. If youare ready to join us in the fight for freedom and opportunity for all, pleasesplit a donation of $5 to our campaigns. Because when we fight, we win.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/jr4harris?refcode2=khp_em_20241031_b1_kdh_jr_fl&refcode;=jtk4860-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you and take care, Kamala Harris VicePresident of the United States -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Ted Cruz
subject: I’m standing alone
body: We’re in real trouble- here’s why We’re in real trouble- here’s why Peter,Here is the situation. Senator Chuck Schumer (D-NY) the powerful MajorityLeader for the Senate Democrats has directed his forces to inject millions andmillions of dollars into Texas to defeat me and flip Texas brightblue. Schumerhas said they will spend over one-hundred million dollars to defeat me. Otherradical leftwing groups and National Democrat Party committees are jumpinginto the fray as well-just flooding us with attack ads, flyers, and boots onthe ground… But here’s the worst part: The National Party is not coming tosave us. I am standing alone against this massive progressive onslaught. Weare getting almost NO HELP from Mitch McConnell. And the major RepublicanSenate Super PAC has no operations or ads running in Texas… That’s why I’mcalling on all grassroots conservatives from Maine to Marfa for help… RUSHHELP HERE >> The Washington DC Party Establishment doesn’t want a grassrootsconservative like me in the Senate- they never have, and their lack of helpduring the fight of my life is proof! I need YOUR help. Not because ourfundraising hasn’t been successful- we’re doing well, and thousands of Texansand patriots from all over are stepping in to give generously. Many are givingfor the very first time, while others have given every month this year. Butwith no air cover. I'm forced to ask for urgent help. We can’t lose Texas- andright now we’re in real trouble. STAND WITH TEXAS & SAVE AMERICA RIGHT NOW >>Thank you for standing with me. Ted Cruz DONATE >> Paid for by Ted Cruz forSenate 815 A Brazos, PMB 550, Austin, TX 78701 Unsubscribe

name: Katie Porter
subject: What $5 actually buys for a campaign
body: [ https://act.katieporter.com/go/10?t=1001&akid;=39247%2E3422442%2EDKYwzx]Truth to Power PAC Derek, You might ask yourself if chipping in $5 actuallymakes a difference to a political campaign. Before I ran for office, I askedmyself that same question. The answer is absolutely, yes! Here’s exactly what$5 can buy a campaign to reach voters: * 250 digital ad impressions * 8 piecesof mail * 10 doors canvassed (you can increase this number by volunteering!)In many close races, voter turnout will determine the final outcome. Campaignsare in high-gear trying to get as many supporters as they can to the polls.Voter contact efforts, made possible by your $5 donation, remind people what’sat stake and how important it is for them to make their voices heard. TheHouse majority could be determined by just a few competitive races here inCalifornia, which is why I’m doing everything I can to help folks like DaveMin, Will Rollins, and Derek Tran win—from financial resources to supportingtheir Get Out The Vote events. name: Mark Takano
subject: one last opportunity
body: With just hours left before our final end-of-month fundraising deadline ofthis campaign, and victory on the horizon, I’m asking you one last time foryour support: Can I count on you to be one of just 60 Democrats to chip in $7to our campaign? Every dollar down the final stretch makes a difference in ourability to reach the 700,000 residents of my district, Peter! »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=7] The MAGAmovement we’re up against wants to fully implement their dangerous agenda andsteamroll all of our Democratic progress by: ❌ Banning abortion nationwide andmaking the government decide if women receive healthcare or not… ❌ Prosecute,imprison, and execute Donald Trump’s political opponents… ❌ Enforce the TheAlien Enemies Act of 1798, the very same law that forced my Japanese-Americangrandparents into internment camps during World War II. Peter, it’s easy tolet our nerves get the better of us with just 5 days left in this election.I’ve looked at the polling data and the fundamentals and we’re in the driver'sseat. But we can’t stop fighting. We’re on track to win, but your supporttoday will make that win a near-guarantee! name: Ron Wyden
subject: Some important updates on Arizona’s Senate race:
body: Ruben Gallego is running for Arizona's open Senate seat — against MAGAextremist and election denier Kari Lake. Here are a few numbers that reallystand out: 2.4%. That's the amount Arizona Senator Mark Kelly won his Senateseat by in 2020. 0.3%. That's Joe Biden's margin of victory over Donald Trumpin Arizona in 2020. 0.67%. That's the amount Kari Lake lost by in 2022 in theArizona gubernatorial race. $150 million. That's how much money is being spenton political TV ads during this campaign cycle in Arizona. The bottom line?Arizona is a state where elections are won by the narrowest of margins, andwith millions being spent against Ruben, this race will likely be nodifferent. We have under a week until Election Day, and votes are being castright now . The last thing we can afford is for right-wing messaging to drownout Ruben's voice and boost an extremist like Kari Lake. Can you split adonation of $3 or more? This is when grassroots support matters the most, andthe last thing we want by next week is to realize that we didn't do all wecould to defend democracy in Arizona.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-gallego-split?refcode=2024-10-31-rg&recurring;=&amount;=3&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200&refcode2;=b1655484-ea97-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Donate Now If you've stored your info with ActBlue Express, we'll split yourcontribution between Ruben Gallego and Ron Wyden instantly: $5[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-gallego-split?express_lane=true&amount;=5&refcode;=2024-10-31-rg&refcode2;=b1655484-ea97-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200]$15 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-gallego-split?express_lane=true&amount;=15&refcode;=2024-10-31-rg&refcode2;=b1655484-ea97-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200]$25 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-gallego-split?express_lane=true&amount;=25&refcode;=2024-10-31-rg&refcode2;=b1655484-ea97-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200]$50 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-gallego-split?express_lane=true&amount;=50&refcode;=2024-10-31-rg&refcode2;=b1655484-ea97-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200]OTHER AMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-gallego-split?refcode=2024-10-31-rg&refcode2;=b1655484-ea97-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200]Onward, Ron Paid for and authorized by Wyden for Senate. name: Team Yassamin
subject: Two of the most important races in the nation
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/yassaminansari_em?refcode=wrpr_hdr [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/yassaminansari_em?refcode=wrpr_hdr] Peter, It's not just the race for the White House that hinges on Arizona. Two of the most important congressional races in the nation are happening right here in our state. Next door to our district in AZ-01, Dr. Amish Shah has the chance to finally beat David Schweikert and flip a critical battleground seat blue. Schweikert is a MAGA die-hard who helped write the Trump tax cuts, which gave billionaires and big corporations a $1.9 trillion tax break. He's also an anti-choice fanatic who once said that women who have abortions "hate our country." And in AZ-06, Kirsten Engel is running to flip a seat that went red by just 5,232 votes in 2022. Peter, winning these frontline races may be the difference between retaking the House and falling short. We need your help to elect Democrats up and down the ballot here in AZ. Can we count on you to split a contribution between our three races before midnight tonight, when we close the books on our final monthly fundraising deadline of this race? name: Alison, Emily Randall for Congress
subject: It’s not easy for candidates with working-class backgrounds to win elections
body: http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=] Hey Peter,it’s Alison, asking you bluntly: Can you make a donation of $25 or any amountto support Emily Randall for Congress before our midnight deadline?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=] Yes, I’mreaching out to you on behalf of my wife, my partner of 18 years, the person Iknow and trust to serve our district. I’m also reaching out as a union member,asking you to support the endorsed candidate of hundreds of thousands ofworking people across the state — myself included! And, I’m reaching out assomeone who wants a Congress full of people who know what it’s like to paytheir own bills, struggle with student loans, care for loved ones, andnavigate health insurance. Let’s be real: It’s not easy for candidates withworking-class backgrounds to win elections. That’s why more than half ofCongressmembers are millionaires! The only way people like Emily win is byorganizing thousands of people like you and me to make grassroots donations of$25, $50 or whatever amount makes sense for them. name: Fair Fight
subject: Free and fair elections can’t wait
body: https://fairfight.com/ [https://fairfight.com/] We’re still looking for 47 donors from your state to help us close the gap in our October fundraising goal before midnight — will you be one of them? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em] If you've saved payment info with ActBlue Express, your donation will process automatically: Chip in $5 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em?amount=5&express;_lane=true] Chip in $25 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em?amount=25&express;_lane=true] Chip in $50 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em?amount=50&express;_lane=true] Chip in $100 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em?amount=100&express;_lane=true] Chip in $250 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em?amount=250&express;_lane=true] Chip in Other [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em?amount=&express;_lane=true] With the clock ticking on our deadline, and Election Day getting closer, we’re keeping a close eye on polling so we can react in real-time to deploy outreach resources where they're needed most. Together we’ve put up a massive effort to ensure every voter has the equal opportunity to make their voice heard and be fairly represented in this election. This work is only possible because of activists like you. This is our final push to support free and fair elections and elect pro-democracy champions up and down the ballot. Chip in now. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em] Thank you for powering this work. Fair Fight Friends, Election Day is just five days away. That’s not spooky, but it is scary to think of all of the voters still facing issues accessing the polls. Tomorrow, November 1, is the last day of early voting in Georgia — but thousands of voter registrations remain in limbo due to a backlog. These voters registered before the October 7 deadline, but aren’t sure if they can cast their ballot. Fair Fight is working right up until November 5 to make voters aware of this issue and ensure they know their rights. These last few days are critical, and we need your help: We need 100 donors to chip in today and help us reach our October fundraising goal, because a strong finish means more resources to mobilize voters and get them to the polls in these final days. Can we count on your support? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em] DONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em] Polling remains locked in a near-statistical tie, which means your donation could change the tide of the race, and the future of our democracy. This grassroots team of activists and voters is committed to moving the needle for voting rights across the country, and we know that starts with electing candidates up and down the ballot who will protect our rights. We have the opportunity to show the nation that Georgia voters are more than just a statistic or headline, and prove that attempts to suppress our votes won’t keep us silent. This is our last fundraising deadline before the election, and we need 100 donors to help us reach our goal so we can keep fighting right up until Election Day. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em] We couldn’t be more grateful to have you on this team! Thank you, Fair Fight DONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ff-oct24-em] https://www.facebook.com/FairFightAction/ [https://www.facebook.com/FairFightAction/] https://twitter.com/fairfightaction/ [https://twitter.com/fairfightaction/] https://www.instagram.com/fairfightaction/ [https://www.instagram.com/fairfightaction/] 1270 Caroline Street | Suite D120-430 | Atlanta, GA 30307 ©2024 Fair Fight - All rights reserved. Emails like this one are the best way to communicate updates with voting rights activists like you. Thank you for being in the fight to ensure access to democracy for all. name: Ritchie
subject: We can’t slow down now, Peter
body: Peter, before our final end-of-month deadline before Election Day passes in 4hours, I’m counting on you to pitch in $3 to our $20,000 goal.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3] Here’s why:$20,000 OCTOBER GOAL: DONATE $3 TO RE-ELECT RITCHIE »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3] I don't comefrom a wealthy family with political connections and donors on speed dial. Idon’t do a second of call-time. That way, I’m only beholden to people likeyou, Peter. I spend my time working on the issues that matter to myconstituents, like making housing safe and affordable, expanding access toquality healthcare, and ensuring everyone – no matter who they are or wherethey came from – can make their voice heard. But that means we have to workeven harder to fuel this people-powered movement. We don’t have the luxury tolose a single seat in the House, so I need your help, Peter. Can you rush $3right now to help me reach our $20,000 October goal, save this seat, and takeback the House in 5 days? »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3] If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will gothrough immediately: CONTRIBUTE $3 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3&express;_lane=true]CONTRIBUTE $7 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=7&express;_lane=true]Or a custom donation »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=10&amounts;=3,7,10]Thank you, Ritchie ---------------------------------------- Paid for by TorresFor Congress PO Box 580303, Bronx, NY 10458 www.torres.nyc Ritchie Torresrepresents the future of the Democratic Party. Raised by a single mother inpublic housing, Ritchie personally understands the hardships that workingfamilies endure. At age 25, Ritchie made history as the youngest electedofficial to serve on the New York City Council. He fought tirelessly for theworking families of The Bronx, and now, he's fighting for those families andfor progressive values in Congress. He is the first openly gay Afro Latinoever elected to Congress. Ritchie is a champion for progressive policies tofight poverty and to improve the lives of families just like the one he wasraised in. name: Laura (personal)
subject: Last one of the entire campaign
body: Hi there, We are finally here. After a year of campaigning – knocking doors,making phone calls, and building a movement for progress in CA-30 – this isour very last end-of-month email of the entire election cycle. There aren’twords to describe how grateful I am for your help. Our campaign was always forthe people, by the people. We took a risk and relied on grassroots supporterslike you to fund our efforts. No matter what happens next week, know that yoursupport made a difference in elevating and empowering the voices of ourcommunity, and I am very grateful. With Election Day just 5 days away, this isour last chance to make sure we do everything we can; not just to win, but toget as many people as possible out to vote. My team just told me we are only$5,200 short of our final goal. This gap is a little larger than we expected,but I know this team always steps up when it matters most. That’s why I’mreaching out to you personally, friend. Can you chip in $3 or whatever you’reable to give right now to make these final days count? Every donation, nomatter the size, will help us close the gap. Here’s your personal link todonate:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lf-q4-2024?refcode=dpwillis67@gmail.comAnything you can give will help keep our momentum going strong in the finalstretch. If you can, please pitch in before midnight. Here's that link again:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lf-q4-2024?refcode=dpwillis67@gmail.comLet’s show them what we’re made of. Laura_____________________________________ Paid for by Laura Friedman for CongressLaura's campaign doesn't take a dime from corporate PACs and completely relieson grassroots supporters like you! name: Colin Allred
subject: I have a big favor to ask:
body: Peter, I have a big favor to ask: If just 5% of folks reading this emailchipped in $10, we would hit our $3 million goal in no time. Can I count onyou to step up with a split donation of $10 between my campaign and DefeatBoebert PAC today to ensure my team and I have the resources we need to pushback against the $40 million worth of attack ads Ted Cruz and his allies arerunning against us right now? RUSH MY DONATION Last time around, Ted Cruzwon his race by just over 2% of the vote – that was a difference of about215,000 votes, Peter. I remember how it felt watching the results roll in onNovember 6, 2018, and let me tell you, it was a nail-biter. I have no doubtsthat this year will be when we finally send Ted Cruz packing. But despitebeing closer than ever to defeating Ted, we've still got a lot more work to doand only a handful of days left to do it. I know seeing a number like $3million can feel overwhelming, but if thousands of hardworking folks like youchip in $5 here, $25 there, and the occasional $100, we will be able tocollectively reach this critical goal. So please, will you chip in a splitdonation between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC of $10 or whatever you canafford now so I can hit my final end-of-month goal and flip Texas blue? name: Jessica Mackler, EMILYs List
subject: The margin of effort
body: Happy Halloween, Peter! I hope you're having a fun and cozy night. I don'twant to interrupt the festivities, so I'll make this quick. With Election Dayaround the corner, right now is the most critical time to surge support forEMILYs List women up and down the ballot. Let me explain: Over the past month,I've been on the ground in Michigan, Arizona, Nevada, and a few other keystates. I've talked to voters, candidates, and volunteers all across thecountry. And I can tell you firsthand that the polls and the pundits areright: our women's races will be close. There's a saying in politics, belovedby fundraisers and field organizers alike: the margin of effort. When thepolls are tight, and a race could go either way, what matters most is theheart, grit, and commitment of the supporters. If we put in the work, we'llwin. If we don't, we won't. It's that simple. Critical races like VP KamalaHarris', Sen. Tammy Baldwin's (WI-SEN), and Rep. Susan Wild's (PA-07) now fallsquarely within the margin of effort. And your support can help make sure wereach as many voters as possible before Nov. 5. Let's give it all we've got,Peter. Please donate toward our $300,000 End-of-October fundraising goal now:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/el-q42024-em Thanks for being part of thisteam, Jessica Mackler (she/her/hers) President, EMILYs List ---- PAID FOR BYEMILYS LIST WWW.EMILYSLIST.ORG AND NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE ORCANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE. name: Sen. Raphael Warnock
subject: one of the most powerful allies you can have
body: Look, if there's one thing that you should know about my friend Kirsten Gillibrand, it's that she never — never — backs down from a fight. But this year, Kirsten is facing an incredibly tough fight at the ballot box. Democrats are defending a massive 23 seats, meaning our grassroots resources are spread incredibly thin. And in 2022, New York saw the biggest red wave across the country. Now, those same extremists are working overtime to defeat Kirsten and retake control of the Senate. There's no way Kirsten backs down from this fight. But I also know exactly what it's going to take to win this election and defend our razor-thin Senate majority: Strong grassroots investments from people like you. That's why I'm personally asking — can you make a donation before midnight tonight to help my friend Kirsten defend her must-win seat and protect our Senate majority? Trust me, this is the only way that Kirsten will win. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_fr_defend-senate-2024?refcode=jtk5593-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 In everything that she does — every fight that she takes on, every piece of legislation that she supports, and every constituent that she advocates for — Kirsten is absolutely relentless. That's what makes her such an incredible advocate for Americans around the country (and one of the most powerful allies that you can have here in the Senate). Now, more than ever, New Yorkers, Democrats, and all Americans need Kirsten's bold voice in Congress. Because today, our most fundamental rights are under unprecedented attack from extremist Republicans. We're in a national emergency for our democracy and all of the values we hold dear. Kirsten and I are fighting every day to safeguard these rights. We're working to pass voting rights legislation that will ensure every single American has equal, unrestricted access to the ballot box. And we're rallying support to certify the Equal Rights Amendment, which would give us a legal basis to restore reproductive rights nationwide. But to continue these fights, and save our Senate majority, Kirsten needs your help: The only way to defeat the GOP's megadonors is with strong grassroots support from folks like you. So please, friend, if you have anything to spare today, will you rush a donation now to help Kirsten protect her seat so that we can continue to fight for your family in the Senate? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_fr_defend-senate-2024?refcode=jtk5593-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for all that you do, Sen. Raphael Warnock -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Carville, James
subject: Every single Democrat NEEDS to pay attention to Sherrod's Senate race RIGHT NOW
body: Friend, I'm about to ask you to chip in every dollar you can to help SherrodBrown win in Ohio and defend our Democratic Senate majority – but first, letme explain why this is so damn important for ALL of us. But hell, if you wantto click here and chip in right away, I'm not gonna stop you.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?amounts=250,100,50,25,5&refcode;=jtk3725-fr-text I'll get right into it:Democrats have a razor-thin Senate majority, and we're facing a NIGHTMARESenate map. There's a strong chance it will all come down to Ohio, which meansSherrod is the ONLY thing standing between us and a Republican Senate. Friend,I've worked on campaigns for a long time. I've been on the winning side andthe losing side. If there's one thing I know, it's that money makes a BIGdifference. I wish it weren't the case, but it is. TV ads, phone banks, yardsigns, campaign events in every corner of the state – it all adds up FAST.That's why I'm so terrified right now. If this were a simple battle betweengood and evil, I wouldn't be worried – Sherrod is as good a leader as Ohioanshave ever had. He fights harder for workers than anybody I know, and he's notafraid to take on the big banks and corporations that are making things harderfor the middle class. But money muddies the waters, and his opponent has got aton of it. He's poured A TON into his own campaign, and there's a lot morewhere that came from. Sherrod simply doesn't have that kind of money – sothat's where this grassroots team needs to come in and have his back, friend.I know Sherrod can win this critical race and keep the Senate blue, but ONLYIF we all come together to give him the resources he needs. So I'm asking:Will you rush $5, $25, or even $50 to help him win in Ohio and defend ourSenate majority? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?amounts=250,100,50,25,5&refcode;=jtk3725-fr-text Thanks for doingyour part – there's simply no other option if we want to save the Senate! –James Carville -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. subject: Tonight’s goal
body: Peter, My least favorite thing about election season is asking for money, butit’s necessary to protect the progress we’ve made and the rights we enjoy. Asthe chair of BOLD PAC, I’m working with Democrats across the country to ensurewe elect progressives up and down the ballot. Your support has beeninstrumental in keeping our momentum heading strong into Election Day, but wecan’t slow down now. Trump and national Republicans are pouring resources intoraces across the country to ensure they take not only the White House butCongress and Senate too. We’re only 5 days away from Election Day, meaning themost crucial time to reach voters is NOW. So, I have to ask: Will you help mehit my October goal in a few hours so I can continue reaching voters acrossthe country in this final stretch? name: Sen. Jon Ossoff
subject: Friend, can I have a minute?
body: Friend — this is Jon Ossoff. Can I have a minute to tell you about Floridaright now? Debbie Mucarsel-Powell is in the fight of her life to retire RickScott. Now that she's catching up to him in the polls, people are starting tonotice that with Debbie as the Democratic nominee, Florida is winnable. As asitting senator from Georgia, I'll always put working families and smallbusinesses first, friend. And like me, Debbie knows that we need to do more tosupport hardworking Americans in the South and across the country. With hercommitment to reducing high costs and inflation, protecting Social Securityand Medicare, and restoring reproductive freedom, we need Debbie's voice inthe Senate representing Floridians. But I know the GOP machine is about to goall in on Florida. We need to build on the growing Democratic excitement andhelp Debbie reach her $10 million goal before her last end-of-month deadlinebefore the election. That way, she can pull ahead in the polls and win big inNovember. Friend, will you chip in $5 or more right now to help Debbie win anddefend our Democratic Senate majority?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2477-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for offering your support to Debbie'scampaign today. Jon Ossoff U.S. Senator from Georgia -------- This email wassent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. subject: Join Wesley and Ted Cruz on Monday, November 4th!
body: We need you there! committee: Democratic Association of Secretaries of State
name: Team DASS
subject: re: Project 2025
body: [https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP30/1/89914/images/dass-logo-transparent.png] Friend, By now you may have heard about the GOP’s plan,Project 2025, to dramatically reshape the federal government. But today, wewant you to hear directly from the president of the group leading Project2025… “The country is in the process of the second American Revolution, whichwill remain bloodless if the left allows it to be.” - Kevin Roberts, HeritageFoundation President This is a real quote from a leading voice in the GOP.It’s horrifying. And it’s why electing democracy defenders up and down theballot has never been more important. We’re working to elect DemocraticSecretaries of State across the nation who will ensure the integrity of ourelections, protect voting rights, and uphold the principles of democracy.Because the alternative is far too dangerous. name: Hung Cao
subject: Re: my last email
body: Fellow Patriot, We are just DAYS AWAY from the final end-of-month deadline ofthe election. This is the last email I’ll send you on the matter. We’re stillshort of where we need to be, and we can’t miss our goal. This is the mostIMPORTANT Senate race in the country, so I don’t want you to sit on thesidelines. Can you pitch in a few dollars or whatever you can right now? RUSHA CONTRIBUTION The consequences of falling short could be DEVASTATING for ourmovement. This race is going to be close, and your contribution could be theone that pushes us over the edge to victory. But if we don’t have theresources we need to fight back against the establishment, we could lose thisrace and hand over six more years to career politician Tim Kaine. Ourgrassroots team is one of the strongest in the country, and I know that if weall do our part, we CAN flip Virginia RED!! But I need your help, and I needit ASAP. Can you pitch in $5, $25, $100, or whatever you can before MIDNIGHTTONIGHT so we can meet our CRITICAL end-of-month goal? SAVE OUR COUNTRYEverything we’ve worked so hard for comes down to this. I hope I can count onyour support. In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao USN (Ret) Paid for by Hung Cao forVirginia Use of military rank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does notimply endorsement by the Department of the Navy or the Department of Defense.Unsubscribe.

name: Martin Heinrich
subject: Trump’s rally in New Mexico
body: https://martinheinrich.com/ [https://martinheinrich.com/] Donald Trump ralliedthousands of his supporters in New Mexico today in a last-ditch effort to flipNew Mexico and boost my multimillionaire opponent. Trump spread lies about ourstate, falsely claimed that he’s won here twice, and called for the thousandsof rally-goers to vote for my challenger, Nella Domenici. He even gave herstage time to tear down our campaign: "Let's make sure we fire MartinHeinrich. And let's make sure we reject Kamala Harris. And it's time to bringback Donald Trump!" — Nella Domenici After the media attention Nella and Trumpgot from today’s rally, it’s never been more urgent to bring in resources tokeep up our TV ads and get our message out to voters. name: Eric Hovde
subject: I hated sending this email at this hour
body: Eric Hovde for Senate But we’re in serious trouble of coming up short at theworse possible moment Fellow Conservative, I’m sorry I had to email you solate, so I’ll keep it short. Our campaign to take back Wisconsin and endSchumer’s Majority is facing it's final end-of-month fundraising deadline,andwe're $540 short of hitting our FINAL fundraising target at midnight. If justa few more patriots step up before midnight tonight, our campaign will be backon track.Can I count on you to pitch in $3 or $5 before 11:59pm tonight? ForAmerica, Eric Hovde Republican for U.S. Senate DONATE NOW MEET ERIC Eric's afourth-generation Wisconsinite, born and raised in the Madison area. He's aserial entrepreneur. He founded and managed his first business in his twentiesand then went on to start and build many others. When he is not running hisbusinesses, he is focused on his family and his philanthropic endeavors. Heand his brother Steve operate 10 Hovde Homes around the world that provideshelter, supportive services and love to vulnerable children. Join CONTRIBUTEMONTHLY Join the Conversation: Unsubscribe Paid for by Hovde for Wisconsin

name: Val Hoyle
subject: This is it
body: https://www.valhoyle.com/ [https://www.valhoyle.com/] Hi Peter, I wanted toreach out one last time before my campaign’s final end-of-month fundraisingdeadline of the election. Everything we’ve worked for during this electioncycle comes down to these last five days. I’m counting on grassrootssupporters like you to pitch in and help us close this race out strong.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024] As a member ofCongress, I’ve been laser-focused on delivering results that make a realdifference in people's lives — fighting to protect Social Security andMedicare, restore and defend our freedoms, invest in Oregon’s infrastructure,and lower costs for working families. But National Republicans are dead-set ondefeating me to grow their razor-thin House majority. They’ve invested a tonof resources into Oregon to replace me with my anti-abortion opponent, whowould be nothing more than a rubber stamp for their extreme Project 2025agenda. While they’re resorting to negative attack ads to mislead voters, myteam is connecting with voters on the ground about the stakes and the clearchoice they face in this election. With just five days left, we need yoursupport to continue this work. The best way to ensure we can defend my seatand flip the House blue is by reaching and mobilizing every voter possibleacross the district. So please, Peter: Will you help us do this important workby pitching in $10 or more to my campaign today?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?amount=10] If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will gothrough immediately: CHIP IN $10 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=10] CHIP IN $30 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=30] CHIP IN $50 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=50] CHIP IN $100 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=100] CHIP IN $200 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=200] ANOTHER AMOUNT[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024] In a race this close,every dollar makes a huge difference. name: C. Allred
subject: the best position to win.
body: Defeating Ted Cruz is going to come down to some simple math, friend: – Let meremind you: In 2018, Ted Cruz won by just 214,921 votes. – In the six yearssince, 2.6 million Texans have registered to vote. Now, Cruz and I aredeadlocked in the polls, so here it is: If we can reach more newly registeredvoters than he can in these last few days, we'll be in the best position towin. That's where you come in, friend: Will you split $5 or more between mycampaign and Jacky Rosen’s to help reach my $1,000,000 end-of-month goal sothat we can take advantage of our best chance EVER at firing Ted Cruz?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_allred?refcode=jtk5257-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Whether he's abandoning us and flying to Cancúnduring a deadly winter freeze or celebrating Roe v. Wade being overturned, TedCruz has shown time and time again he will never put Texans first. It's timeto finally hold him accountable and we're SO CLOSE to doing that – but Cruzand his allies are spending over $40 million in a last-ditch effort to stop us– all while Texans are beginning to cast their ballots! I need your help tofight back. If you're ready to kick Ted Cruz out of the Senate, please give $5or whatever you can, split between my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s, beforemidnight tonight. We can flip Texas blue and help Democrats hold the Senate –but only if we all work together.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_allred?refcode=jtk5257-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you so much. Honored to be in this fightwith you, Colin -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: SB
subject: this is the shortest email in your inbox

name: Jacky Rosen
subject: Are you awake?
body: Are you there? I’m sorry to send another email, but my worst nightmare isbecoming a reality. Donald Trump just held another nasty rally in Nevada thisafternoon, and I have nowhere else to turn.Can you split $25 between mycampaign and Defeat Boebert PAC to help me combat the GOP’s attacks and getacross the finish line? Trump did not hold back. He directly attacked me onstage, saying I’m a “horrible person” and a “radical left lunatic.” And hegave my MAGA opponent a platform to lie about my record in front of thousandsof voters. Listen - I won’t let childish name-calling get under my skin. I’mthe most vulnerable woman in the Senate during a year where abortion rightsare on the line, so I know what it’s like to face an onslaught of GOP insults.But the truth is Trump and my opponent are ramping up their attacks against mein these final days and the GOP’s TOP super PAC just poured $6.2 million moreinto my race with one goal:to defeat me. If we can’t beat them to the punchand reach thousands of undecided voters as soon as possible, we risk losingthe Democratic Senate majority and the White House. So please, can you make a$25 donation split between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC before it’s toolate? I need *your* help to defeat Donald Trump and defend our DemocraticSenate and White House. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlueExpress, your donation will go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN $500 RUSH ANOTHER AMOUNT Thank you,Jacky Rosen DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . subject: Happy Halloween! From the Spokespups
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8110%2E5257348%2EyRDeUR ]Adam Schiff for Senate Derek! Happy Halloween! We are two honorary Spokespups 👻🐶 for Schiff. Part of the doggy community working to send Adam to the Senate. And today, we’re dressed as two very scary people — Donald Trump’s handpicked Postmaster General Louis DeJoy 📫 and a potential Senator Steve Garvey ⚾️. While Adam goes for walks and talks to voters about his plans to make a difference for hard-working families, Postmaster Louis DeJoy’s meddling is threatening to disrupt the USPS’ mail ballot deliveries from within as a result of his disastrous policies. We know it’s a doggy stereotype to bark at mail carriers, but we might have to bark at him. And Adam’s opponent, Steve Garvey, might have been good at playing baseball (hey, we’d play fetch with him), but he doesn’t have what it takes to deliver for Californians. name: Nella Domenici
subject: Boots on the ground at the border
body: Nella for Senate I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. Peter, I was just boots on the ground at the border in New Mexico, once again assessing the situation and reminding voters justhow bad Kamala Harris and Martin Heinrich have allowed it to become. Of course, “bad” is the understatement of the century. Words and phrases like “horrifying,” “deadly,” and “worst in history” get closer to appropriate descriptions of what has happened under their watch. And it’s not like they just allowed it to happen – they curated this disaster! There’s NO WAY we can allow Harris or Heinrich to continue failing us in Washington, D.C., and I need your help to defeat them and their radical agenda here in New Mexico. I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. We’re so close to the finish line, and I need your help to get across. Please rush $10 or more to help us keep fighting every minute all the way until the end, when we’ve flipped this seat, secured the Senate, and ensured we have the ability to get our country back on track. Thank you, Nella Domenici Help Elect Nella and Secure the Border » ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .
