name: Debbie [INTERNAL]
subject: Hope this reaches you
body: Friend, With just 5 days to go until Election Day, and early voting wellunderway, I wanted to give you an inside look at where we stand in our race toretire Rick Scott. While I usually wouldn't go into this much detail, I alsowouldn't have made it this far without you, so it's only right that you shouldhave full disclosure. But you also need to know that, in less than two hours,I am up against my last $10 million end-of-month goal before Election Day. Ican't afford to fall short of my biggest goal yet — can I count on you to rush$5 now and keep me on track to reach my midnight goal and flip Florida blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Date: Oct. 31, 2024 Subject: [INTERNAL MEMO] TheCase for Florida's Senate Race At this stage of the 2024 election, DebbieMucarsel-Powell's race in Florida is now the Democrats' BEST SENATE PICKUPOPPORTUNITY nationwide: * Florida Politics just reported on brand new pollingdata showing that Debbie is up 18 points with independent voters. * Despitepreviously self-funding his races at historic levels, Rick Scott has never wonan election in Florida by more than 1%. * Debbie's run a highly efficient adcampaign fueled by small-dollar donations, allowing her to reach 76% of votersacross Florida's four top media markets. * Recent polls by a GOP-allied firmshows Scott's popularity underwater by 11 points, and the race in a DEAD HEATat Scott 50 - Mucarsel-Powell 48. * Another advantage is the popular ballotinitiative for restoring abortion rights, which is expected to help driveturnout similar to that of the 2020 election. * With a personal story thateasily counters Scott's "socialism" attacks, and regular appearances onSpanish-language media, Debbie can rally Latino voters — nearly 1 in every 4voters in Florida — unlike any other Senate candidate this cycle. The onlything left that Debbie needs to win is a sizable grassroots cash infusion overthe last 5 days — especially before her last $10 million end-of-month deadlinetonight. With it, she can help retain the Senate for Democrats, and bring newleadership to the Sunshine State.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 ### So friend, now that you know where we standin the race, there's just one thing left for me to ask you: Will you pleasechip in $5, $25, or any amount you can spare now to help me reach my $10million end-of-month goal on time, retire Rick Scott, and flip Florida'sSenate seat blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for all you do. Let's win this, Debbie-------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jon Tester
subject: no ifs, ands, or buts.
body: Hi. Sorry to bother you, Peter. I know you’ve been receiving a lot of emailslately but if you give me just a moment, I’ll explain why. Tim Sheehy and hisbackers have virtually unlimited resources to attack me. My opponents arespending nearly $90 million in ads. Sheehy has even poured $2.4 million of hisown fortune into his campaign trying to buy Montana’s Senate seat. To makematters worse, we’ve fallen way behind on our fundraising targets—which meanswe’ve got a lot of work to do if we want to catch back up. If we want to beatthem, we have to hit our goal tonight. No ifs, ands, or buts. There is nobetter way to make an impact on the outcome of this race than chipping in agrassroots donation today. I hate asking, but I need to: Will you make a splitcontribution between my campaign and UNITEDemocrats to help us catch up on ourgoal before time runs out? name: Jon Tester
subject: Anyone’s to win
body: Hello, sometimes you just need to make your coffee a double. And thanks to a generous group of donors, your contribution will be doubled too. Donors are matching gifts until our final end-of-month deadline tonight. This rare opportunity won’t last, so please don’t miss your chance to increase your impact. Click here to make a split donation of any amount—and have it matched—to help us win 2024’s most important race. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 We’re not the only ones doubling down their efforts to win this race. Mitch McConnell’s allies are spending nearly $90 million to help my out-of-stater opponent win. They’re flooding the airwaves and trying to drown out our message. Experts rank Montana’s Senate race a toss-up—which means this race could go either way. And with recent polls locked in a tie, it’s anyone’s to win. Look, the sky won’t fall if you don’t chip in, and I’ll never trick you into donating. That’s not how I do things. But I will tell you the truth: We need to raise another $2,000,000 by midnight tonight and we’re falling behind. We need to work twice as hard to catch up and compete. Will you make a matched donation today and have it split? I’m counting on you to step up. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 I appreciate your support. When we win this thing, it’ll be because of people like you. –Jon -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. body: I wanted to make sure you saw my earlier message. | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) Peter, I wanted to make sure you saw my message earlier. Tonight isour final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be putstraight to use turning out the voters we need to win. Peter, tonight marks the final end-of-month deadline of this election. The polls are tightening, the attack ads are intensifying, and Donald Trump and his allies are outspending us in key battleground states. **To get back on track, we set a goal to receive 236 more donations from Cresco in the next couple of hours.** So, I am turning to you, Peter. You and are among my most dedicated supporters, and you understand the stakes of this election. **Will you make your first contribution right away? Tonight is our final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be put straight to use turning out the voters we need to win.** _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ | | $47 >> --- | $75 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---  I know it might seem like giving $5 or $50 with so little time left won't makea difference, but it will make a profound difference if enough of this teamgives what they can.Thank you for reading, and thank you for your generous support.KamalaKamala Harris Vice President of the United States![KamalaHarris](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/946/902/original/kamala_hopeful.jpg)           * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being asupporter. But Peter, we don't want to bother you. If you’d like tounsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: Short and to the point message
body: Peter — I'm aiming to make this one of the shortest emails in your inboxbecause I know you're getting a lot of requests and your time is valuable. Solet me get straight to the point: I'm up against my final end-of-monthfundraising deadline before Election Day. It comes as polls show me tied withRick Scott, as Floridians begin voting, and as I'm up against $38 million inads to defeat me — courtesy of Scott's fraudulently-earned personal fortune.We've launched an audacious but necessary goal: Raise $10 million before theclock strikes midnight on Oct. 31 so we can fight Rick Scott's attacks, reachevery single voter, and win this seat to protect Democratic Senate control.Every dollar of this $10 million goal will be made up of contributions frompeople like you, which is why I'm counting on you in this moment: Will youplease donate $5, or whatever you can, to help me defeat Rick Scott? RUSH ADONATION — Debbie Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,

name: Kamala Harris
subject: I just stepped off the stage in Nevada
body: It is going to take all of us to win this November and create the future your community deserves. | | | |  ---  Friends, I just stepped off the stage in Nevada.We have the momentum, and we still have work to do to earn every vote in thiscritical battleground state so that we can elect Democrats down the ballot.Donald Trump, JD Vance, and their allies are going to throw everything at usfor the next few days – **and we cannot counter their attacks without yoursupport. So I have to ask:****_Will you directly power our efforts to win Nevada and the White House?Split a $20 donation between the Nevada Democratic Party and my campaigntoday:_**If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: --- | $20 | $35 | $50 ---|---|--- $75 | $100 | Other  The work ahead will be hard. But hard work is good work. And it is joyful workwhen we do it together.Thanks and take care,KamalaKamala Harris![KamalaHarris](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/115/002/original/Kamala_Harris_Headshot.jpg) ---    Nevada is a critical battleground state for Democrats to keep the Senate andWhite House in 2024. subject: I'm supporting a President who's the most pro-life President.
body: Harrison Butker said it best.͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | | | ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/UPRIGHT.png) --- | ---  ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/3Sequence%2001.00_00_00_07.Still001-02.jpeg) ---  _“I’m supporting a President who’s the most pro-life President—and I thinkthat’s Donald Trump.”_  Harrison Butker said it best.  We need a Presidentwho will stand **STRONG** and **FIGHT** for the unborn, _someone who willstand up for the most vulnerable in our society._  The other side has made itclear—** _they want to push their agenda of abortion on demand, and they willdo whatever it takes to silence the pro-life movement. _** But we won’t letthem. --- ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/HawleyButkerStLouis-20241010AH-9304559.jpg) --- **STAND WITH HARRISON BUTKER, DEFEND LIFE** ---  President Trump has been the strongest defender of the unborn we’ve ever seenin the White House.  **He’s not afraid to stand up for life, and that’sexactly what our country needs right now.**  We should be fighting for themost vulnerable, fighting for the unborn.  If you are going to donate to anyorganization this cycle, it should be ours, we are mobilizing Christians tovote for **LIFE** in 2024. **That’s the future we’re fighting for.**  We areworking to mobilize voters of faith, but we need your help to keep up thefight. Do you agree with Harrison Butker?  Will you stand with us andsupport the most pro-life President we’ve ever had? --- **STAND WITH HARRISON BUTKER, DEFEND LIFE** --- | --- | | **PAID FOR BY UPRIGHT PAC** --- | | 138 Conant St, Ste. 401Beverly, MA 01915 --- ---   The Republican Team --- _PO Box 2221 Fort Collins, CO 80522_ _**unsubscribe**_ | _manage data preferences_ ![](https://email.alerts.therepublicanteam.com/o/eJyUzkFuwyAQQNHThJ2tGTyGZMER0m2XaIBxggQJAtxev2pv0PWXvt7n3d85l_x6fHAVN_v0ffhj-LM1jss4W3v3ubQuw2vQtCAugH5TyZHVaTNKHNoNaDeEqJ7uMBzCYVjkBski6RCum3DcrdZJQ1TZ_X4QAeFKN4QVYwi7IEROBzDBhYCL9DnW-ZQu7QwlR35N4brGd1XdpfadS8nD2AvBo3Iuf2H-g__l9E8AAAD__zPLUD4)

name: Navy SEAL Ryan Zinke
subject: maybe I bit off more than I could chew
body: But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Maybe I bit off more than I could chew. Maybethat’s just the way it is. Maybe the Democrat Machine is just too strong withtheir army of highfalutin mega-donors. But I like to think Conservatives willcome through in the end. My name is Ryan Zinke. Look, I served as PresidentTrump’s Secretary of the Interior and as commander at SEAL Team 6 – it takes alot to shake me. But the Democrat Machine has unloaded 322,000,000 dollars tobury House Conservatives and another 70,000,000 bucks to make Montana aDemocrat state. If we stay the course in terms of fundraising, not only willfolks in tight races (like me) lose, but Republicans may never controlCongress again. That’s why I’m going to be completely straightforward withyou, Friend: I’m personally asking you for one last contribution to savevulnerable Republicans before the Democrat Machine wipes us all out. This isso important that I’m partnering with Majority Leader Steve Scalise to helpraise one million dollars before Election Day. Think you could lend a hand?HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> A few million bucks won’t scare me off. I know that,Majority Leader Scalise knows that, and the Democrats are about to find outthe hard way when Conservatives everywhere come forward in droves. Our fundsare running DANGEROUSLY LOW so I’m really hoping that includes you. I’veserved this nation in Trump’s Cabinet and in uniform, now I’m humbly askingyou to join our fight to save the country. The election is next week. Pleasedonate now while there’s still to bring the Democrat Machine to its knees.HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> For God and Country, Ryan Zinke It's House MajorityLeader Steve Scalise. I’m respectfully asking you to fill out my ELECTION YEARCHECK-IN at your earliest convenience. It’s important. I want to have yourgoals, your concerns, and your priorities in mind before I do anything else.What would you like me to keep in mind when I'm taking on the RadicalDemocrats? START HERE >> Paid for by TEAM SCALISE, a joint fundraisingcommittee authorized by and to benefit SCALISE FOR CONGRESS and EYE OF THETIGER PAC. Team Scalise is committed to defending our Conservative Housemajority and electing Conservatives across the country. Thank you for being apart of our movement. Contributions to TEAM SCALISE, or any participatingcommittee, are not deductible as charitable contributions for federal incometax purposes. Contributions from corporations, national banks, labor unions,foreign nationals without “green cards,” and federal government contractorsare prohibited. Federal law requires us to use our best efforts to collect andreport the name, mailing address, occupation, and employer of each individualwho contributes over $200 in a calendar year. Privacy Policy ReclaimingAmerican Freedom PO Box 461 Fort Collins, CO 80522 unsubscribe

name: Chairman Richard Hudson
subject: Taking a break to say THANK YOU
body: I'm working to defend our House Majority, but I needed to take a minute justfor you͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | --- | | | | ![](http://e.1600daily.com/rd/9z2zjhf66433rbspl3jf1aoagflmmfdbdvubk3kh2mg_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5im8or2c9h2bs) ---  Dear Friend,  As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment toreflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of thiselection cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow theHouse Majority.  As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had theprivilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeingyour impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notchteam, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine.  But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - **it's aboutthe countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, andthe contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero ofour party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight.**  Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if youcan spare a few dollars.  **We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and everydollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contributionto help defend our razor-thin House Majority.**  Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts,advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help usdefend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats, and elect a new generationof conservative leaders._  If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but ifnot, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already.  Thank you and God Bless America,  **Richard Hudson ** _Chairman_ , National Republican Congressional Committee  --- | ![](https://www.myimgcloud.com/0d8b0490-e4fc-4393-8de6-5e67d4a702d9.png) --- | --- | Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. name: Debbie [key race alert]
subject: this poll shows that this race is FAR from over >>>
body: Friend, I almost spilled my coffee when I got the news — did you see thispoll? A recent, A+ poll shows that we’re statistically tied with Rick Scott.He’s spent millions on TV ads attacking me, and he still can’t pull ahead.I’ve said it all along: Florida is in play. We can win this race. I know it,Floridians know it, and Rick Scott knows it too. That’s why he and his superPAC are spending millions of dollars every week attacking me and trying to buyhis Senate seat again. He spent $10.5 million on new ads, and he just infusedhis campaign with another $3 MILLION from his own corrupt fortune. This raceis so close — and with this grassroots movement, we can retire creepy Rick forgood. But I need you with me. My LAST fundraising deadline of the Election isjust days away, friend. Will you chip in $5 right now to help me close the gapon my FINAL $4 MILLION goal?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2461-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Every single dollar helps us put up more ads,knock more doors, call more voters, and make sure every Floridian knows thatthey have a choice this November — and that we can finally replace corruptRick Scott with a senator who will put Floridians first. I am so proud of themovement we have built, and with your help, we are going to win on ElectionDay.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2461-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you, Debbie P.S. committee: RudyGiuliani Freedom Fund Legal Defense Trust
name: Rudy Giuliani
subject: Now, my primary residence could be “seized”
body: BREAKING: A federal judge is now considering… ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Dear Friend, On October 22, a federal judge decreed that I had 7days to hand over my home in New York – as well as my only car and sentimentalkeepsakes and heartfelt gifts that I collected over the span of 80 years. Ithought that would be the end of the damage… But with the election rightaround the corner, Kamala’s Deep State truly wants to ruin me with all they’vegot. They’re now considering dealing one final blow to me. A judge may noworder me to give up my remaining home in Florida – my primary residence. As mylawyer inquired: do they truly want me homeless? Over the last few days, we’veheard ridiculous claims about President Trump being a “fascist.” Let me tellyou what fascism is… Fascism is weaponizing the legal system to punish yourpolitical opponents. Fascism is having your home taken from you. Fascism istaking the law license away from your opponent’s lawyer. Fascism is trying toturn your enemies into political prisoners. I am living through theDemocrats’ fascism right now. I sincerely pray that freedom, justice, and thetruth prevail on Tuesday, November 5 – or the damage done to me will spreadlike wildfire to the rest of our great Republic. But, as I wrote to you in anearlier letter, the Bible reminds us that our earthly possessions will alwaysfade, but greater “heavenly treasures” await us. The pursuit of truth,freedom, and justice are worth infinitely more than a car or a home.Possessions come and go, but I couldNEVER SURRENDER my fight for freedom andfor what I know to betrue. I would be tone deaf if I didn’t acknowledge thattimes are tough right now for all Americans, not just me, so please stopreading here if you cannot give at this time. But funding my Legal DefenseTrust is my last remaining hope of fighting for my freedom and for the libertyand justice of all Americans. So, if you can, and, seriously, only if you can,please make a contribution to my Legal Defense Trust – the Rudy GiulianiFreedom Fund – as I keep fighting for my freedom and justice as Kamala’s DeepState tries to JAIL me for life. CONTRIBUTE $25 CONTRIBUTE $50 CONTRIBUTE$100 CONTRIBUTE $250 CONTRIBUTE $500 CONTRIBUTE OTHER AMOUNT Thank you andGod bless you, Rudy Giuliani Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund Paid for by RudyGiuliani Freedom Fund Legal Defense Trust Conservative Liberty Wire PO Box1188 Fort Collins, CO 80522 unsubscribe |manage data preferences

body: BREAKING: A federal judge is now considering…͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  BREAKING: A federal judge is now considering…|![](https://e.americandefensenews.com/rd/9z2zfckvf120k8ahrdtggjbk755b0uero8ggg3ll7mg_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5imaoj6c5h2bs) --- Dear Friend, --- On October 22, a federal judge decreed that I had 7 days to hand over my homein New York – as well as my only car and sentimental keepsakes and heartfeltgifts that I collected over the span of 80 years. --- _I thought that would be the end of the damage…_ --- But with the election right around the corner, Kamala’s Deep State _truly_wants to ruin me with all they’ve got. They’re now considering dealing onefinal blow to me. --- **A judge may now order me to give up my _remaining_ home in Florida – __myprimary residence.__** --- As my lawyer inquired: _**do they truly want me homeless?**_ --- Over the last few days, we’ve heard ridiculous claims about President Trumpbeing a “fascist.” --- Let me tell you what fascism is… Fascism is weaponizing the legal system topunish your political opponents. Fascism is having your home taken from you.Fascism is taking the law license away from your opponent’s lawyer. Possessions come and go, but I could _NEVER SURRENDER_ my fightfor freedom and for what I know to be _true.__ --- I would be tone deaf if I didn’t acknowledge that times are tough right nowfor _all_ Americans, not just me, so please stop reading here if you cannotgive at this time. --- _But funding my Legal Defense Trust is my last remaining hope of fighting formy freedom and for the liberty and justice of all Americans._ --- **So, if you can, and, seriously, only if you can, please make a contributionto my Legal Defense Trust – the Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund – as I keepfighting for my freedom and justice as Kamala’s Deep State tries to JAIL mefor life.** ---  CONTRIBUTE $25 ---  CONTRIBUTE $50 ---  CONTRIBUTE $100 ---  CONTRIBUTE $250 ---  CONTRIBUTE $500 ---  CONTRIBUTE OTHER AMOUNT ---  Thank you and God bless you, --- ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/9597edec9d3b4dbc906aaef6d7010e2a/Giuliani_Signature.png) --- Rudy Giuliani Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund ---   --- Paid for by Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund Legal Defense Trust ---    American Defense News --- _PO Box 1188 Fort Collins, CO 80522_ _**unsubscribe**_ | _manage data preferences_

name: Chairman Richard Hudson
subject: Taking a break to say THANK YOU
body: I'm working to defend our House Majority, but I needed to take a minute justfor you͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | --- | | | | ![](http://e.americanbriefing.com/rd/9z2zpihmmrf5ipoevv62fumj693tac3apg3q47oma2o_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5imeo34c5h2bs) ---  Dear Friend,  As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment toreflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of thiselection cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow theHouse Majority.  As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had theprivilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeingyour impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notchteam, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine.  But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - **it's aboutthe countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, andthe contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero ofour party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight.**  Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if youcan spare a few dollars.  **We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and everydollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contributionto help defend our razor-thin House Majority.**  Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts,advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help usdefend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats, and elect a new generationof conservative leaders._  If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but ifnot, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already.  Thank you and God Bless America,  **Richard Hudson ** _Chairman_ , National Republican Congressional Committee  --- | ![](https://www.myimgcloud.com/0d8b0490-e4fc-4393-8de6-5e67d4a702d9.png) --- | --- | Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. name: @Debbie
subject: What $10 — and a box of doughnuts — means to me
body: Debbie Mucarsel-Powellhttps://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text Friend, You probably didn’t wake up this morning and think, “Today's theday I’m going to make a $10 donation to DMP's campaign!” — but ahead of myLAST deadline of the Election, it's what I’m about to ask you to do. UnlikeRick Scott, I don't have a massive fortune at my campaign's disposal. I comefrom a working-class family, so I know my eye-watering $4 million goal isnothing to shake a stick at. But it's the only way I'll be able to defeat him.If that's all you need to hear, please click here to chip in $10 now — but I'dlike to share what your hard-earned $10 means to me.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text See, my family moved to the United States from Ecuador with big dreamsfor a better life when I was 14. But it didn't come easy, and despite my momworking back-to-back double shifts, we still struggled to afford rent on ourone room apartment. So once I turned 15, I began taking early morning shiftsat a doughnut shop before school. It wasn't much, but the extra cash gave myfamily room to breathe, and eventually, the life we dreamt of finally cametrue. But I'm not the only one who got their start in the doughnut business.When he was a young man, my opponent, Rick Scott, bought two doughnut shops.While I made minimum wage to help keep the lights on at home, he reaped thebenefits of his employees' hard work. For me, those $10 boxes of doughnutswere a lifeline that helped my family get by. For him, they kicked off acareer in penthouse C-suites. And with your $10, you can help me kick Rick outof the Senate on election night — so please, pitch in now.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text I went on to graduate college, fight to improve life for working familieslike my own, and become the first South American immigrant elected toCongress. Rick Scott went on to enrich himself off U.S. taxpayers via thelargest Medicare fraud scheme in history, amass a nine-figure fortune, and buyhis way into the Senate. So I don't take your help toward reaching my $4million goal lightly. There's simply no way I could ever do it on my own. Myopponent, however, can spend $4 million to get his ads on screens withoutthinking twice — and he has already spent plenty more to stop me. So the onlyway we'll get him out and give working Floridians the Senate representation wedeserve is if we hit my $4 million goal. Please, friend: Will you give just$10 — about the cost of a dozen doughnuts — to help me retire Rick Scott?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text This campaign is powered by small-dollar donations, so every cent makes abig difference. Thank you for everything, Debbie -------- This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. To unsubscribe from this email list, please clickhere:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/7CGTHFDMeUWW_Wz2yFDujA2?unsubscribedata=1Qb%2Br%2BWtMjnh4gQGrZgmyI6y8OKFjyICyqjFq%2F3xMUzqI8BlnaKxWZkA7DDcOJP4O2qXwkXESfrs6r9SWqkTbTNxceWN9%2FPV%2BiRt5UIZd2mHeoDUYNFLP2Dv1%2FwzPsJvzABGWBWUMHTTGbT2VQBqUlYbTeTH%2FYsPEkC%2Bc79gL7HYnI7HoiDneTvk9gckFr5T1YmXfzkYxpTsmJmiNSYXpsIEHUNh2CeiTS%2B5dIc36Z%2FkeOUpy%2BVO73g26q%2F1tBD3IEcJuShdfTr1lGagFpFJmHdbeDSU12Vmr25G2FMOwEo8FMxRiZixq5thm7cdnbpdfsOAjyKHSVvKCpBVWndRYtFVPJmqqT0VNtSyjCK9afnj41xKnx1C7xhzrJF8zGDDL8DstIcNDYRXXlkJHOZZhji1c8tqSI2hkD%2BRk7wInOQhT2taseybF38w0XT4n1pSPaid for by Debbie for Florida. name: Colin Allred
subject: I have a big favor to ask:
body: Friend, I have a big favor to ask: If just 5% of folks reading this email chipped in $5, we would hit our $500,000 goal in no time. Can I count on you to step up with a split donation of $10 today to ensure my team and I have the resources we need to push back against the $40 million worth of attack ads Ted Cruz and his allies are running against us right now? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gfs_colinallred?refcode=jtk5609-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Last time around, Ted Cruz won his race by just over 2% of the vote – that was a difference of about 215,000 votes, friend. I remember how it felt watching the results roll in on November 6, 2018, and let me tell you, it was a nail-biter. I have no doubts that this year will be when we finally send Ted Cruz packing. But despite being closer than ever to defeating Ted, we've still got a lot more work to do and only a handful of days left to do it. I know seeing a number like $500,000 can feel overwhelming, but if thousands of hardworking folks like you chip in $5 here, $25 there, and the occasional $100, we will be able to collectively reach this critical goal. So please, will you chip in a split donation between my campaign and Kirsten Gillibrand's of $10 or whatever you can afford now so I can hit my daily fundraising goal and flip Texas blue? We've got zero time left to go, so let's get it done, friend! https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gfs_colinallred?refcode=jtk5609-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thanks for being on my team, Colin Allred -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. subject: Five dollars is all it takes
body: Friend, please don’t let us get outraised or outspent!                              | | | | |  --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/fb/fb9c6d45-479d-4f91-a02d-7dbf2cb6d4d1/classic-white-logo-slimmed-down.png) $5 TO STAND WITH TRUMP **OFFICIAL TRUMP CAMPAIGN MEMO** **Friend, I know I send you a lot of emails, and I hate to take up even amoment of your valuable time, but this can’t wait even a second longer.>** Before tonight’s FEC-MANDATED deadline, I want to give you _**FIVE reasons**_why you should chip in $5 to help us outraise Kamala. **Please take alook.>** 1\. Time is running out. This is one of our FINAL FUNDRAISING DEADLINES beforeElection Day! 2. We’re planning a HUGE media blitz to counter the Fake News, and your $5 will make it successful!  3\. _**Just $5 allows us to contact tens of thousands of undecided voters whowill decide this election!**_ 4\. _**If enough people give $5, we’ll hold our lead until Election Day. Butif we lose, we can KISS AMERICA GOODBYE!**_ 5. Your contribution of just $5 is all I need to _MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!_  But the most important reason of all to chip in $5 before my deadline? Kamalahas more than $1 BILLION in the bank, and as you’re reading this she’s makingMILLIONS MORE! **So please, will you chip in just $5 before midnight tonight so we can crushour goal? If every Patriot getting this message steps up, Comrade Kamaladoesn’t stand a chance>**  GIVE $5 Thank you,  ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/b0/b028923f-aa71-493e-a406-a3ae3dd63e4b/trumpheadshot.png) ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/cb/cb3fa8bb-6df3-4771-a7a6-1eb7fa1da014/trump-signature.png) Donald J. Trump 45th President of the United States _**PS: I also really hope you will pledge to donate again before the pollsclose >**_ It would mean the world to me if you could pledge to give again. If you can’t,don’t sweat it and make sure you uncheck the first box. $5 TO STAND WITH TRUMP | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/10/10cd0096-0965-4373-8732-fe72b64c4165/swamp-the-vote.png) President Trump will NEVER SURRENDER in his fight to SAVE AMERICA. But hecan’t do it alone. It’s going to take all of us, working together, to pull offa MASSIVE victory this November that’s TOO BIG TO RIG! The only way to ensure that is by beating the far left liberals at their owngame – by voting before Election Day! name: Navy SEAL Ryan Zinke
subject: maybe I bit off more than I could chew
body: But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end.͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | |    --- | | | | ![Ryan Zinke](https://e.trumptrainnews.com/rd/9z2zl0f6i4fosf9ghpro1vusn5l35fg0j9udffd6lt8_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5hm0or4cth2bs) ---  Maybe I bit off more than I could chew.  Maybe that's just the way it is.  Maybe the Democrat Machine is just too strong with their army of highfalutinmega-donors.  _**But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end.**_  My name is Ryan Zinke. Look, I served as President Trump's Secretary of theInterior and as commander at SEAL Team 6 - it takes a lot to shake me. But theDemocrat Machine has unloaded 322,000,000 dollars to bury House Conservativesand another 70,000,000 bucks to make Montana a Democrat state.  _If we stay the course in terms of fundraising, not only will folks in tightraces (like me) lose, but Republicans may never control Congress again._  That's why I'm going to be completely straightforward with you, Friend:  _**I'm personally asking you for one last contribution to save vulnerableRepublicans before the Democrat Machine wipes us all out.**_ This is soimportant that I'm partnering with Majority Leader Steve Scalise to help raiseone million dollars before Election Day.  Think you could lend a hand? --- | | | HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> --- | ![RyanZinke](https://www.myimgcloud.com/20229a6f-ad93-4746-8379-6a8865427785.png) ---  A few million bucks won't scare me off. I know that, Majority Leader Scaliseknows that, and the Democrats are about to find out the hard way whenConservatives everywhere come forward in droves.  **Our funds are running DANGEROUSLY LOW so I 'm really hoping that includesyou.**  I've served this nation in Trump's Cabinet and in uniform, now I'm humblyasking you to join our fight to save the country.  _**The election is next week. Please donate now while there's still to bringthe Democrat Machine to its knees.**_ --- | | | HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> --- For God and Country, Ryan Zinke     --- | | * * *  --- | ![Please take my Election Year Check-In!](https://www.myimgcloud.com/436c781b-63ab-44e6-a6f9-23529b280a40.gif) ---  It's House Majority Leader Steve Scalise.  I'm respectfully asking you to fill out my _**ELECTION YEAR CHECK-IN**_ atyour earliest convenience. It's important. I want to have your goals, yourconcerns, and your priorities in mind before I do anything else.  _What would you like me to keep in mind when I'm taking on the RadicalDemocrats?_ --- | | | START HERE >> --- | | Paid for by TEAM SCALISE, a joint fundraising committee authorized by and to benefit SCALISE FOR CONGRESS and EYE OF THE TIGER PAC.  ---  Team Scalise is committed to defending our Conservative House majority andelecting Conservatives across the country. Thank you for being a part of ourmovement.  Contributions to TEAM SCALISE, or any participating committee, are notdeductible as charitable contributions for federal income tax purposes.Contributions from corporations, national banks, labor unions, foreignnationals without "green cards," and federal government contractors areprohibited. Federal law requires us to use our best efforts to collect andreport the name, mailing address, occupation, and employer of each individualwho contributes over $200 in a calendar year. subject: this is a tough setback

We urgently need to close this budget gapor we'll be at a serious disadvantage – especially compared to our rich, self-funding MAGA opponent and the special interest money pouring into Ohio. name: Tammy Baldwin
subject: Uphill battle
body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4398%2E35263%2ERUCvvc ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE I wish I had better news to share with you, Peter. My team just let me know that we came up short of our October fundraising goal last night. This was always going to be an uphill battle. We had to raise our goals multiple times throughout the month to keep up with the tens of millions of dollars Republicans continue to spend on brutal attack ads against me. Now, I won’t tell you that the sky is falling because we missed this goal. But I will tell you the truth, which is that we’re starting November with a significant gap in our budget. That’s a problem because if we need to cut back on our campaign ads or get-out-the-vote efforts this late in the race, Republicans could easily flip this battleground seat. Staying competitive in this toss-up race isn’t as easy for me as tapping into a multimillion-dollar personal fortune like my opponent can. Instead, I rely on folks like you who pitch in what you can, when you can, to help power our campaign. [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-nov24.ANyQo7&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&t;=1004&akid;=4398%2E35263%2ERUCvvc ]So I’m humbly asking: Can I count on you to chip in today to help us defend Wisconsin’s Senate seat from my self-funding Republican opponent? name: Bernie Moreno
subject: Worse than garbage
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate They think those of us who disagree with them –half the country – are deplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! Fellow patriot,Biden thinks you’re “garbage” – but Sherrod Brown and his supporters thinkyou’re worse... This is one of the biggest elitist bankrollers of SherrodBrown, Kamala Harris, and the DNC. This is who Sherrod is beholden to and whohe has to comply with in order to continue having his campaign war chestpadded. Brown, Harris, and the radical left have shown us their true colors.They think those of us who disagree with them –half the country – aredeplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! It’s time to put an end to theirhateful and destructive hold on our nation. We need to fight fiercer than everuntil this is over. Can you chip in another $10 today to keep our campaigncruising on the path to victory? For American Greatness! Bernie Moreno GOPNominee for Senate, Ohio Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Moreno fights for theAmerican Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born in Bogota, Colombia. Atage five, his American Dream began when he moved to the United States with hisfamily. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18. Through his relentlesswork ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, he turned the first cardealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of the largest dealership groupsin America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value and transformationalpotential of blockchain technology, before it received mainstream attention,and moved much of his volunteer time and investment dollars into the space. In2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to be quite successful as Bernieserved as Chairman of the Board. After a long, successful career, Bernie soldmost of his business to begin focusing on his calling: protecting the Americandream for another generation. Solving our country’s problems requires commonsense. In Washington, Bernie will fight to shrink government, protect ourfreedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party from taking our data and land, andalways put America First. Ohioans are done with politicians who talk a biggame and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. to get work done – just likehe always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ON SOCIAL MEDIA Paid for byBernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hateto see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Dan Osborn
subject: my announcement
body: Click here to stop receiving emails about Dan Osborn's campaign in Nebraskafrom us. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/uB3EyayArUyKTBgRW_x--A2]https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Hello,The system is rigged. We all know it. The only people who can afford to runfor Senate full-time are millionaires like my opponent, Republican DebFischer. That’s why they’re the only people who ever win. It’s why the Senateis just another country club full of Ivy League graduates, former businessexecs, and trust fund babies. Working people like me, we can’t afford to giveup our jobs to run for office. During this campaign, I’ve been working 40, 60,sometimes 90 hours a week as a steamfitter just to pay our bills and put foodon the table. How’s anybody with a real job supposed to campaign and win whenyour opponent is wealthy enough to not work at all? That’s why I announcedthat I was taking a leave from my job as a steamfitter to campaign full-timefor the U.S. Senate and keep up our momentum. And yes, that means I’m going toneed to take a salary from our campaign. Not a big one. Just enough to replacethe $48,000 I got paid last year and the cost of health care for me and myfamily. Politics shouldn’t only be for the rich, and this is the only way wecan change that. Five brand-new polls show me narrowly LEADING my opponent,Republican Deb Fischer – and according to FiveThirtyEight, this is now theCLOSEST Senate race in the country. With support from grassroots donors likeyou, we out-raised Fischer, but Mitch McConnell is spending over $13.1 millionon TV ads attacking me. Together, we are charting the path for how a bluecollar, union worker can run for U.S. Senate – and win. But I need grassrootsdonors like you to chip in to my campaign right now if we’re going to defeatRepublican Deb Fischer and flip this Senate seat: Please, will you make adonation to my campaign right now – no amount you can afford is too small – tohelp me defeat Republican Deb Fischer and flip this Senate seat in November?[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]I’m not rich. I’m not trying to become rich. I’m running for Senate becauseworking people like me deserve a seat at the table in Washington and someonewho will fight for us day in and day out. Your support – of any amount – meansmore to me than you will ever know. Thank you, Dan Osborn Paid for by Adam forColorado.Adam for Colorado PO Box 1240 Glenwood Springs, CO 81602 UnitedStates Contributions or gifts to Adam for Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Sherrod Brown
subject: we might have to cancel our final TV ads
body: Friend, I need you to hear this: I just talked to my campaign manager, and shesaid we may not be able to keep our TV ads on the air in this final stretch.We missed our end-of-month goal last night, so now we're facing a significantbudget gap. Unless we see a surge of support ahead of our extended deadline atmidnight, we'll have to make some serious cuts, and we could cede the airwavesto Republican attacks. With only four days to Election Day and a new pollshowing me trailing my MAGA opponent, this could not come at a worse time. Andwith FiveThirtyEight saying our race is the closest of the cycle, I mean itwhen I say we have zero room for error. That's why I'm personally asking,friend: Will you rush $5 to help us keep our final TV ads on the air, win inOhio, and keep the Senate blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?refcode=jtk3753-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 We need to finishstrong, friend. I'm grateful for anything you can give. name: Ruben Gallego
subject: If you knew your donation could win this race, wouldn’t you chip in?
body: If you knew a donation of $10 could defeat Kari Lake for good, wouldn’t youchip it in right away? If you knew that $10 could help defeat Trump in Arizona(and probably make sure he loses nationwide) wouldn’t that be some of the bestmoney you’ve ever spent? If that $10 donation could put an end to the lasteight years of MAGA Right politics and help us move forward, together, as acountry… Why wouldn’t you donate? It might not seem like your donation of $10could do all that. Up against millions of dollars from Lake and the outsidegroups who are trying to get her elected, I get that. But I’ve got to tellyou: Just about every dollar we’ve raised in this campaign has come fromsomeone like you, chipping in whatever they could, when the time was right forthem. Those donations have gotten us this far. 400,000 of them. And today, Ineed you to make one more. With Kari Lake outspending us on television, everydollar we raise goes towards narrowing the gap. Your $10 could determine theoutcome of this election. Really. So, please. I know you can’t donate to everyemail we send, but if you could dig deep and split that $10 donation withUpset the Setup, I would be incredibly grateful to you. name: Bob Casey
subject: Do you have a minute?
body: [ https://go.bobcasey.com/go/182?t=1001&akid;=4741%2E552475%2EqDX7Gc ]BobCasey for Senate Can I have a minute of your timePeter, ? We fell short of ourfinal end-of-month fundraising goal, so I’m reaching out because we need to doeverything possible in the final 4 days of this campaign to win. That’s whyI'm reaching out to ask for just $1. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-1?refcode=em20241101-1&amount;=1&refcode2;=4741_552475_qDX7Gc&akid;=4741%2E552475%2EqDX7Gc]Chip in $1 ›› I know $1 may not seem like much, but with enough peoplestepping up today, we can close our fundraising gap and fight back against the$150 million that out-of-state billionaires have spent trying to buy thisseat. Experts have officially ranked this race a “Toss Up,” and recent pollsshow me behind for the first time. With just 4 days left, there couldn’t be amore important time to step up. [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-1?refcode=em20241101-1&refcode2;=4741_552475_qDX7Gc&akid;=4741%2E552475%2EqDX7Gc]We couldn’t do this without you. name: Carville, J.
subject: sounding the alarm
body: Friend, I’ve got about half a century of politics under my belt, so you cantrust me when I say this: Rick Scott poses one of the single greatest threatsto our democracy and everything that we Democrats care about — full stop. NowI’m known for making some pretty bold statements, but this is no exaggeration:Rick Scott is pushing an agenda so extreme, even Mitch McConnell wants nothingto do with it. I’m talking about ending Social Security and Medicare, raisingtaxes on working families, a national ban on abortions, and so much more. I’mscared half to death thinking about what could happen if we give this guy 6more years in Washington — especially with MAGA extremists on the cusp ofretaking the Senate. But right now, Democrat Debbie Mucarsel-Powell is fallingdangerously short of her LAST $4 million fundraising goal ahead of ElectionDay. I’m asking you to take the gloves off and go on the offensive with me:Please, will you donate $5 or more to help Debbie flip Florida blue and saveour Senate majority?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2463-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Listen, just about anyone can see that a bluewave is building in Florida. As folks from all across the state rally behindDebbie’s campaign, polling data shows that this race against extremist RickScott is a dead heat. And that barely scratches the surface: Even with theextreme abortion ban officially in effect, Florida Democrats secured areproductive rights ballot initiative this November and won a critical specialelection, flipping a pivotal state House district from red to blue. That’s whyDemocratic leaders like my friend Chuck Schumer, and even President Biden, areall in on Florida this year. They’ve announced HUGE investments to make surethat voters learn the truth about Rick Scott’s record. This state is ready toflip blue — but we’ve all got to have Debbie’s back in this fight. So I’masking one final time: PLEASE, will you donate $5 or as much as you can spareright now to make sure that Debbie has everything that she needs to take onRick Scott and defeat him?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2463-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for taking the time to read thisemail. Debbie can win, but only if folks like you believe in her and invest inher campaign. James Carville -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. I’ll be blunt with you: Michigan and our country are at a turningpoint. The outcome of November’s election will shape the trajectory of ourlives, impacting our families, our economy, and our national security foryears to come. All I’m asking for is $4 — what you would typically spend on aslice of Detroit style pizza in today’s economy. Your donation will help usDEFEAT Shanghai Slotkin, who is far too radical for America. CAN YOU SPARE$4? My Senate election is the CLOSEST in the country. The polls show we areTIED, which means any donation you can spare right now could put me over thetop. Radical Democrats like Slotkin are selling Michigan out to foreigninterests, crippling our auto industry, and hiking up the cost of living —putting a strain on every American living paycheck to paycheck. Under theHarris-Slotkin agenda, hardworking families are struggling to make ends meet.Meanwhile, I’ve spent my entire career defending this country, serving as anofficer in the U.S. Army and a Special Agent in the FBI, and working inCongress to protect American workers and fight for your values. This electionis crucial. We can’t allow Washington elites to keep jeopardizing our economyand security. Together, we will secure Michigan’s future. So, what do yousay? Can you skip that slice of pizza and help us flip the Senate? Yourdonation will support my team’s final “Get Out The Vote” operations. CAN YOUSPARE $4? Thank you for your support! Sincerely, Mike Rogers Candidate forU.S. Senate in Michigan PS – 4 days left means we need to get out the votebefore it’s too late! Please chip in $4 now! I’m now neck-and-neck in thepolls with my radical Democrat opponent. I'm in a strong position to WINMichigan and flip the Senate majority. But I’m not taking anything forgranted. It’s time to put the pedal to the metal and work even harder. Willyou please make a donation to help me BEAT the Democrats? Thank you for yourgenerous support. name: Jordan Zaslow
subject: 4 Days: The exam room isn’t big enough…
body: Hi there, Florida is one of 22 states in which Abortion is banned or extremelyrestricted. In just 4 days, voters in FL will have the chance to enshrineabortion in their constitution. We are proud to be supporting the work to passthat constitutional amendment as well as the woman who is running to unseatWebster Barnaby. As you may recall, Barnaby is responsible for introducing the6-week, Texas-style abortion ban in FL in the first place. We are excited toshare our endorsement of Rosemarie Latham for Florida House District 29.Polling shows that Rosemarie is closer to winning this race against herextremist, anti-choice opponent (within 3 points!!) than anyone could haveexpected. Let’s help her finish the job. Rush support to her campaign bypitching in a split $20.24 or more contribution today. →https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbmfl-latham/?refcode=EM_F_241101introduced_N_JZ_90DO_10_G_N_PT From NPR: [ARepublican state lawmaker in Florida is proposing a bill that would ban mostabortions as early as around six weeks, allow members of the public to sueanyone who helps end a pregnancy beyond that point and fine physicians $10,000for each abortion they perform later in pregnancy. Republican state Rep.Webster Barnaby filed the 40-page proposal — called the "Florida HeartbeatAct" — on Wednesday. It would prevent physicians from performing abortions ifthere is a "detectable fetal heartbeat," effectively banning abortions afterabout six weeks into pregnancy, before many people even know they arepregnant. ] We have said it before and we’ll say it again: MEN SHOULD NOT BEMAKING LAWS ABOUT WOMEN’S BODIES! Rosemarie is a single mother of daughters.She has been a nurse for 43 years, and a nurse practitioner for 25 years. Shehas decades of experience caring for women 16 and over, including providingthem with reproductive healthcare. Through this experience, she has directlyengaged in the triumphs and challenges of our healthcare system and has seenthe ripple effect on people’s lives. “The exam room isn’t big enough to fitme, my patient, and Florida’s government.” This is why Rosemarie chose to runfor office. Because she is determined to do everything she can for women’shealth and safety. The same cannot be said about her opponent. We are sick andtired of men making dangerous laws about our bodies and our lives. We areworking hard to restore abortion access in Florida. A critical step in thatprocess will be to unseat the men who worked to pass abortion bans and replacethem with fiercely pro choice women. Help us ensure Rosemarie wins this seatby rushing a split $20.24 or more contribution between the Latham campaign andHer Bold Move today. → https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbmfl-latham/?refcode=EM_F_241101introduced_N_JZ_90DO_10_G_N_PT Onward, JordanZaslow Founder & Executive Director of Her Bold Move Her Bold Move believesthat ambitious women will transform our country. We provide critical supportfor fiercely pro-choice women candidates and their campaign teams: financialsupport, endorsements, message amplification, campaign media, fundraisingsupport, and more. Efforts to repeal the law are effectively an electoral hot potato, and likely contributed to the GOP’s loss of the House in 2018. With Trump and congressional Republicans battling razor-thin margins in their bid to retake control of Congress and the White House, one would expect them to tread carefully. body: Friend, our race in Ohio is now the ONLY toss-up Senate race in the country,according to FiveThirtyEight. name: Adam Schiff
subject: Thank you
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8118%2E5257348%2Etplz8- ]Adam Schiff for Senate Hi Derek — It’s finally November, and we are just days away from determining the future of our nation at the ballot box. Everything we’ve worked toward comes down to these final moments — and I want to take a moment to say thank you for standing with me every step of the way. This journey has been full of challenges and hard work — from mobilizing voters and supporting Democratic candidates here in California and the rest of the country to the attacks from Trump and his MAGA allies. Through it all, I’ve been inspired by the way this team has rallied behind me and the issues that matter most to them and their families. Your unwavering support has made all of this possible — and now we’re just days away from the finish line. We have the opportunity to keep the Senate blue, flip the House, and ensure we can move forward together — every conversation, every volunteer, every dollar raised, and every vote counts in this work. It’s not just about what we’re fighting against — it’s about what we’re fighting for. So let’s make sure every voter knows what’s at stake and how much better our future can be. Thank you again for everything you’ve done so far. With your continued support, I know we’ll finish strong and win this race. All my best, Adam P.S. If you’d like to support us in this final stretch, you can chip in [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2907?c0=nov2024_abs_em.SALZ0e&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_GEN_AC90_20241101_AM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1004&akid;=8118%2E5257348%2Etplz8- ]here. name: Gloria Johnson
subject: Freedom
body: It’s November 1st, y’all, which means we’re in the final stretch of one of themost critical elections in modern history. I want to take a moment to remindyou — this isn’t just another battle between Democrats and Republicans. It’s afight to protect a fundamental value that unites us all: Freedom. 💗 Thefreedom to love who you love. 🏥 The freedom to make decisions about your ownhealthcare. 🗳️ The freedom to cast your vote without unnecessary obstacles. ❌The freedom to live without fear of gun violence. I’ve fought for thesefreedoms every day in the state legislature, and I’m ready to take that fightto the U.S. Senate. But Marsha Blackburn and her special-interest allies aredoing everything they can to hold onto this seat and keep it working for therich and powerful. With only 4 days left, my team has set one final goal toclose this campaign in full force — $100,000. Every dollar goes straighttoward reaching voters, keeping our ads on the air, and making sure we leavenothing on the table in these final days. If everyone reading this chips injust a few dollars, we’ll be one step closer to victory on November 5th. Can Icount on you? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] If you’ve savedyour payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: DONATE $5[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=5]DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=10]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=25]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=100]DONATE $250[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=250]OTHER AMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] Let’s do this forTennessee and for the future we all deserve. Gloria Johnson-------------------------- Gloria Johnson is running for the U.S. Senatebecause Tennesseans deserve leaders who care. For too long, elected officialslike Marsha Blackburn have done absolutely nothing to make Tennesseans’ livesbetter. The only interests they’ve cared about are special interests. The onlypeople they’ve championed are their donors. Gloria will advocate for realsolutions to protect our communities from gun violence, make health care moreaffordable and accessible for all of us, secure access to the ballot box, anddefend reproductive rights. There’s a movement afoot for change — join us.[https://www.votegloriajohnson.com/] DONATE TODAY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?amount=25&refcode;=email_footer]DONATE MONTHLY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?recurring=true&refcode;=email_footer]Follow along: Text GLORIA to 23299 FACEBOOK[https://www.facebook.com/VoteGloriaJohnson/] TWITTER[https://twitter.com/VoteGloriaJ] INSTAGRAM[https://www.instagram.com/votegloriaj/] Paid for by Gloria for TennesseeContributions or gifts to Gloria for Tennessee are not tax deductible. name: Blue Amp Action
subject: Our rights are on the line
body: | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/X45e0a77d-b3d0-4896-b6c7-fc1b02fe5cac/368d17ff-e836-4168-8049-c5f0900fbbf9) | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/45e0a77d-b3d0-4896-b6c7-fc1b02fe5cac/a638be21-8513-42b1-9bfc-5f974022c80e.png) --- | | | | |  --- | _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes andDemocratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for ourdemocracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish tohear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- |![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXee9a8LgyWC0Dlkepz22x5X1ZlZp04FzVUs78WBOq3_LCKjcfXTnl27eF-649TgZnrgM-fTLs332ieix9S3gAzQkbpRriOFrAbenVcNhCEXNlg3dh665-ZJCrghiIr5GUXMmAEzUKMMjlaKn-t80bRpWT9U?key=Ftx-XL7zklmX6mYbDHFUqA) Peter, media tracking groups have found that Donald Trumpand his MAGA allies have spent more than $21 million to run ads that disparagethe LGBTQ community. It’s clear that the GOP wants to stoke fear about LGBTQ+Americans in hopes these anti-gay, anti-trans messages will win out withvoters and implement a red wave on November 5. But we have to push backagainst their dangerous, baseless narratives. Will you chip in $5 or moretoday to Blue Amp Action so we can support Democratic candidates who willprotect LGBTQ+ rights and make sure that MAGA Republicans can’t use theirpower to harm marginalized groups? --- | | DONATE --- | **Republicans are going mask off about** their desire to see protectionsfor LGBTQ+ people stripped away. Project 2025 – which will no doubt serve asthe blueprint for a Trump presidency – calls for eliminating sexualorientation and gender identity as protected classes which leaves LGBTQ+people without a legal safeguard from discrimination. We can’t let far-righthardliners win on Tuesday and implement their dangerous Project 2025 agenda –but we’re running out of time to guarantee Democrats will win big and keepLGBTQ+ rights SAFE. So please, Peter, can we count on you to make a gift toBlue Amp Action today so we can invest in Democrats before it’s too late? --- | --- | | | | | | DONATE --- | Thank you. \- Blue Amp Action --- | --- | | |  --- | --- | | |  --- | | | | |  --- | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/45e0a77d-b3d0-4896-b6c7-fc1b02fe5cac/bdd7c5f5-7de1-4347-b64e-b4284329efec.png) | Cliff Schecter President, Blue Amp Action Amplify Good  ---|--- | | |  --- | | Follow Us | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_twitter2.png) | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_linkedin.png) ---|---  | **Blue Amp Action PAC** PO Box 8384, Cincinnati, OH 45208 --- | Having trouble viewing this email? View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | | Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

name: Christina (personal)
subject: We’re almost there
body: Peter, I want to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude – because ofyour amazing support, we hit our end-of-month goal! We couldn’t have done thiswithout you, and I’m so grateful for everything you’ve done to get us in thebest position to beat Mariannette Miller-Meeks on November 5. But with justfour days left until Election Day, the stakes couldn’t be higher. That’s whymy team has set a final GOTV (Get Out the Vote) goal of $75,000 – to ensure wehave the resources to reach every voter we need until the polls close. Everydollar raised in these final days is crucial. We know this race will likelycome down to a handful of votes – remember, Mariannette Miller-Meeks won byjust SIX VOTES in the last presidential election. Together, we can take backthis seat. name: Josh Hawley
subject: I didn’t expect this to happen
body: Peter, I didn’t expect this to happen. I thought we’d meet our finalfundraising goal, but I just got off the phone with my Finance Director, whotold me we’re$4k short of where we need to be. The good news is that we stillhave a few hours before we report our numbers, so we still have time to makeup the difference. It’s only $4,000 in an election when millions of dollarsare spent, but every dollar counts in a race like this one. RUSH SUPPORTThank you, Josh Hawley Paid for by Josh Hawley Victory Committee Click here tounsubscribe. Privacy Policy

name: Defeat Lauren Boebert
subject: our ActBlue
body: Lauren Boebert and her Super PACs have raised millions to try to stop us from winning. | _Unsubscribe_ ![](https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP50/1/111662/images/Calvarese-Logo-Email-620x115.png.png)  Peter, After a new poll showed Democratic nominee Trisha Calvarese can defeat Lauren Boebert in November, we set a goal to raise another $100,000 before our midnight fundraising deadline so we can finally send Boebert packing and turn this House seat blue. **But we just refreshed our ActBlue, and it looks like we still have $12,830 left to raise to hit our goal and ensure we have what we need to win.** **It’s not an insurmountable gap, but we’re counting on you to make a donation right now if we’re going to hit our goal, defeat Lauren Boebert, and flip this House seat blue.** Lauren Boebert and her Super PACs have raised millions to try to stop us from winning. The only way Trisha can fight back and finally put an end to Boebert’s embarrassing political “career” is with support from grassroots donors like you now. In 2022, Lauren Boebert only won by 546 votes. It was the closest race in the entire country. So we need grassroots donors like you to give every dollar you can spare now if Democratic nominee Trisha Calvarese is going to beat Boebert and take back the House for Democrats. **This seat could be the difference between taking back the House or letting Republicans stay in control. But Trisha’s not taking a dime from corporate PACs, so we’ve got nowhere else to turn:** **Please, will you make a donation now – every single dollar you can afford – to help Trisha Calvarese defeat Lauren Boebert, turn this seat blue, and take back the House for Democrats?** _Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation through ActBlue:_ | | | **DONATE $10** ---  | **DONATE $25** ---  | | **DONATE $35** ---  | **DONATE $50** ---  | | **DONATE $100** ---  | **Other Amount** ---  We’re so grateful that you’re a part of this campaign.Thank you,Team Trisha  ********Paid for by Trisha 4 ColoradoTrisha 4 Colorado PO Box 630633 Highlands Ranch, CO 80130Contributions or gifts to Trisha 4 Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Kevin Lincoln
subject: Worried you’re sleeping on this
body: Kevin Lincoln for Congress Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t godown, communities won’t get safer, and government overreach won’t be reeledin. I’m worried you’re sleeping on this, fellow American. Democrats have beenleading in the Generic Congressional Ballot for three months now, meaning moreAmericans would rather send a Democrat to represent them in Congress than aRepublican. We can take back the White House and the Senate, but if we losethe House – which we only hold by a handful of seats –we can’t get anythingdone. Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t go down, communities won’tget safer, and government overreach won’t be reeled in. That’s why yoursupport for Republican victories in target battleground seats is so critical.We can’t miss out on real chances to flip vulnerable Democrat-held seats likethis one in CA-9. SEND A MARINE TO CONGRESS ➞ I’m fighting tooth and naildown the home stretch, and I need your help to close the deal. As a MarineCorps veteran, former pastor, and current Mayor, I’m ready to bring serviceand leadership to Congress to get our country back on track. But I need yourhelp. Don’t sleep on this. Flip this seat, protect our Republican HouseMajority, and secure the future of our country by chipping in to support mycampaign today. For America, Kevin Lincoln Veteran, USMC SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Meet Kevin Lincoln My name is Kevin Lincoln, and my story, is theValley’s story. I am a 3rd generation Stocktonian, raising a 4th generation inthe city I love. I’m the grandson of Mexican immigrants, and my stepfather isan Army veteran. Like many Stocktonians, my family has overcome economicsetbacks. My own father struggled to survive on these streets, and was at onetime, homeless. But I never let adversity define me. I joined the Marines andserved in the White House Military Office, assigned to Marine One. I graduatedcollege while working full-time and raising a family. I’ve worked in corporateAmerica and served our community as a pastor, and as a non-profit leader. I’mblessed with a beautiful wife, Bonnie, and two amazing children. I’ve lived alife of service, but the greatest honor of my life has been giving back to mycommunity, through serving as Mayor of my hometown, Stockton. SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Like, Follow, and Subscribe! Kevin Lincoln is a former member ofthe U.S. Marine Corps. Use of his military rank, job titles, and photographsin uniform does not imply endorsement by the Marine Corps or the Department ofDefense. PAID FOR BY KEVIN LINCOLN FOR CONGRESS We'd hate to see you go but ifyou'd like to unsubscribe, click here.

subject: THREE NUMBERS YOU NEED TO KNOW!

name: James Carville
subject: F*@%ING TERRIFIED
body: Peter, I am FUMING— I need Democrats to WAKE UP and take a look at what’shappening in Montana!! Mitch McConnell has handpicked a candidate to runagainst Jon Tester. Tim Sheehy is nothing but a wannabe cowboy who lies almostas much as he breathes. He’s a snake and we can’t trust him. Jon Tester is athird-generation dirt farmer with a proven track record of winning toughfights and trust me, he’ll do anything to deliver results for the folks backhome. But here’s what’s got me F*@%ING TERRIFIED: McConnell is slinging mud tothe tune of $90 MILLION. His slimy attacks against Jon are working and now thepolls are tightening. This race is wayyyyy too close for comfort! The Senatemajority will come down to Montana, so I need you to GET OFF YOUR YOU-KNOW-WHAT and help keep Jon Tester in the Senate. Jon told me that a generous groupof donors stepped up to match all grassroots contributions and help him closethe gap, but he’s STILL falling behind. WTF? He NEEDS a surge in grassrootsdonations RIGHT NOW to keep up with Mitch McConnell and his lame opponent. I’mcalling on 28 more folks in 18326: Peter, will you URGENTLY rush in $10 todouble your impact, help Jon Tester defy the odds, and win the most importantrace on the map? Split a donation before midnight >> If you've saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN$500 OTHER AMOUNT Why are you still reading this? Did you donate? —JamesCarville DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,

committee: Jocelyn Benson for Secretary of State
name: Jocelyn Benson
subject: Checking in on your plan
body: Friend, I can count the days left on one hand! I’ve been driving around thestate, checking in on operations county by county. Tuesday’s somewhat of aSuper Bowl for secretaries of state like me. I couldn’t be more excited to seeMichiganders make their voices heard. This will be the smoothest, safest, andmost secure election in Michigan history. Free and Fair Elections:Improvements Under Sec. Jocelyn Benson 🖥️ Modernized Voter Registration:Implemented online and automatic voter registration, plus same-dayregistration on Election Day. 👥 Recruited 30,000 New Election Workers: A newgeneration of poll workers is ready to assist you at the polls. 📮 InstalledSecure Drop Boxes: Over 1,000 secure drop boxes are available statewide forconvenient and safe ballot returns. 🏠 Enabled Voting from Home: Every voterhas the right to vote by absentee ballot, making it easy to vote from thecomfort of your home. ✉️ Mailed Absentee Ballot Applications: We sent absenteeballot applications to all registered voters to remind them of voting options.🌐 Launched Online Absentee Applications: You can easily download and submitabsentee ballot applications online. 📣 Engaged Underrepresented Voters: We'velaunched programs to increase voter participation in areas with historicallylow turnout. 🔍 Conducted Comprehensive Election Audits: We've workeddiligently to affirm the integrity and accuracy of our elections. I’m so proudof all we’ve accomplished together since my election in 2018. But this comingTuesday isn’t about me or the Secretary of State’s office. It’s about you!Now, I want you to take a moment to think about your vote in this election.Already voted? Think of three friends or family members. Send them a quicktext and ask, “Have you voted already? If not, do you have a plan to vote?”You can always refer them to Michigan.gov/Vote if they need help. Haven’tvoted yet? Take just two minutes to write down your plan. When are you voting?Do you know how you’re getting there? And, do you know where to go?Learn moreat IWillVote.com Your voice matters, and your participation is what makes ourdemocracy strong. Together, we can ensure that every vote is counted and everyvoice is heard. Democracy is a beautiful thing—thank you for being a part ofit. All my best, Jocelyn Benson Michigan Secretary of State Paid for byJocelyn Benson for Secretary of State Mailing Address: PO BOX 21368, Detroit,MI 48221. subject: News just broke:

name: Sen. Jacky Rosen
subject: we're running out of time
body: We're losing crucial ground in Nevada at the worst possible moment, friend: Arecent poll now shows me TIED with my MAGA opponent. Election Day is nearly here, and we're running out of timeto secure the lead in this must-win race. If we don't close this fundraisinggap in time, I'm worried we'll lose here in Nevada – and lose our Senatemajority. View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates.
