name: Kamala Harris
subject: I am asking for your support one last time before Election Day:
body: I am asking for your support one last time before Election Day. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|---  ![Kamala Harris](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/115/006/original/Kamala_Harris_Photo_20241101.jpg) Friend, we’ve gone through so much together these past few months. So I wanted to take a few minutes to tell you about my decision to run for president – and why your support for the DLCC and my campaign is so important to our success on Election Day in four days. Before I continue, if you’re short on time, will you split a donation between the DLCC and my campaign at my personal link below? https://dlcc.org/dlcc-hfp **The truth is: I am no stranger to unlikely journeys.** Where I grew up in the Bay, you either live in the hills or the flatlands. We lived in the flats. It was a working-class neighborhood of firefighters, nurses, and construction workers. I grew up immersed in the ideals of the civil rights movement, and at a young age I decided I wanted to be a lawyer. I wanted to protect people because I believe everyone has a right to safety, dignity, and justice. Today, my decision to run for president has everything to do with this opportunity to move past the bitterness, cynicism, and divisive battles of the past. We have the chance to chart a new way forward – not as members of any one party or faction, but as Americans. I want you to know that I will be a president who unites us around our highest aspirations. A president who leads and listens, who is realistic, practical, and has common sense. A president who always fights for the American people. I cannot do it alone. No one person could. It takes a team. It takes millions and millions of people coming together at once to shape the outcome of this election and elect Democrats up and down the ballot. If we are going to win this election and elect Democrats in swing districts across our country, I need you to step up and join this team. Millions of Americans have already voted, and millions more will vote on Election Day. And we need to do everything we can – and I mean everything – to reach every last voter to win the White House and elect Democrats to state legislatures across the country. **So, with time running out to make an impact before Election Day, I am asking for your support one last time:** Will you help us get out the vote over these final days by splitting $10, or whatever you can afford, between the DLCC and my campaign before our midnight deadline? Every dollar will help us reach more voters and elect Democrats in key swing districts before the polls close on Election Day. | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately and be split between DLCC PAC and the Harris-Walz campaign.  --- | $10 » --- | $25 » --- | $50 » --- | $100 » --- | $250 » --- | Other » ---  From the bottom of my heart: Thank you for everything. I am so proud to be onthis team with you.For The People,KamalaKamala Harris Vice President of the United States   **DONATE »**               | --- Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee 1225 Eye Street NW Suite 1250, Washington, DC 20005 Paid for by DLCC PAC. Dlcc.org. Not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee.  Contributions or gifts to DLCC PAC are not tax deductible. | The Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee and DLCC PAC are dedicated to winning and defending Democratic majorities in state legislatures across the country. This message was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com because you are a part of our grassroots network.  Emails are a crucial way to stay in touch with our supporters. Please add usto your address book or safe senders list to ensure timely election updates.  We're fighting to elect Democrats and advance a progressive vision in thestates. Our success depends on grassroots donors like you. Ninety-eightpercent of our donors give less than $200, and two-thirds give less than $20.To make a contribution, please click here. To unsubscribe and stop receivingemails about our efforts, please click here. ---  | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. It’stime to win back a Senate majority for Republicans and Get America Back onTrack. But the election is almost here. I’m running out of time! Help me pullthis off… DONATE NOW! name: Ken Mitchell for Virginia
subject: T-Minus 4️⃣ Days
body: logo Four days. Four days are all that stand between us and victory for thesixth congressional district. After months of hard work, thousands of milestraveled, and hundreds of events we can see the finish line. But we cannotgive up yet – we have so much more ground to cover as things really heatup—and we need your support to make it happen!(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) Weneed to raise another $10,000 between now and Election Day. We have theopportunity to bolster our TV advertising during prime NFL and ACC footballgames. More than 50% of our congressional district still has not voted. Weneed to do everything to make sure voters know they have a better choice. Weare running a true grassroots campaign all thanks to your generosity, time,and dedication. We wouldn’t be where we are at without your help. Together, weare fighting for a better future for our community and nation. To ensure thatour message reaches every corner of our congressional district, we’ve launchedour billboard campaign, are releasing TV ads, and have been running radio adsleft and right. Our opponent doesn’t have what it takes to represent thepeople of the sixth congressional district. He is a proud Trump MAGA loyalist.My focus is revitalizing the economy, creating jobs, and ensuring fair wagesand protecting workers. I support women’s right to choose, workers and theirright to collectively bargain, increased funding for public schools, expandedand optimized broadband, equitable access to technology, and respect forpersonal privacy and healthcare choices. I am committed to transitioning torenewable energy, tackling climate change, and advocating for a diplomaticresolution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. My platform offers practicalsolutions and progressive leadership for a brighter future in Virginia’s vast,beautiful sixth congressional district. Do you know what my opponent brings tothe table? ❌ Voted against the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act ❌ Votedagainst the Infant Formula Supplemental Appropriations Act ❌ Voted against theAmerican Rescue Plan ❌ Voted against the Affordable Insulin Now Act ❌ Votedagainst the PAWS Act ❌ Voted against the Ending Forced Arbitration of SexualAssault and Sexual Harassment Act ❌ Voted against the Pregnant WorkersFairness Act ❌ Voted against the Protecting Older Workers from DiscriminationAct ❌ Voted against the Lower Drug Costs Now Act ❌ Voted against the EqualityAct As you can imagine, the list goes on and doesn’t get any better. Myopponent proudly stands with a convicted felon, Marjorie Taylor Greene, MattGaetz, and Speaker Mike Johnson. The sixth congressional district deserves somuch better. Donate Now! (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) So, to make it to the finish line, we need your help.Every dollar counts, and with your generous support, we can make sure that ourcampaign is visible and impactful. Click the link below to contribute and be apart of this vital effort: CLICK HERE TO DONATE NOW!(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days)https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days Thankyou for your continued support towards our shared vision for the future.Together, we can make sure our message is seen, heard, and acted upon! Can youdonate $50, $100, or $250 dollars to help us defeat Ben Cline and reach morevoters? (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) We should be in this fight together. Not pandering toparty loyalists and being bought by large corporations. If we don’t get backto pragmatic problem solving, mutual respect, and putting country beforeparty, our democracy will not survive. We can do better. Join me in defeatingBen Cline and bringing real representation to the sixth congressionaldistrict. —Ken Mitchell, Democratic Candidate for Virginia’s 6th CongressionalDistrict Donate Now! (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) Authorized and Paid for by Ken Mitchell for Virginia POBox 1795 Harrisonburg, VA 22803 Facebook(https://www.facebook.com/kenmitchellforva/) This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com (mailto:dpwillis67@gmail.com) why did I get this?(https://kenmitchellforvirginia.us17.list-manage.com/about?u=435990a56c5fdf5272fa9ea86&id;=548b15aa7d&e;=0fced71d8c&c;=5385752ac3)unsubscribe from this list (https://kenmitchellforvirginia.us17.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=435990a56c5fdf5272fa9ea86&id;=548b15aa7d&t;=b&e;=0fced71d8c&c;=5385752ac3)update subscription preferences (https://kenmitchellforvirginia.us17.list-manage.com/profile?u=435990a56c5fdf5272fa9ea86&id;=548b15aa7d&e;=0fced71d8c&c;=5385752ac3)Ken Mitchell for Virginia . 850 W Market Street . Harrisonburg, VA 22801 . USA

It may not seem like much, but we calculated our $80,000 goalaround exactly what we need to succeed come November 5th, and we missed themark. We need to turn it around ASAP. If you can, consider chipping in here:secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24?amount=] Falling behindthis close to Election Day is going to have major consequences at the polls,Peter. But, we do have some good news: We did the math, and we can still comeback from this if we raise an emergency $4,000 today to make up for the lostground. If you’re in a place to give in this critical moment for our Montanamovement, please consider chipping in $ or whatever you can today.secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24?amount=] Our future, ourrights, and our home depend on us. Now let’s do what we do best — LFG! RyanBusse https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61550979818697[https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61550979818697]https://www.instagram.com/ryandbusse/ [https://www.instagram.com/ryandbusse/]https://twitter.com/ryandbusse?s=20 [https://twitter.com/ryandbusse?s=20]https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-footer-2023[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-footer-2023] For more than 25 years,Ryan was a successful gun industry executive. But he also saw how uncheckedextremism could take away American freedoms and even jeopardize our democracy.Ryan sees the same thing happening to Montana: wealthy extremist GregGianforte bought his seat with his own millions, and now he’s raising ourtaxes in order to give tax breaks to corporations, making Montanaunaffordable, defunding our public schools, locking up our public lands,hijacking our freedoms, and rigging the system for the rich. Ryan chose RaphGraybill as his running mate because no Montanan has done more to protectconstitutional rights and freedoms from Greg Gianforte. Since Gianforte becamegovernor, Raph has blocked more than a dozen different unconstitutional lawsthat invaded Montanans’ constitutional rights. name: Team Baldwin
subject: Four quarters
body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4425%2E35263%2EFGsMu0 ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE Today, we’re asking you to chip in $1, Peter. You might be asking yourself, “what can four quarters possibly do?” Well, here’s what your $1 can do: $1 can protect abortion rights, Social Security, and affordable health care from being dismantled by Tammy’s right-wing opponent. $1 can help defend our razor-thin Democratic majority in the Senate from Republicans and their extremist agenda. $1 can help our campaign fight back against the $100 million worth of ads Republicans and right-wing super PACs have poured into Wisconsin — turning this into the most expensive Senate race in our state’s history. We get it — $1 may not seem like it could make a difference, especially up against Republican dark money donors and a self-funding megamillionaire who has poured $20 million of his personal fortune toward flipping this seat red. But this close to Election Day in the most competitive Senate race in the country, every single dollar makes a real difference — especially when tens of thousands of supporters step up to support Tammy’s reelection campaign. [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2250?c0=tbe-em-nov24.3z46kb&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241101_PM2_V1_S1&t;=1004&akid;=4425%2E35263%2EFGsMu0 ]So, will you make a difference by chipping in $1 (or more!) today? name: Debbie
subject: sharing a slice of paradise with you, friend
body: Debbie's key lime pie recipehttps://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2454-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Friend, your support has just put me withinstriking distance of retiring Rick Scott, helped me pay my staff, and kept thelights on at HQ. So now, I'm sharing one of my best recipes — key lime pie —as a small way to say thank you. If you ask me, the best results come fromusing limes from the Florida Keys. But I can't protect the farmland ordelicious produce from our little slice of paradise in the Senate without yourhelp to close the 33% gap on my final $4 million goal before Election Day..Will you please chip in $5 or more now to help me take the lead and flipFlorida blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2454-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250&express;_lane=true Your support is the sweetesttreat of all — thank you, Debbie -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. body: 96 November is here. Election Day is Tuesday. But you don’t have to waituntil then to vote — early voting continues until Monday at NOON! Find yourpolling location and make your plan to vote. If you’ve already voted, the workisn’t done. Make sure your friends and loved ones vote. And please talk to anyundecided voter you know about why it’s time for a change in Kansas’ 3rdDistrict. Sharice Davids has failed to do her job. She’s put her party’sinterests over your interests. We can hold her accountable at the ballot box,and then we can have new leadership in Congress. name: Jason Miyares
subject: Our last chance
body: Please see a note from our sponsors. If you would like to unsubscribe, pleasevisit thislink. Friend, This October, I’ve been hitting the road to supportRepublicans up and down the ballot. The final campaign surge has alreadybegun, but I’m asking you today to support our efforts to turn Virginia red.>>> FIGHT FOR VIRGINIA WITH JASON <<< It’s not just about the presidency —it’s about the importance of electing common-sense conservative leaders up anddown the ballot. We’ve got an incredible candidate for Senate. We’ve gotcompetitive congressional districts across the Commonwealth. And we’ve got theenergy on the ground to make those victories happen — if we act. Virginiaisn’t just our surprise swing state this year. The roads to majorities inCongress could very well run right through Virginia. >>> LET’S WIN VIRGINIA<<< That’s why I’m mobilizing resources online and on the road to reach votersand turn Virginia red in these final days. To support these efforts, we’rerunning an urgent end-of-month fundraising surge to power us through ElectionDay. We only have DAYS left until the book closes on the 2024 election forgood, so we need to act now. Friend, can I count on you to be by my side whilewe fight for Virginia? Please, pitch in anything you can. >>> CHIP IN TO OURFINAL PUSH FUND NOW <<< Thank you, Jason Miyares Virginia Attorney GeneralWHO IS JASON MIYARES AND WHY IS HE WRITING TO ME? Jason Miyares is theAttorney General of Virginia — but his story doesn’t start in Virginia… Itstarts in Havana, Cuba, when his mother, Miriam Miyares, fled communist Cubapenniless and homeless. She immigrated to Virginia and raised Jason toappreciate freedom, fairness, and justice for all. In 2015, almost fifty yearsto the day that she fled Cuba, Miriam was able to vote for Jason to representher in the Virginia House of Delegates. After working as a prosecutor andserving for three terms in the state legislature, he ran and was elected the48th Attorney General of Virginia. Since his inauguration in January 2022,Jason has been focused on fighting violent crime and improving public safety,strengthening economic growth, combatting the deadly impact of opioids andfentanyl, and protecting Virginians from corporate misconduct. He’s beenfearless in standing up for the rule of law by challenging the Biden-HarrisAdministration whenever it tries to use lawfare to advance its radical agenda,whether it’s failing to secure the border or advancing its extreme greenagenda. This year, he’s not on the ballot — but the American Miracle is. JasonMiyares is laser-focused on making sure that we win Virginia this year, andthat’s why he’s writing to you today.Will you join Jason’s team and help himturn Virginia red? Paid for by Miyares for Virginia P.O. Box 26352Alexandria, Virginia 22313 This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.comUnsubscribe

name: Jon Favreau
subject: We need to do everything we can to make sure Bob wins
body: Jon Favreau here. If you’re way too online like me, you’ve probably seen a tonof headlines about a bunch of rich guys running for Senate in states wherethey don't even live. Connecticut mega-millionaire David McCormick is one ofthose rich guys, and he’s running against beloved Pennsylvania Senator, BobCasey. So look, this will be a very close race, and we need to do everythingwe can to make sure Bob wins — [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-2&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]which is why I’m asking if you’ll contribute $5 towards his campaign today.David McCormick is a former Wall Street hedge-fund exec who wants you to thinkhe grew up on a Pennsylvania farm, which is only true if you think that livingin a mansion 10 minutes down the road from a farm where your family raisedArabian horses counts as “growing up on a farm.” But wait, Peter, there'smore: McCormick also thinks the most popular beer in Pennsylvania is called“YANG-ling,” which is like running for Senate in Massachusetts and saying youwant coffee from "DOON-kin’ Donuts." If it wasn’t obvious before, it’s crystalclear now: David McCormick is wrong for Pennsylvania. But this will be one ofthe toughest races of the year for Democrats. McCormick has millions uponmillions of dollars of his own to dump into this race, in addition to thebacking of Donald Trump and billionaire-funded super PACs. Pennsylvania is ascompetitive as it gets, and with the Senate majority and the White Housedepending on it, we can’t take anything for granted. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-2&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]So please, will you chip in whatever you can to Bob’s campaign today? name: Keith Ellison
subject: We're running out of time
body: Peter, Did you see the latest MinnPost-Embold Research poll, Peter? DonaldTrump is chipping away at Vice President Kamala Harris’s narrow lead inMinnesota, giving Republicans a chance to win the state for the first timesince 1972. With early voting already underway and just four days left untilElection Day, we’re running out of time to fight back against the lies andmisinformation that Trump and his MAGA Republican allies are spreading viaincessant attack ads. While we know our grassroots movement can cut throughthe noise, we need everyone to pitch in and help keep Minnesota blue. Withoutsupport from people like you, my team and I wouldn’t be able to Get Out theVote. That’s why I’m reaching out to you today. Our team has a plan to expandoutreach to Minnesotans—particularly undecided voters and people in hard-to-reach communities that other campaigns overlook—but we need to raise anadditional $10,000 to put it in action. Our records show that you’re stilleligible for Minnesota’s Political Contribution Refund (PCR) program, whichallows Minnesotans to make a $75 donation (or $150 for couples) and receive afull refund from the state of Minnesota. There’s no time to waste, Peter. Willyou contribute $10, $25, $50, or whatever you can afford right now to helpboost Democratic turnout in Minnesota? name: Sherrod Brown
subject: will you help me get my final ad on the air?
body: Hi Peter, Sherrod here with some big news: After a new Morning Consult pollshowed me trailing my MAGA opponent by a point, my team and I sat down anddecided to launch one more final ad before Election Day. So, if you've beenwaiting to give $25 to split between this grassroots campaign and Fight forProgress, right now is when it will have the greatest impact. Here's why: *Ohioans are already voting, and Election Day is next week – so the sooner wecan launch this final ad, the more voters we'll be able to reach before theysubmit their ballots. * We're getting drowned out on the airwaves –Republicans have outspent us 3-to-1, so this final ad will punch back at theirattacks. * This final ad is going to be expensive – and we're going to run iton as many TV stations across Ohio as possible, so the more we raise, thebetter the chance we have at reaching the voters we need before Election Day.So, my team and I have set an urgent goal to raise $500,000 before midnighttomorrow to help launch this ad – my last ad before Election Day. I need yourhelp now more than ever, Peter: Please, will you rush $25 to split between mycampaign and Fight for Progress now to help us get our ad on the air, win inOhio, and keep the Senate blue? name: Dan Goldman
subject: A second Trump presidency will actually be worse than you imagine
body: Dan Goldman for New York [https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/NGP/NGP31/1/94087/images/dsg_logo.png] ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏Peter, I first ran for Congress two years ago to preserve and protect our democracy from an assault by Donald Trump and the Republican party he leads. As the lead counsel in Trump’s first impeachment in 2019, I saw first-hand that democratic ideals, values and institutions are perceived by Trump as an obstacle, not an asset. But I never imagined five years ago that he would go this far. And it is certain to get worse if he wins. Before I continue, please consider pitching in any amount in the final stretch of this election. Our vital work to defend our democracy and the rule of law is more important now than ever. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24] If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: CHIP IN $10 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=10] CHIP IN $25 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=25] CHIP IN $50 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=50] CHIP IN $100 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=100] CHIP IN $250 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=250] ANOTHER AMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true] — In 2019, the House of Representatives voted to impeach then-President Donald Trump for abusing his power and obstructing Congress — an ultimate betrayal of the American people and the rule of law. As lead counsel for the Democrats during Trump’s first impeachment, I helped to expose Donald Trump and his lawlessness to the American people. We proved that a corrupt president had abused the power of his office to undermine our democratic process in a bid to stay in power. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24] But that abuse of power was just the tip of the iceberg. Since then, Trump has attempted to overturn a lawful election in 2020, been indicted four times and convicted of 34 felony counts for interfering in the 2016 election, used his office to make money from foreign countries, cozied up to dictators, and tried everything in his power to undermine checks and balances and the separation of powers. But his plans for a second presidency are so much more dangerous. He has stated that he’d like to be a dictator, that he will use the military and the Department of Justice against anyone who disagrees with him, that he will turn the federal government into his personal fiefdom, that he will take away our individual rights and personal freedoms, and that he will support dictators over democracies around the world. Peter, we have unfinished business to save our country from Trump’s authoritarian intentions. Our democracy barely survived the first Trump presidency, and it’s unlikely it would survive a second. I’m running for re-election because we must stop Donald Trump and the Republican Party he controls from tearing down our democracy. And I need your support. Please contribute anything you can to support my work in the last four days of this election. We cannot waste a single second in this existential fight for American democracy. This race is close, but we still haveground we need to make up. Beth Van Duyne has been running ads nonstopattacking Democrats. We are keeping our foot on the gas, making sure we turnout every single Democratic voter. On the final day of early voting, can yougive one more time? name: Senate Conservatives
subject: Four Neck-and-Neck Senate Races
body: Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November and it's time to build a conservative majority in the Senate ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November and it's time to build a conservative majority in the Senate that will truly fight for our values without making excuses. The best way to send principled leaders to Washington is to donate to their campaigns through the Senate Conservatives Fund. You can contribute to multiple candidates with a single online transaction, and SCF will pay all expenses and processing fees. This will save these candidates a mountain of money, so they can use your contributions to win votes rather than to pay fundraising costs. Here are the Senate candidates who need your urgent support: ✓ Bernie Moreno (OH) ✓ Eric Hovde (WI) ✓ Sam Brown (NV) ✓ Kari Lake (AZ) Please take action right now by making a split contribution to their conservative Senate campaigns. These races are neck-and-neck, so these candidates will need funding until Election Day to broadcast their message and turn out their voters. SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES RUSH $250 → RUSH $100 → RUSH $25 → THE BEST WAY TO FUND CONSERVATIVES Did you know that candidates often have to pay fundraising expenses that are over 80 percent of your contribution? It's true. When you respond to marketing emails and text messages from candidates, the candidates often get less than 20 percent of your donation after expenses. That's why the Senate Conservatives Fund was founded – to give freedom-loving Americans an effective way to support the best Senate candidates across the nation. Please contribute to these four candidates today! We will combine your donations with those made by thousands of other patriots and transfer them directly to their campaigns. Working together, we can build a conservative Senate that will truly advance our freedom agenda. Thank you for considering this urgent request and for doing so much to help fight for America's future! ELECTION COUNTDOWN SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES DONATE NOW Change in Washington means changing the people we send there. Senate Conservatives Fund 300 Independence Ave SE Washington, DC 20003 Senate Conservatives Fund is a grassroots organization that promotes conservative policies and helps elect conservative candidates to the U.S. Senate. SCF was founded by former Senator Jim DeMint to help the grassroots change Washington. Contributions to the Senate Conservatives Fund are not deductible as charitable contributions. Contributions from corporations or foreign nationals lacking permanent resident status are not permitted. Federal law requires us to report the name, mailing address, occupation and employer for each individual whose contributions aggregate in excess of $200 in a calendar year. name: Gloria Witt
subject: Let’s Keep Building Momentum in the Final Days!
body: It’s About YOU! Dear Friends, As Election Day approaches, the choice inVirginia’s 5th District has never been clearer. My opponent has made hispriorities evident by fully embracing Trump and his extreme MAGA agenda.Meanwhile, I’m here to offer a platform rooted in unity, solutions, and thereal concerns of our communities. My opponent's campaign has centered onloyalty to the former president, anti-LGBTQ+ policies, and questioning theintegrity of our elections. He has called the pandemic a “plan-demic” andimplied that our voting system is flawed. This is not the leadership we need,nor is it reflective of the values that built this district. In contrast, myplatform is about strengthening democracy, supporting families, and promotingsmart economic growth. I believe in protecting Social Security, expandingaccess to healthcare, and creating vocational and educational opportunitiesfor our young people. These priorities are driven by my deep connection tothis district and my belief in the power of community. Let’s make sureeveryone understands the stakes in this election. I need your help to spreadthe word about what’s truly at risk in this race. Please share this messagewith your friends and family, and encourage them to join us in voting for avision of inclusion and progress for Virginia's 5th district. Thank you forstanding with me in this movement . Together, let’s create a future we canall be proud of. With determination, Gloria Witt Democratic Nominee Virginia’s5th Congressional District P.S. Please Join us for a Watch Party on ElectionDay! Support Gloria, a leader who will fight for “we the people.” DONATE StayConnected Facebook Paid for and authorized by Gloria Witt for Congress.Gloria Witt for Congress P.O. Box 2225, Lynchburg, Virignia 24505, UnitedStates Powered by Squarespace Unsubscribe

name: Team Tina
subject: Trump is not a “protector” of women
body: Folks — Donald Trump and the GOP are absolutely fixated on controlling women’sbodies. From restricting abortion access to opposing in-vitro fertilization,it seems like Republican leaders think they know women’s bodies better thanwomen themselves. To that, Tina says: Mind your damn business. While Trumpclaims to be a “protector” of women, his policies and vicious rhetoric provethe opposite — he is standing in the way of women’s rights and freedoms.Tina’s had enough — that’s why she’s doing all she can to elect leaders whoare pro-women, like Vice President Kamala Harris and Governor Tim Walz. name: Eric Swalwell
subject: thanks, friend
body: Democrat Eric Swalwellrepresents California's 14th Congressional District. https://ericswalwell.com/[https://ericswalwell.com/] Friend — November??? Wow. It's been one hell of aride. I genuinely couldn't have done this work without your support. Thank youfor your never-ending dedication, passion, and support over these past fewweeks. We're now literally DAYS away from the election. The work we've put intogether — you've put in — will decide whether or not we can put an end to theMAGA circus that's taken over Washington. It's not easy fighting a bunch offar-right extremists day in and day out. The MAGA agenda is dangerous — whichis why our work is so important. I'm glad to say that we've made it throughOctober. Your efforts are bringing us closer to victory. Now, we just need tofinish strong. So, that's all. No ask — this time . Truly, from the bottom ofmy heart, thank you for believing in this fight. Your efforts are truly thecornerstone of this campaign. We’ve attached Stacey’s original message below if youwant to see! ----- Forwarded Message -----https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides] Peter: We’re just four days awayfrom Election Day, and the stakes couldn’t be higher. With polls showing razorthin margins and Republicans doubling down on their efforts to suppress ourvoices, we must fight back to build historic momentum for Democrats. I’vededicated my career to defending voting rights because I believe everyonedeserves to be heard at the ballot box. That’s why I’m proud to stand with theDemocratic Party of Georgia as they launch their vital initiative to providefree rides to the polls for voters on Election Day. Your support will helpensure that no Georgian is left behind, and will fuel our fight against theGOP’s ongoing voter suppression tactics. So will you chip in $ to help fundthe Democratic Party of Georgia’s Ride for Democracy program?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=] If you've saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: DONATE $ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true]ANOTHER AMOUNT » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides] With Georgiaserving as a key battleground state, the outcome of this entire election couldbe decided right here. That’s why Republicans are working overtime to preventus from voting – from limiting polling places to spreading dangerousmisinformation about the voting process. But we won’t back down. TheDemocratic Party of Georgia has a bold plan to confront these attacks head-on.By providing free rides to the polls, they’re dismantling barriers and makingit easier for every voter to participate in our democracy. However, they needto raise $20,000 to fund these efforts and ensure that everyone can reach thepolls on November 5th. Now is the time to take action, and I’m counting on youto stand with us. name: Sharice Davids
subject: The finish line is in sight
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/davids-email?refcode=email-header[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/davids-email?refcode=email-header] I oweyou a massive thank you. We just passed our last end-of-month fundraisingdeadline, and we hit our goal a few minutes before midnight. Every singlemember of this grassroots team has done incredible work to get us here — andthough we’re facing a tough fight, we’re in the best possible position, thanksto you. But we’re far from sitting back and relaxing in these next four days.The finish line is in sight. I don’t know about you, but when I see a finishline, I don’t slow down — I pick up speed and finish strong. And that’sexactly what we’re going to do with this campaign. In the next four days,we’re going to hit the ground running every single day. We’re going to bereaching out to voters all across this district to spread our message and getout the vote, so we can defend this vital battleground seat. But if we’regoing to do that, we need one last push from our grassroots coalition in thesefinal days of the race. Can you help us finish strong? subject: the difference between winning and losing
body: Folks, getting a flat tire now would be disastrous for our campaign. We have a major fundraising goal at midnight tonight, and it’scrucial that we reach our targets. Mitch McConnell and his buddies are lookingfor any signs of vulnerabilities. If we miss our fundraising goal, we’ll haveto pull down our ads and open the door for even more outside spending fromMcConnell’s super PACs. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: you there?
body: Are you there? I’m sorry to send another email, but my worst nightmare isbecoming a reality. Donald Trump just held another nasty rally in Nevadayesterday, and I have nowhere else to turn.Can you split $25 between mycampaign and Defeat Boebert PAC to help me combat the GOP’s attacks and getacross the finish line? Trump did not hold back. He directly attacked me onstage, saying I’m a “horrible person” and a “radical left lunatic.” And hegave my MAGA opponent a platform to lie about my record in front of thousandsof voters. Listen - I won’t let childish name-calling get under my skin. I’mthe most vulnerable woman in the Senate during a year where abortion rightsare on the line, so I know what it’s like to face an onslaught of GOP insults.But the truth is Trump and my opponent are ramping up their attacks against mein these final days and the GOP’s TOP super PAC just poured $6.2 million moreinto my race with one goal:to defeat me. If we can’t beat them to the punchand reach thousands of undecided voters as soon as possible, we risk losingthe Democratic Senate majority and the White House. So please, can you make a$25 donation split between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC before it’s toolate? I need *your* help to defeat Donald Trump and defend our DemocraticSenate and White House. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlueExpress, your donation will go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN $500 RUSH ANOTHER AMOUNT Thank you,Jacky Rosen DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Theresa Boisseau
subject: Second Chance - Free Viewing of Zurawski v Texas
body: I HIGHLY recommend you watch this documentary this weekend. View this email inyour browser (https://mailchi.mp/987033b5a265/amanda-zurawski-vs-texas-12709419?e=ebba716312) https://www.theresa4texas.com Hi Friend, ** Ifyou didn't get a chance to watch the documentary, Zurawski v Texas, I HIGHLYrecommend you watch it this weekend.------------------------------------------------------------ ** The Center forReproductive Rights sums it up:------------------------------------------------------------ "In the newdocumentary feature film Zurawski v Texas, independent filmmakers Maisie Crowand Abbie Perrault show the stark and terrifying reality of what it means tobe pregnant in a U.S. state that has banned abortion—and the bravery, grit anddetermination that it takes to speak out. Crow and Perrault followed threeTexas women who were denied medically necessary abortion care—Amanda Zurawski,Samantha Casiano, and Dr. Austin Dennard—as they brought their stories andbattled their case up to the Texas Supreme Court, with the help of the Centerfor Reproductive Rights’ Senior Staff Attorney Molly Duane." Watch Zurawski vTexas for free Nov 2 and 3 here(https://watch.eventive.org/togetherfilms/play/670db1d13a247100e803df13/670db1dc3f8905002cc42691)** If you are able to give, I am sure the Center for Reproductive Rights coulduse your donation.------------------------------------------------------------ Donate the theCenter for Reproductive Rights here (https://reproductiverights.org/) Theyhave cases across the country and could use our support while they fightagainst the extreme abortion bans that put women's lives in jeopardy. ** Ifyou haven't voted yet, today is the last day of early voting and Tuesday isElection Day. ------------------------------------------------------------Thanks for your help. ** Onwards,------------------------------------------------------------ ** Theresa------------------------------------------------------------ Donate(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/abrighterfuturefortexas) Volunteer(https://www.theresa4texas.com/get-involved) Issues(https://www.theresa4texas.com/what-theresa-stands-for) Shop(https://store.theresa4texas.com) https://www.theresa4texas.com Follow me onsocial media - and share with your friends and family!https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552530122152https://www.instagram.com/theresa4texas https://www.twitter.com/theresa4texashttps://tiktok.com/theresa4texashttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyd_ZE7lgKTjDchvDRg4A9g Pol. Ad paid for byTheresa4Texas. Copyright (C) 2024 Theresa4Texas All rights reserved. Ourmailing address is: PO Box 200759, Austin, TX 78720 info@theresa4texas.com(mailto:info@theresa4texas.com?subject=&body;=) www.theresa4texas.com Want tochange how you receive these emails? Last night, we fell $4,701 short of our $25,000 end-of-October fundraising goal — and my opponent is certainly taking notice.We’re running out of time. Election Day is now 4 days away, and without havingmet our goal, our critical voter outreach campaign is going underfunded. Thegood news: We can come back from this — but only together, and only if we doit QUICKLY. If all of my top supporters stand up with just $, we’ll have morethan enough to not only reach, but exceed our goal and give our team theresources they need to get out the vote in these final days. I’m counting onyour support. Will you pitch in $ today?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-nov24?amount=] DONATE NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-nov24?amount=] Thank you foryour commitment to our cause. — Raul https://www.facebook.com/DrRaulRuiz/[https://www.facebook.com/DrRaulRuiz/]https://www.instagram.com/doctorraulruiz[https://www.instagram.com/doctorraulruiz] https://twitter.com/Dr_RaulRuiz[https://twitter.com/Dr_RaulRuiz] https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer] The son ofhardworking farmworkers, Dr. Ruiz grew up in Coachella, CA and learned at anearly age that the key to attaining the American Dream is hard work and agreat education. In the summer of 1990, Raul walked in the desert heat frombusiness to business in the Coachella Valley asking them to invest in theircommunity by contributing to his education. With each investment for college,he made a promise to come back home and serve his community as a physician. In2012, he decided to take his service to the community to the next level byrunning for Congress. Dr. Ruiz needs our help to continue fighting for us inCongress and to flip the House blue this November.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer] CONTRIBUTE »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer][https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer?recurring=true&amount;=25] CONTRIBUTE MONTHLY »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ruiz-em-fr-footer?recurring=true&amount;=25] [https://drraulruiz.com/] LEARN MORE »[https://drraulruiz.com/] PAID FOR BY DR. name: Nella Domenici
subject: Fired up!
body: Nella for Senate We’re on the cusp of flipping New Mexico red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I’m fired up, Peter! The energy at President Trump’s rally in Albuquerque today was palpable. I could feel it on stage while delivering my own remarks, and it was apparent to anyone who was there todaythat something special is happening in New Mexico. We’re on the cusp of flipping this state red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I need you to keep fighting every single day, every single moment, until the polls close on Tuesday. Our campaign is working 24/7 to reach remaining undecided voters and get out the vote. We need to keep resources flowing into this campaign to ensure our funding for these operations doesn’t run dry. Your $5 or $10 contribution, in addition to your vote, is needed to help us secure more votes. Please chip in anything you can, and let’s win this thing! Let's Flip New Mexico RED! Thank you, Nella Domenici ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Team Kean
subject: RE: Shifting gears
body: Friend—Election month is HERE! We are now only FOUR short days away from oneof the most historic elections of our lifetime. This is THE final stretch…themoment we have been building and working toward… and we need your help ONELAST TIME to finish strong. HELP KEAN FINISH STRONG We are about to shift ourremaining resources into an ALL OUT Get Out The Vote Operation—will you pitchin one last time to magnify our efforts? This is our final push to keep Tom’sads running throughout the district, reach every single voter with Tom’sunifying message, and show the Radical Left that we are not letting up—noteven for a second. If you have anything left in the tank to give, please sendit in before midnight tonight and it will go DIRECTLY towards our final voteroutreach operation. SEND A FINAL SURGE OF SUPPORT Thank you in advance foryour generosity and action in these final days—it’s because of YOU that wewill win big on November 5th and get back to winning for the great people ofNew Jersey and America. name: Wes Moore
subject: What it means to make history
body: http://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024 [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024] Hey there, it’s Wes Moore. I wanted to talk about my friend, Lisa Blunt Rochester, who's currently running to be Delaware’s next senator. I’m so grateful to have the opportunity to talk about someone who will make meaningful change for everyday people like you. Take it from me, I understand the importance of having a people-powered campaign. Moreover, we’ve both come from humble beginnings. We know what it means to dig in deep to do the hard, meaningful work, and giving back to our communities is a value we both hold close to our hearts. And at a time when we’re more divided than ever, coming together to find common-sense solutions and leadership in the Senate is more important than ever. And with the Democratic Senate majority on the line in November, your grassroots support is crucial to making that a reality. So please, consider donating $25 or more today to help us make history again by helping me elect Lisa Blunt Rochester into the U.S. Senate as Delaware's first Black and woman Senator. name: Senate Republicans
subject: We have the opportunity
body: NRSC Five winnable neck-and-neck races will be decided by undecided andindependent voters on Election Day, and Senate Republicans need your help tosecure victory. We are less than a week from Election Day, and Senate racesare SHIFTING in states like Montana, Ohio, Wisconsin, and Pennsylvania. FellowAmerican, we cannot take anything for granted, even if ratings favorRepublicans. But politics can be unpredictable, and this year is no exception.– Roll Call 10/29 Many of these critical Senate races are going to come downto thousands of votes. • In 2022, Adam Laxalt lost by only 7,902 votes. • In2020, Congresswoman Miller–Meeks won her election by just six votes. That'swhy it's so foolish when people say their votes do not count. They do! TheSenate majority will come down to the wire. We cannot afford to take anythingfor granted – especially with so many close races and the chance to retireDemocrat Senators inMontana, Ohio, Wisconsin, and Pennsylvania. It's up to usto help push them over the finish line. Please donate to help. Thank you,Senate Republicans FLIP THE SENATE >> If you want to help Republicans TAKEBACK THE SENATE, text WIN to 55404 to receive mobile alerts! Message and datarates may apply. Text "STOP" to opt-out. T&C;/Privacy Policy. Paid for by theNRSC. Not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.NRSC.orgContributions to the NRSC are not deductible as charitable contributions forfederal income tax purposes. NRSC, 425 2nd Street NE, Washington D.C. 20002Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go, but youcan unsubscribe here .

name: Emilia Sykes
subject: In 4 days, the election will be over.
body: Peter, it’s Emilia. We are just four days out from the election. Voters aremaking their plans to vote, heading to the polls, and returning their ballots.This is crunch time! Since we only have four days left, I want to give you abreakdown on where this race stands right now. I'll explain more, but we needall the help we can get. Can you please pitch in $5 or whatever you can todayto help fuel our movement?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_es_allRight now, we are up against the millions that Republicans are spendingagainst me in an attempt to flip this seat. We only have four days left tomake sure this team is strong enough to go toe-to-toe with their deep pockets.Only four more days to combat the attack ads trying to hide my record ofworking across the aisle to deliver for Northeast Ohioans. Just four days toreach as many voters as possible in OH-13 to let them know what this movementis all about and that I am fighting for this hardworking community. Peter, wehave a lot of work to do, and any amount you can pitch in makes a hugedifference on this grassroots team.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_es_allI am working to bring jobs back to our communities, keep more money in thepockets of hardworking families, and protect reproductive freedoms. There isjust too much on the line, and we can't afford to fall short. Can I pleasecount on you to help us out in these final four days?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_es_allThank you so much, Emilia Sykes -------------------- A native of Akron, Ohio,Emilia Sykes has deep roots fighting for Ohioans. She learned from a young agehow to use her voice and the power of the people to create change. In 2022,Congresswoman Sykes was elected to represent Ohio’s newly redrawn 13thCongressional District, winning one of the toughest races in the country.Emilia has cut through the divisiveness to deliver results. name: Indiana Democrats
subject: One million Hoosiers (and Saturday voting)
body: [https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP03/1/67635/images/IDP%20logo.jpg]Peter, We have some good news for you on this Friday – as of this week, over1,000,000 Hoosiers have voted! Will you chip in to ensure millions moreHoosiers can cast their ballot before polls close at 6 PM Tuesday?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/indems] Tomorrow will be one of the biggestdays of this election. Early voting is open in every one of Indiana’s 92counties. Tell your friends, family, and neighbors that they can votetomorrow, and to go to indianavoters.in.gov [http://indianavoters.in.gov] tofind their polling place and hours. That’s an incredible pace, and we’reexcited that so many Hoosiers are coming out to the polls in this close andcritical election. However, too many voters across Indiana have had to wait orhaven’t had the chance to vote because of long lines. Our volunteers and teammembers are out every day working to protect the vote by making sure Hoosiersknow their rights, where to vote, and what to bring. name: April McClain Delaney
subject: 4 days to go!
body: Peter, We’re in the final stretch until Election Day with 4 days to go! Here’sthe deal: National Republicans are coming to Neil Parrott’s rescue–pouring inresources into attacks against me. Just last week, he was fundraisingalongside Stephen Moore, who infamously criticized the Violence Against WomenAct, labeling vital support for survivors as “pork.” That’s why we’re workingso hard to meet voters face to face. From now until Election Day, we need yoursupport to do so. That’s why we’re setting up a Get-Out-The-Vote fund to helpus with emergency expenses in the coming days. I know we have the power totake on Neil Parrott and his extremist agenda at the polls this Tuesday. name: Ashley Ehasz
subject: Thank you
body: First: I want to start off with a huge THANK YOU. I sign off every email with"thanks for being in this fight with me as my co-pilot" – and I MEAN IT. Justlike no one in the Army works alone, there's no way to run for office alone.It takes an entire team of volunteers, donors, and staff. I still can't fullygrasp that tens of thousands of people have my back every day. And I amgrateful for each and every one of you. Second: Even though we just closed thebooks on October, we have a goal of raising $20,000 from grassroots donorsbetween now and Election Day. So can you please pitch in – even if you'vealready done so recently? DONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-nov2024?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241101_fr_eomty_cand_mf_30da_s1_pt] I also want tomake sure that as my co-pilot, you know exactly what the campaign's been upto. Because we’ve been doing a LOT. Here's a quick run down: Organizing VoterTurnout Last weekend we… >> Broke our record for number of voters' doorsknocked >> Had so many volunteers that we had to turn our parking lot intooverflow space >> Gave out all of our walk packets for the whole weekend onDay 1 – so we've expanded the number of voters we're reaching out to >> Werejoined by Gov. Josh Shapiro And yesterday, Bucks County had a special visitfrom Tim Walz! Fundraising I'm proud to say that we reached our Octobergrassroots fundraising goal in the nick of time! A whopping 87% of ourfundraising comes from individual donations – NOT special interests likecorporate PACs. And we proved exactly how strong we are by outraising BrianFitzpatrick last quarter and setting a new record for Democratic fundraisingin PA-01. Ads The final case we're making to voters is Fitzpatrick's anti-choice record that has made women second-class citizens in this country. Andyes, I'm so fed up, I'm cursing in our ad.[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zdb-z9KJqV0] What's Next We have just 4 DAYSLEFT until Election Day. And this weekend is our last big Get Out The Votepush to turn out our friends and neighbors to the polls. Our goal is toshatter more records and welcome some big names to Pennsylvania in these finaldays! And of course, we need to raise that $20,000 to make sure we can keepour ads up and field offices resourced in these final days. Please rush $10 orwhatever you can afford to raise this last bit >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-nov2024?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241101_fr_eomty_cand_mf_30da_s1_pt] Thanks forbeing in this fight with me as my co-pilot, Ashley 🚁 Paid for by Ehasz forCongress Ehasz for Congress 1800 Byberry Road #1336 Bensalem, PA 19020 UnitedStates Ashley Ehasz is a former member of the U.S. Army. Use of her militaryrank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement fromthe Department of Defense or the Department of the Army. Inbox overcrowded butwant to stay updated on big news? Get less email – we'll send you about 2emails per week [https://secure.ngpvan.com/jpXqs-3mz0a7WjAoIC5fRw2]. name: Donald Trump Jr.
subject: Speaker Johnson’s request
body: Peter, If you’re like me, you know that the most important thing we can dothis year for our country is sending my father back to the White House. Butwhat’s equally important is ensuring that he has an army of America Firstwarriors in Congress to back him up! Help build our strategy! SpeakerJohnson and I are working tirelessly with just 4 days remaining to make surethat we win theFULL TRIFECTA this November. Can you take a few minutes torespond to the Speaker’s 2024 Election Survey and share your thoughts with usso we can build the ultimate operation? RESPOND NOW This isn’t just any oldsurvey. It’s a CRUCIAL factor in ensuring we have all the information we needto build our final strategy. So, Peter, can I count on you to respond? Thanks,Donald Trump Jr. Paid for by Mike Johnson for Louisiana Unsubscribe |Mark asJunk

name: Eric Sorensen
subject: We’re doing it, Peter
body: https://go.sparkpostmail1.com/f/a/0a1bfgA4l-P0RslnMqqjcQ~~/AAUS1gA~/RgRpB4reP0QgaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZXJpY2ZvcmlsbGlub2lzLmNvbS9XA3NwY0IKZxL2BSVn8HNYtFIUZHB3aWxsaXM2N0BnbWFpbC5jb21YBAAAABs~Peter, I want to extend a huge thank you to everyone who chipped in ahead ofour final fundraising deadline before Election Day. Thanks to your support, wemet our target and are headed into this final four days on strong footing.This weekend is going to be all about voter turnout, so we’re grabbing ourcoffees and filling our tanks to remind voters across IL-17 about what's atstake in this race. In the only competitive race in Illinois, and with justfour seats between us and the House majority, it’s going to be critical thatwe keep our foot on the gas and keep pushing in a race this close. If youhaven’t yet, there’s still time to fuel our final Get Out The Vote push. Everydollar we raise this week will go to work turning out Democrats andIndependents who support us. I’m hoping you can add a contribution of $10 tohelp us pull away. name: OKGOP
subject: It’s
body: Peter, early voting is continuing in Oklahoma today & tomorrow. And we needall Republicans to get out & vote. The times early voting is available today(Friday) is 8:00 am to 6:00 pm & tomorrow you can early vote during the hoursof 8:00 am to 2:00 pm. If you aren’t sure where early voting happens in yourcounty, you can find out here . One of the most impactful votes you will castis on the THREE State Supreme Court judges on the ballot for retention. Thevoters in Oklahoma are being asked “should these judges be retained on theOklahoma Supreme Court?” And the answer is NO, they should not be retained!You’ve heard plenty about the Presidential Election, and voting straight partyRepublican will restore our economy, but we MUST get rid of these liberaljudges. All three judges are very liberal (check out the score card made byOCPA scoring their liberal records ) by clicking here , and they were allappointed by Democrat Governors. They’ve constantly legislated from the benchwith their decisions in order to force their liberal agenda on the people ofOklahoma. For more information on these judges & the other judges on theballot please visit OKGOP.com/judges/ . There you can download a pdf to printat home, email to your family & friends, or distribute however you choose.Other groups have now engaged as well encouraging their people to vote NO onthese judges. We can’t afford more years of liberal activist judges forcingtheir leftist agenda on our State. Tell everyone you know to VOTE NO on allthree Oklahoma Supreme Court judges. The easiest way to remember it is: thesethree liberal Supreme Court judges MUST go, so we all must vote NO! Say NO toEdmondson, Gurich, & Kauger. -Team OKGOP -=-=- Paid for by OKGOP and notauthorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.OKGOP.com - (405)528-3501. 4031 N. Linconln Blvd., Oklahoma City, OK 73105 This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. To stop receiving emails:https://okgop.nationbuilder.com/unsubscribe -=-=- Created with NationBuilder -https://nationbuilder.com/

body: I want to say thank you, team. Every time we’ve sent out the call for help tothis grassroots movement, you’ve answered. You’ve donated. It means more than you know. Now, here weare in November, with the election looming over us, only four days away – andwe have a new goal that we need your help to reach. We intend to raise $25,000by Election Day so we can fight back against the onslaught of Republicanspending trying to silence our voices and buy this election. name: Scott Presler
subject: Election Update From Pennsylvania
body: Democrats will do ANYTHING to stop us from getting out the vote Friend, Idon't have much time but I needed to share this update about what is happeningon the ground in Pennsylvania. Democrats are trying to get me thrown inPRISON! The same Democrat machine that is relentlessly waging lawfare againstPresident Trump and the leaders of our America First movement is now goingafter my team and I. Why? Because they know that our efforts are moving theneedle towards a complete MAGA victory and they will do anything to try toslow us down. Thanks to the support of patriots like you Early Voting in PAwas through the roof for Republicans: For the first time ever, Republicansrequested and returned more mail-in ballots than Democrats. And make nomistake %recipient.first%, if we hold the line in Pennsylvania the so-called"Blue Wall" will come crumbling down, President Trump will return to the WhiteHouse, and we can finally get back to work saving our nation. But there isstill a lot of work that needs to be done in the final stretch before ElectionDay. We must ensure that our victory is TOO BIG TO RIG and we cannot allow theLeft to distract us from achieving our goal. STEP UP NOW - LET'S FINISH THIS!Right now, our team is deploying door knockers across the Commonwealth ofPennsylvania to make certain every Trump supporter that has not already votedbefore the Early Voting deadline shows up and casts their vote on ElectionDay. If you are able, please make a contribution so that we can fund theseefforts until we get over the finish line . $12 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKER FOR 1HOUR $24 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKER FOR 2 HOURS $48 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKERFOR 4 HOURS Our team will not lose focus until every patriot in this crucialswing state that wants to take our country back and restore American greatnessbanks their vote. I am grateful for everyone who chooses to stand with us atthis pivotal moment. It is because of your support that I am confident we willsecure Pennsylvania, take back the White House, and MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!Yours Sincerely, Scott Presler Paid for by Early Vote Action PAC Unsubscribehere

name: Jon Tester
body: Peter—it’s Jon. I’m in the toughest race of my life to win Montana’s Senateseat, and a brand new poll has me tied against Tim Sheehy. [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1014&amount;=25&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw][IMG] I can feel that the momentum is on our side and we can't afford towaste a single second of it over these next 4 days. I need you now more thanever: [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1015&amount;=25&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]Will you split a donation of $25 to help us finish these final days in thebest possible position to win this race? After seeing this new poll, generousdonors are matching every donation to this email dollar-for-dollar >> Ifyou’ve saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation willgo through immediately. [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1016&express;_lane=true&amount;=25&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]Chip in $25 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1017&express;_lane=true&amount;=50&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]Chip in $50 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1018&express;_lane=true&amount;=100&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]Chip in $100 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1019&express;_lane=true&amount;=200&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]Chip in $200 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1020&express;_lane=true&amount;=250&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]Chip in $250 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1021&amount;=35&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]Other Amount Look, I’m no stranger to tough elections—I won my first Senaterace by less than one percentage point. But I’ve never run a race like this.Mitch McConnell is making it his #1 mission to defeat me. His big moneybuddies have poured in millions of dollars to boost their handpickedcandidate, and flood the airwaves with attacks against me—right as Montanansvote. But this new poll shows that if we put in the work these last 4 days, wecan break the tie and defeat Tim Sheehy. [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33432?t=1007&amount;=25&akid;=3174%2E52803%2EnMkCvw]My team says we raise about $25K from emails like this one. name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: Respectfully asking for two minutes of your time
body: Two minutes, friend. I'm respectfully asking for two minutes of your timebecause it will only take me a couple of minutes to explain the criticalmoment we're at in our race to defeat Rick Scott here in Florida. We're FOURDAYS out from the election, and I am up against my critical end-of-monthdeadline at midnight tomorrow. This comes just as Rick Scott dropped $10MILLION on ads, plus ANOTHER $3M of his own personal fortune, after newpolling showed me statistically tied with him. To pull ahead and win, I mustraise every dollar of this $4 million goal before time runs out. This is ourbest and only hope to defeat Trump puppet Rick Scott in Florida and save ourDemocratic Senate majority in the process — and we've only gotten to thispoint because grassroots supporters like you gave at critical moments likethis. So please, before my 11:59 p.m. deadline — will you rush a donation of$5 or more before midnight to defeat Rick Scott and defend our DemocraticSenate majority?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2475-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 This goal means everything, friend. Rick Scottis using his massive fortune to outspend us on the airwaves, and Floridiansare already heading to the ballot box. Hitting this $4 million goal willensure we have the resources to amplify our own ads, fight Rick Scott'sattacks, and reach undecided voters as they cast their ballots. My two minutesare up, so let me conclude with this: I am so grateful for you, friend — forthis entire team donating an average of $30.95 at a time because you believein the movement we've built. Thank you. Now is when I need you more than ever.So make a donation now — of $5 or whatever you can spare today — to flipFlorida blue and save our Democratic Senate majority!https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2475-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you, Debbie -------- This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Tammy Baldwin
subject: I’m used to being written off
body: I’m used to being written off, Peter. When I first ran for Congress inWisconsin, no one thought I could win — especially when an extremely popularchallenger jumped into the race. I remember huddling with one of my staffersat the time, and she said, “Well Tammy, maybe you want to rethink what you’redoing because it’s going to be tough.” I looked her right in the eye andasked, “Do you think I should wait my turn?” The next thing I said was this: Ibelieve that women have to run — especially when it’s hard — and not wait ourturn. We can’t wait until we get a tap on our shoulder or we’ll never getanywhere. I ended up winning that race and became the very first woman electedto the House of Representatives from Wisconsin. And it wouldn’t be the lasttime our team would make history. When I ran for U.S. Senate in 2012, anincredible team of grassroots supporters like you fought alongside me — evenas some people wrote us off. You helped me become the first woman elected tothe chamber from our state and the first openly gay Senator in our nation’shistory. In 2018, despite being a top target for national Republicans andenduring over a year of attacks, you stood with me again, and we won. Time andagain, grassroots supporters like you have helped us defy the odds. The battleto protect my seat this year will be no different, with this race being mytoughest election yet. Eric Hovde and his Republican allies have already spentmore than $51 million to buy this seat and recent polls are showing this racein a dead heat. Protecting this seat won’t be easy, but together, I know wecan defy the odds once again. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82059?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1001&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]So Peter, I’m humbly asking: Will you split a donation between my reelectioncampaign and Lucas Kunce today to help us protect this battleground seat andthe Senate majority? name: Tim Sheehy
subject: $309 per vote
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it isnow costing our campaign $309 to reach a single registered voter. FellowConservative, If the most recent poll released over the weekend is to bebelieved, more than 23,000 voters in Montana have yet to decide whether theywill support me or my opponent, Democrat Jon Tester. With just four days leftin the race, we’re running out of time to reach these folks before they casttheir ballots. And that is not good news for us.In 2006, Jon Tester won hisfirst race by just 3,562 votes; trust me when I tell you that every votematters. With the Senate majority on the line, our need for further assistanceis immediate and as urgent as it gets. HELP ME REACH EVER LAST UNDECIDEDVOTER→ Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it is now costing ourcampaign $309 to reach a single registered voter.That means if we want toreach every last of Montana's 23,000+ undecided voters, we need to raise anadditional $7 million. When I tell you that every dollar counts, you know Igenuinely mean it. When I tell you that this race will come down to the lastvote, now you know I genuinely mean it. Please, can you help me get across thefinish line with a gift of $1, $5, $25, $75 or even $1,000 today. HELP MEREACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ For America's Future, Tim Sheehy Former NavySEAL Republican Candidate for U.S. Senate CHIP IN TODAY “ "I SERVED AS A NAVYSEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICACREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING ANDFEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FORTHE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOTPOLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA TimSheehy is a former Navy SEAL. name: Kamala Harris
subject: I was just in Nevada
body: It is going to take all of us to win this November and create the future your community deserves. | | | |  ---  Friends, I was just in Nevada.We have the momentum, and we still have work to do to earn every vote in thiscritical battleground state so that we can elect Democrats down the ballot.Donald Trump, JD Vance, and their allies are going to throw everything at usfor the next few days – **and we cannot counter their attacks without yoursupport.
