name: Lt. Governor Sara Rodriguez
subject: It's never been more important to vote
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] Friend, it's Lt. Governor SaraRodriguez. I'm reaching out one last time before Election Day with one simplereminder: This is one of the most important elections of our lifetimes.Wisconsin is one of the most important swing states in the country. Our 10electoral votes are some of the most important in the country, and it'scrucial that we deliver them to Kamala Harris on Election Day. And at thestate level, we have a task that's just as important: flipping the statelegislature. The new, fairer maps for this cycle give everyone the chance towin, which makes this the first time in a long time that we can win a majoritythis November. When we win next Tuesday, it'll let Governor Evers and I focuson passing our agenda that truly serves the people of Wisconsin rather thanfighting back against Republican attempts to bully working-classWisconsinites. With just a few days left in this election cycle, it's moreimportant than ever to make your voice heard at the ballot box. Whether thatmeans voting early or voting on Election Day, the most important thing is thatyou vote. I'll be doing my part this weekend, knocking on as many doors as Ican with my team—can you chip in to help us cover the expenses for this lastbig GOTV push? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] CHIP IN[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] In service, Lt. Gov Sara Rodriguez Lt.Gov. Sara Rodriguez, MSN, MPH, RN, was sworn in as Wisconsin’s 46th LieutenantGovernor on January 3, 2023. A working mom, wife, and proud Wisconsinite, Lt.Gov. Rodriguez was elected on November 8, 2022. Before her election, sheserved in the Wisconsin State Assembly, representing Assembly District 13,comprising a portion of Waukesha and Milwaukee Counties. While serving as astate representative, she worked on the Committees on Health, Insurance,Energy and Utilities, and Science, Technology and Broadband.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] Lt. Gov. Rodriguez is an experiencedhealthcare executive who has worked in various leadership roles for over 20years, including founding her own small business. Prior to serving in theWisconsin State Assembly, Lt. Gov. Rodriguez was the vice president ofPopulation Health and Integrated Care Management at one of the largesthealthcare systems in the Midwest. In this role, she provided strategicdirection to the teams that managed population health interventions for risk-based contracts and direct-to-employer products. Before running for office,Lt. Gov. Rodriguez built a career in public health and population healthmanagement. She held positions with public health departments at the local,state, and federal levels, including serving as an epidemic intelligenceservice officer with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, thechronic disease director for the state of Colorado, a healthcare systemsconsultant, and a vice president at a Fortune 100 Company. Prefer to donatevia mail? Address a check to: Sara Rodriguez for Wisconsin PO Box 1404Brookfield, WI 53008 SUPPORT SARA RODRIGUEZ[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] Paid for by Sara Rodriguez forWisconsin Sara Rodriguez for Wisconsin PO Box 1404 Brookfield, WI 53008-1404United States If you believe you received this message in error or wish to nolonger receive email from us, please unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/bSK0S2TpB06fE82_CF0vSg2?unsubscribedata=6t%2BbifcHEWrIOkT1h8lzaXbV3cmc6C5UAWWl17FaQm3QGNrp56lFcPQH5PqUCm7hpBaFiOgW1QS2C4NcE%2BYLF8gjpcAs52C6LtFu%2F8LRdrvWgfHCORWruy62i8cfXSiz41o0E3SsmLItPYbU%2BdX%2BwyVILwi4FpcoJfT8TloBhmkSw2i7iuz14rZNKXE0P3wwx9HkGCKf6nuM1UBco2BdOIvXKEDxWqp7l6nwKipqjfnRbh%2Ft7fVPrBuJJ01cdGioLKrD%2BJXG4MnqaDgLV05MSPWlYs0PPUXdvSuXVixW0EPc5f2W6jBjZScHcaFIQ7wyxftJb1vtDiQEY6JP3YgbNAklVp55yk5ZV4MZUUchQmDns3tiChKPo3KW7tBqm8E58Ueeer%2FGBilmHE6V6eQ7KCMPbG2G909%2BLyl4yRnbof5n03Z9R%2BiBOdNP7iAOrUBv.

name: Ben Forstate, Deluzio HQ
subject: this is the last weekend before the election (and your last chance to make an impact)
body: https://chrisforpa.com/ [https://chrisforpa.com/] Hey Derek, it’sBen Forstate, Chris’ campaign manager. I know you’re probably about to headoffline for the weekend, so I’ll keep this quick: We need to raise $15,000this weekend to support our get out the vote efforts before Election Day. CanI count on you to pitch in and help us hit this final goal?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]Donate →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]If you have a little more time before logging off, let me explain the stakesof this race: National Republicans have made defeating Chris a top priority.They know that the path to winning the House runs right through PA-17, andthey think that this is a toss-up race they can flip. Only 4 House seats standbetween Republicans or Democrats taking back the House. So winning in this keybattleground race puts us on the best track to winning back the House. But weneed to get out Chris’s message and turn out voters before and on ElectionDay. Republicans are attacking Chris’s record, but they’re the ones with theagenda Western PA doesn’t want. Chris’s opponent supports an extreme,nationwide abortion ban, has rallied with election deniers, has voted to gutvoting rights, and wants to put Social Security and Medicare on the choppingblock. The American people don’t want this kind of lunacy, chaos, andextremism. That’s why we’ve got to do everything we can to keep this seat soChris can continue fighting to defend our freedoms. But if we’re going to beatthese extremists on Tuesday, we need to hit the ground running this weekend,and we need the money to make it happen. This is the last weekend before theelection – and your last chance to make a real impact in this race. Please,consider donating any amount you can to help us get out the vote in thesefinal few days →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: Donate $5 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=5]Donate $25 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=25]Donate $50 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=50]Donate $100 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=100]Donate $250 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250&amount;=250]Other →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]We need one last push to get out the vote — let’s finish strong and protectPA-17. name: Jon Tester
subject: NEW poll in Montana’s Senate race
body: Peter—it’s Jon. I’m in the toughest race of my life to win Montana’s Senateseat, and a brand new poll has me tied against Tim Sheehy. I can feel thatthe momentum is on our side and we can't afford to waste a single second of itover these next four days. I need you now more than ever: Will you split adonation of $25 to help us finish these final days in the best possibleposition to win this race?After seeing this new poll, generous donors arematching every donation to this email dollar-for-dollar >> RUSH IN $25 Look,I’m no stranger to tough elections—I won my first Senate race by less than onepercentage point. But I’ve never run a race like this. Mitch McConnell ismaking it his #1 mission to defeat me. His big money buddies have poured inmillions of dollars to boost their handpicked candidate, and flood theairwaves with attacks against me—right as Montanans vote. But this new pollshows that if we put in the work these last four days, we can break the tieand defeat Tim Sheehy. My team says we raise about $25K from emails like thisone. I think we can do $60K right now—but I need your help to get there.Peter, will you rush a matched donation of $25 (becomes $50) before midnight?If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN$250 RUSH IN $500 OTHER AMOUNT Thank you, Jon DONATE Paid for by DefeatBoebert PAC This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Rep. Karen Bennett, GHDC Chair
subject: Have you made your voting plan yet? 🗳️
body: Hi Peter, Have you made your voting plan yet? Election Day is this Tuesday,November 5th – just 4 days away! If you’re voting by mail, please send in yourballot as soon as possible. For in-person voting, check your polling locationfor early voting or Election Day on Tuesday. FIND YOUR POLLING PLACE[https://mvp.sos.ga.gov/s/] Don’t wait until the last minute to make a plan tomake your voice heard! In these final 4 days until Election Day , we'rechanneling every resource into knocking on doors, making calls, sending texts,and reaching undecided voters—the ones who can cast the decisive ballots tobring more Democrats into our State House this January. We need your help toreach our fundraising goal and make this final push possible – can you givetoday? name: Dan Osborn
subject: the U.S. Senate is just another country club
body: Click here to stop receiving emails about Dan Osborn's campaign in Nebraskafrom us. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/uB3EyayArUyKTBgRW_x--A2]https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Heythere, The U.S. Senate is a country club. It’s full of millionaires, formerbusiness execs, lawyers with Ivy League degrees, and trust fund kids born withso many silver spoons in their mouths that they have no idea the reality forworking-class people like me. If I defeat my opponent Republican Senator DebFischer in November, I will be the poorest member of the U.S. Senate. I don’tcome from money, and I’m not rich. I’m a steamfitter and mechanic who works 50and 60 hour weeks to give my kids a better life. I will be the only senatorwithout a college degree. After my wife and I found out we were expecting ababy, I had to drop out and kill my dream of hanging a diploma on the wallbecause my family needed health insurance, diapers, and food on the table. Iwill be the only senator who is a blue-collar, card-carrying, union member.When Kellogg’s tried to cut our benefits and workers’ pay, we risked it all,went on strike, and walked the picket line for 11 weeks through the bittercold Nebraska winter. We won and saved hundreds of good-paying jobs – before Iwas fired for being the union president who led the strike. There is no onewho represents working-class people like me in the U.S. Senate. Which is whythis is such big news: Five brand-new polls show I am narrowly LEADING myopponent Republican Senator Deb Fischer. And FiveThirtyEight now says this isthe CLOSEST Senate race in the entire country! I’ve taken on a big corporationbefore and won, and now I’m going to defeat one of the most corporate senators– my opponent Republican Deb Fischer – and win this Senate seat. But I needyour help to do it. We’ve set a goal of raising another $200,000 before ournext fundraising deadline at midnight tonight, but I’m not taking money fromcorporate PACs like my opponent. If I’m going to defeat Republican Deb Fischerand win this Senate seat, I need grassroots donors like you to give right now:I have nowhere else to turn. Please, will you chip in $5 or more right now –every dollar you can afford before our fundraising deadline – to help medefeat Republican Deb Fischer and win this Senate seat?[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]I’m ready to be the 51st vote in the Senate to take on the billionaires andcorporations, fight for working-class people, and expand workers’ rights – butI can’t do it without you. I know the value of a dollar, so I am grateful forany amount you can afford to give. It genuinely means a lot to me. Thank youfor being a part of the team, Dan Osborn Paid for by Adam for Colorado.Adamfor Colorado PO Box 1240 Glenwood Springs, CO 81602 United StatesContributions or gifts to Adam for Colorado are not tax deductible. name: Janelle Bynum
subject: Our final weekend
body: This is it, friend. We have just four days to go in this race, and this finalweekend could be the difference between victory and defeat. We need to knockon a lot of doors (and I mean a lot!) this weekend to turn out voters – but wecan’t do it without your help. Will you chip in $10 today to help us maximizeturnout and win this toss-up race? Polling shows that we’re tied, so any extravoter we can reach this weekend could make the difference.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bynumq42024?refcode=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_jb_all&amount;=10Here’s why my team and I are working so hard to connect with voters over theselast days of the campaign: Lori Chavez-DeRemer and her GOP allies have beenspreading misinformation about me and my record. I’m having real, face-to-faceconversations with voters to let them know the truth. We need BIG turnout ifwe’re going to win this toss-up race. Polling shows that we’re tied, soreaching out to as many voters as we can is key to our path to victory. Thisrace could determine if Democrats win or lose the House majority. We can’tafford another two years of this extreme majority. That’s why I’m doingeverything I can to flip this seat and take back the House. Please, this isour last chance to get out the vote – will you rush $10 to help me and my teamreach thousands of voters during this final weekend?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bynumq42024?refcode=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_jb_all&amount;=10Thank you, team! subject: Jim Himes Loves Honey - But Connecticut Contractors Need the Money
body: View this post on the web at https://drmichaelgoldstein4ct.substack.com/p/jim-himes-loves-honey-but-connecticut My Fellow Voters, On the campaign trail, wehave driven all over the district. As you can imagine, we have been stuck in alot of traffic. It is an issue we have One thing we noticed on this campaignwas the license plates on the construction companies on I-95 and the Merritttend to be New York. Thanks for reading Michael’s Substack! Subscribe for freeto receive new posts and support my work. Look at the Groundbreaking last weekfor I-95 Photo- Tyler Fedor Source [ http://Tyler Fedor/The Stamford Advocate] Yonkers Contracting is based in New York. As an advocate for you, I reachedout to the press - so far, no response from the media. We are glad there aresome infrastructure improvements and most of the funds are federal but shouldwe also look to use Connecticut companies and keep more of the money in ourstate. After all they are federal tax dollars from CT residents as Connecticutonly gets back 70 cents of every federal dollar spent. A vote for me is a votefor transparency. We Need Your Support to get our final messages out for thecampaign that has been grassroots. Please support if you can. Please alsoamplify our messages Website www.goldsteinforcongress.com - Substack:https://drmichaelgoldstein4ct.substack.com/ Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/drmichaelgoldstein/ X: https://x.com/DrMGoldsteinFacebook https://www.facebook.com/goldsteinforcongress/ Dr. Michael Goldstein(ROW 3B) - Early Voting this weekend 10-6 www.goldsteinforcongress.com [http://www.goldsteinforcongress.com/ ] Paid for by Goldstein for Congress Thisis the Inquiry Sent below: Dear Editors and Investigative Journalists ofConnecticut's Major News & Media Outlets and Other Independent News ChannelOutlets: The Doctor Michael Goldstein for Congress Campaign for the 4thCongressional District has received numerous inquiries and concerns aboutYonkers Contracting as the Primary Contractor for most CT DOT projectsthroughout Fairfield County and other parts of the state. We see these truckseverywhere every night along the campaign trail when the roads are beingworked on for improvements. The concerns they raise are seeing New YorkLicense plates and why these are not Connecticut trucks. Have you looked into:How are these contracts awarded? If an out-of-state contractor is hired, willit use Connecticut Union Construction workers and other ancillary Connecticutresidents to participate in the construction or are all these workers New Yorkas well? If an out-of-state contractor is hired, will it use local suppliersof various materials or are all these suppliers New York as well? Whether allcontracts are awarded to the lowest bidder? Are local contractors consideredif their bid is slightly higher? How is a contractor rewarded or penalized byits previous project for change order usage as the winners always seem to bethe same? The percentage of payrolls to Connecticut residents (if any)? Thebenefit to local communities and economies in Connecticut if a localcontractor is awarded the contract? The benefits of contractor profits beingre-invested into the local economy rather than exporting profits outside of CTfor the out-of-state contractor and its out-of-state suppliers? AdditionalFees such as fuel surcharges and other distance based issues on logistics? AsClimate Change and Health Hazards associated with slow-moving traffic are alsomajor concerns, are the following also included in the calculation: Theenvironmental impact of greenhouse gas based on travel distance of workers andequipment out of state to the project site? The additional congestion of theworkforce commuting to the construction site and how it will disrupt trafficfor commuters? We have been concerned about the I-95 traffic and thechallenges to the Fairfield County corridor and now a project is starting. Wesaw the Yonkers Contracting banner and also wondered why there are noConnecticut Companies that win these bids. While most of the highway funds arefrom the Federal Government, it is still Connecticut taxpayer funds as CT hastraditionally received only 70 cents back on each federal dollar. As acandidate for Congress in Connecticut and campaigning on improving theFairfield County corridor, it is not just about improving the roads, buthaving a lasting impact on the local economies of Fairfield County andsurrounding counties that keep federally spent dollars in Connecticut. SomeLinks we have briefly assembled as this is really investigative reporting:https://www.thehour.com/news/article/i-95-delays-norwalk-westport-ctdot-bridge-replace-18404086.php [https://www.thehour.com/news/article/i-95-delays-norwalk-westport-ctdot-bridge-replace-18404086.php ]https://www.thehour.com/news/article/norwalk-i-95-fairfield-avenue-bridge-fire-crash-19525562.php [https://www.thehour.com/news/article/norwalk-i-95-fairfield-avenue-bridge-fire-crash-19525562.php ] https://www.yonkerscontractingco.com/stamford-parking [ https://www.yonkerscontractingco.com/stamford-parking ]https://newyork.news12.com/sick-of-backups-on-i-95-new-project-promises-relief[ https://newyork.news12.com/sick-of-backups-on-i-95-new-project-promises-relief ] https://www.ctinsider.com/projects/2024/news/ct-norwalk-bridge-i95-demolition/ [ https://www.ctinsider.com/projects/2024/news/ct-norwalk-bridge-i95-demolition/ ] The voters want to know why tax dollars leavefor out-of-state contractors when they know there are contractors in the State(not necessarily in the Congressional District) to do the work. We wouldappreciate your prompt attention to this matter as this is a major concern forour Voters. Traffic, Infrastructure, Climate Change and Health are on theBallot and the voter should be informed. Connecticut has also some of thehighest costs per mile for road repair and construction and our constituentsare concerned about inefficient use of taxpayer funds at the state and locallevel as poor spending hurts each resident in the pocketbook. We arethoroughly concerned about these issues. Sincerely, Dr. Michael T. GoldsteinCandidate for Congress Please reply here or info@goldsteinforcongress.com [mailto:info@goldsteinforcongress.com ] Our campaign main line for inquiries at203-350-9181 Thanks for reading Michael’s Substack! Subscribe for free toreceive new posts and support my work. Unsubscribehttps://substack..NXKao7pvTOCyJy9UZ67wlMLXAzrx4bU5BGeSidOaeUA?

name: Jacky Rosen
subject: I have a rare five minutes
body: Hey there, it's Jacky Rosen. I have a rare five minutes between campaignevents and wanted to reach out with a humble request. The Cook PoliticalReport is calling Nevada the "most perilous" battleground for Democrats – anda new poll shows me tied 48-48 with my Trump-endorsed opponent. Nevadans havealready started voting, and we urgently need to ramp up our operation soDemocrats can win this state – but we just don’t have the resources in thebank to do that right now. There is no holding the Senate without winningNevada. And the more voters we can mobilize, the better odds Kamala Harris hasof winning this state AND the presidency. Can you please make a donation to mycampaign? Anything you can give means a lot to me personally.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5274-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you, Jacky -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Derek Tran HQ
subject: The bombshell report that could change everything
body: With just 4 days left before Election Day, LAist just released a bombshellreport on Michelle Steel that could change everything in our race: LAist: "Asan OC supervisor, Michelle Steel awarded a $1.2 million pandemic mealscontract to her campaign mail printer" Yes, you read that right. MichelleSteel misdirected $1.2 million of taxpayer money – intended to fund a pandemicrelief meals program for low-income seniors in our community – to none otherthan her campaign mail printer, who had no such experience administeringfederal grants programs. More in a moment, but we need all hands on deck toamplify this story and make sure voters understand the shocking depths ofMichelle Steel’s corruption before they cast their ballots. Will you pitch in$5, $25, or whatever you can spare to help us reach voters before it’s toolate? >>>>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tran_email_q42024?amount=25&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_dthqTeam, this is just the latest domino to fall in Michelle Steel’s long historyof corruption. Here’s the truth: Michelle Steel’s self-dealing and corruptionknows no end. She’s going to continue to use her position in elected office toline her own pockets, rather than fight for our community. We know SouthernCalifornians are sick and tired of the corruption, so we need to make sureevery voter across CA-45 hears about the limitlessness of Michelle Steel’scorruption before it’s too late. Time is running out, so will you chip in tohelp us amplify this story before Election Day and put an end to MichelleSteel’s years of corruption, once and for all? Every single dollar makes adifference.>>>>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tran_email_q42024?amount=25&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_dthqTeam Tran ------------- Paid for by Derek Tran for Congress P.O. name: Ted Cruz
subject: NEW RATING
body: My race just shifted to the Democrats! Peter, When I saw the latest ratingfrom Cook Political Report that shifted my Senate race in the*Democrats’*favor, I knew our doomsday scenario was nearly a reality. So, it’s with aheavy heart that I wrote you this letter on the state of my race, but I askthat you read it all the same. Please read the letter I wrote for you in itsentirety. >> READ THE LETTER Thank you and God Bless you, Ted Cruz READ THELETTER Contributions to the National Republican Senatorial Committee are notdeductible for federal income tax purposes.. Notauthorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.NRSC.org You arereceiving this email at: dpwillis67@gmail.com Signing up for our emails is thebest way to receive the most up-to-date information regarding the efforts ofthe National Republican Senatorial Committee. Thank you for joining the Team.It’s because of patriotic supporters from all across the nation that we’vebeen able to FIGHT BACK against the Left, we need YOUR help. You can also sign up to receive text messages fromthe NRSC and key members of the Republican Party. If you would like to opt outof important campaign updates like this, pleasefollow this link. name: Sara Jacobs
subject: GOTV weekend is here
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] Hi friends! After what feels like alifetime of this election cycle, we’ve made it to GOTV (Get Out the Vote!)weekend, and I for one am fired up about it! Here’s what I’ll be up to overthe next four days: After campaigning in San Diego and other parts Californiathe past two weekends, I’m heading out to the presidential battleground stateof Michigan to get out the vote as much as I possibly can for Kamala Harrisand Tim Walz and for a whole host of fantastic Democratic House candidates.Here are just a few things you could do to GOTV wherever you are: * Join avirtual phone bank and call voters from home. * Text voters in battlegrounddistricts around the country. * Reach out to your friends and family to makesure they’re voting. * Post on your own social media about the importance ofvoting. * Carpool to a canvass in a battleground district or state. You canfind all that and more right here [https://go.kamalaharris.com/] . And ofcourse, if you haven’t voted yet yourself – GO VOTE! In San Diego County, youcan return your completed ballot to any official ballot drop box or drop it inthe mail (no postage needed to vote in California!), or if you prefer, you cango vote early in person at one of the more than 200 early vote centers openaround San Diego County. Get the details here [https://iwillvote.com/] . HappyGOTV! -Sara https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] Congresswoman Sara JacobsCalifornia’s 51st District CONTRIBUTE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] If you can’t give much right now, I want you to know that even $1 or $5makes a difference. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] And if youcan’t give at all, I understand. I appreciate you taking the time to readthese emails and stay connected with my campaign – regardless of whether ornot you’re able to chip in financially. name: Ritchie
subject: sending a quick thank you
body: Peter, I wanted to send you a quick note because I needed to thank you. I knowwe’ve emailed you a lot over the past few days, but I have some exciting news:We just had our most successful month yet. And since I don’t do a singleminute of call time, the success of October is fully thanks to grassrootssupporters like you, Peter. It’s clearer than ever that our movement has realpower, Peter. So as we look back on a wonderful month, we need to look aheadat the future - we can't slow down with just 4 days until Election Day! Ireally don’t want to waste this momentum, Peter, so I need to ask before yougo: Will you join our movement by chipping in $3 to help us finish thiselection strong? »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3&amounts;=3,10,25]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: CONTRIBUTE $3 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3&amounts;=3,7,10&express;_lane=true]CONTRIBUTE $7 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=7&amounts;=3,7,10&express;_lane=true]Or a custom donation »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=10&amounts;=3,7,10]I’m so grateful, Peter. - Ritchie ----------------------------------------Paid for by Torres For Congress PO Box 580303, Bronx, NY 10458 www.torres.nycRitchie Torres represents the future of the Democratic Party. Raised by asingle mother in public housing, Ritchie personally understands the hardshipsthat working families endure. At age 25, Ritchie made history as the youngestelected official to serve on the New York City Council. He fought tirelesslyfor the working families of The Bronx, and now, he's fighting for thosefamilies and for progressive values in Congress. He is the first openly gayAfro Latino ever elected to Congress. Ritchie is a champion for progressivepolicies to fight poverty and to improve the lives of families just like theone he was raised in. name: Eric Hovde
subject: FINAL MATCH UNLOCKED 🔓
body: Eric Hovde for Senate I have good news and bad news… Fellow Conservative, Ihave good news and bad news… The bad news: * Tammy Baldwin outraised me by $2MILLION in the 3rd quarter. * The Democrats have outspent us by $36 MILLION onads. The good news: * Our rating just upgraded from LEAN DEM >> TOSS UP! *Recent polls have us within 1 point of Tammy Baldwin! The key point is:Despite being outraised and outspent, we are on the brink of winning thisrace. Fellow Conservative, all it will take to win is one final push, and thisseat, and a Republican majority, is ours. I’m all in on our race to flip thisWisconsin seat, but I can’t cross the finish line alone. I need last-minuteresources FAST to win this race. So, I’m going to unlock ONE FINAL DONATIONMATCH of the election. I will personally match every donation through October31st. 🔓 FINAL ELECTION MATCH UNLOCKED 🔓 >> DEADLINE: OCTOBER 31st << FellowConservative, if you could step up and donate any amount you can right now, itwill instantly create 2X the impact and give me the resources I need to fightto the end. >> ACTIVATE PERSONAL MATCH << GIVE $20 ➡️ $40 IMPACT GIVE $35 ➡️$70 IMPACT GIVE $75 ➡️ $150 IMPACT GIVE $250 ➡️ $500 IMPACT We are on theverge of victory, Fellow Conservative. Please don’t let us fall short in thefinal hours. Sincerely, Eric Hovde Republican for U.S. Senate >> ACTIVATEPERSONAL MATCH << MEET ERIC Eric's a fourth-generation Wisconsinite, born andraised in the Madison area. He's a serial entrepreneur. He founded and managedhis first business in his twenties and then went on to start and build manyothers. When he is not running his businesses, he is focused on his family andhis philanthropic endeavors. He and his brother Steve operate 10 Hovde Homesaround the world that provide shelter, supportive services and love tovulnerable children. Join CONTRIBUTE MONTHLY Join the Conversation:Unsubscribe Paid for by Hovde for Wisconsin

name: Team WFP
subject: Leave it all out there
body: We’re entering the FINAL WEEKEND before the election. | | | ![Working Families Party](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/049/132/original/WFP-WORDMARK-HORIZONTAL_working-orange_.png) Peter, We’re entering the FINAL WEEKEND before the election. Just four more days to put our noses to the grindstone, turn out voters, and advocate for candidates that will put the needs of the many above the needs of the few. There are TONS of ways to get plugged in and help. Here’s what we need you to do:  1. Join one of our final phonebanks for Kamala Harris and Tim Walz — either tonight (Friday) at 6pm ET or tomorrow (Saturday) from 11am - 1:30pm ET.   2. If you want to focus specifically on Pennsylvania — one of the most critical swing states this cycle — join our PA WFP phonebank here. We’ll be hitting the phone lines on Sunday and Monday.   3. If you live in a swing state or are willing to travel to one, sign up to join a door knocking shift in key battlegrounds. Our partner, Seed the Vote, can help book transportation and housing, and offer financial support for those who need it in order to travel.   4. Lastly, and perhaps most importantly, you can easily find ALL the volunteer opportunities nearby (if they exist) by **texting "WIN" to 30403**You all have already done SO MUCH for our movement this cycle, Peter. Allwe’re asking for is one BIG push over these final four days. In solidarity,Team WFP P.S. Next Thursday from 8:00 - 9:00pm ET, we're hosting an electiondebrief Mass Call with the intention of unpacking the results, and chartingour path ahead. We'd love to see you there. RSVP! ![Like us onFacebook](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/069/070/original/fb-icon.png) ![Follow us onTwitter](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/069/069/original/tw-icon.png) ![Follow us onInstagram](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/069/068/original/insta-icon.png) ![Follow us onTikTok](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/090/940/original/5cb78671a7c7755bf004c14b.png)![Subscribe to ourYouTube](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/090/941/original/YouTube_social_red_circle_\(2017\).svg.png)Thoughts? Feedback? We want to hear it. Reply directly to this email and letus know. This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. If you received thisemail as a forward and want to get the latest updates from the WorkingFamilies Party directly, **sign up here.** The Working Families Party is theparty of the multiracial working class, fighting for a nation that cares forall of us. Wanna learn more? **Click here to check out our website.** And ifyou need to update your contact information, **you can do so here.** Otherpolitical groups have corporate donors. But we can pool our resources too.**Build our collective power to fight for working families candidates bybecoming a dues-paying WFP member with a monthly contribution of $10 ormore:** **Become a dues-paying WFP member »** **** Paid for by WorkingFamilies Party PAC (77 Sands St. #6, Brooklyn, NY, 11201). --- | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. name: Adam Schiff
subject: Trump called me “total scum”
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Adam Schiff for Senate Derek, stop me if you’ve heard this before: Donald Trump’s campaign claims that he’s a serious candidate, taking the rally stage to defend his record and talk about his agenda. But he gets introduced by racist, sexist, divisive speakers. Who ramble almost as much as he does. When Trump takes the stage, he launches into an incoherent, meandering speech, lacking in policy proposals, and chock full of lies and attacks against his political opponents, including me. [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2907?c0=nov2024_abs_em.SALZ0e&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1004&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]That’s exactly what happened yesterday at his rally in New Mexico. Derek, the attacks don’t phase me anymore, but with precious little time left for undecided voters to make their decisions at the ballot box, we can’t let their final impression of me come from a Trump screed. Please rush a contribution to boost our voter outreach in the final days of this election. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=10&t;=1005&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $10 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=25&t;=1006&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $25 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=50&t;=1007&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $50 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=100&t;=1008&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $100 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=250&t;=1009&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $250 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1010&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]ANOTHER AMOUNT [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&t;=1011&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Trump attacking Adam at a rally in New Mexico “This is an election for the biggest and toughest job in history. There’s no tougher job than being president, and we get hit from the enemy inside. You know that, right? We get hit by the Adam Schiffs of the world. He's scum, total scum. They made up Russia, Russia, Russia hoax. They made up all the impeachment hoaxes. They make it up. They're bad people.” This is the closing message of Trump’s campaign. Ridiculous lies and smears against me, or his other “enemies.” While Trump pretends he’s a victim. If we want to talk about who is capable of taking on the biggest and toughest job in history, I’m going with a proven champion for the underdogs, a sharp prosecutor, a skilled communicator, and an empathetic, kind, humble leader — that’s Kamala Harris. Derek, we have just 4 days to deliver our message to voters across California. [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2907?c0=nov2024_abs_em.SALZ0e&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1012&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Will you rush in a contribution before our final GOTV weekend to make sure we reach the voters we need to turn out in droves in support of Kamala Harris, Tim Walz, and Democrats up and down the ballot? If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=10&t;=1013&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $10 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=25&t;=1014&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $25 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=50&t;=1015&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $50 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=100&t;=1016&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $100 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=250&t;=1017&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $250 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1018&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]ANOTHER AMOUNT Thank you, Derek. I’m not surprised Trump is spending his final moments on the campaign trail attacking me. He hasn’t changed, and he never will. — Adam [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/4932?refcode=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1019&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Adam Schiff for Senate Banner; text Schiff to 724433 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1032?c0=nov2024_abs_em.vBSA2Z&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1020&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]DONATE MONTHLY 135 E. name: April McClain Delaney
subject: Our race just got more competitive
body: BREAKING: Cook Political Report downgrades MD-06 This race just got morecompetitive. From now until Election Day, we’re knocking on more doors, makingmore calls, and meeting as many voters as we can to prevent extremist NeilParrott from reaching Congress. Will you rush a contribution to help us fundour GOTV efforts across the district and defeat Neil Parrott? RUSH ACONTRIBUTION (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?refcode=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_2&amount;=25) This is not the newswe wanted, Peter — Our race was just downgraded by the Cook Political Report,meaning it got a lot more competitive. And with polls putting this race withinthe margin of error, what we do now could make or break the outcome. With just4 days left, that means meeting voters across the district to lay out thestakes. A Neil Parrott victory could mean: ❌Another vote against reproductiverights. ❌A vote against protections for victims of domestic violence andsexual assault. ❌And if Republicans don’t like the outcome of the Presidentialelection, it could mean a vote for decertifying the results. We need yoursupport now more than ever to finish this race strong. Will you chip in $10,$25, or whatever you can right now? name: Harrison Butker
subject: We Need to Stand for Jesus Christ!
body: I’m sure you’ve received so many messages from politicians and their allies bythis point. Be assured this is not another generic political message. I amwriting today because I will never stop using my God-given platform toproclaim proudly that: CHRIST IS KING! HELP MOBILIZE CHRISTIANS Our nationis at a crossroads in many ways. Powerful forces are doing all they can tosubjugate Christ’s authority on earth. A legion of souls have turned away fromGod, which has had a negative impact on so many important issues. One of themost glaring examples is the attack on the unborn. If it wasn’t already clear,I have said that “I will NEVER back down from my pro-life stance.” I do notwant to take much time or energy today focusing on the negative, but insteadpoint to Jesus Christ and how we should navigate these turbulent times. That’swhy I started the UPRIGHT PAC—to mobilize Christians across America. Not justfor the upcoming election, but for many elections to come. When united, wehave a powerful voice, and our votes can make a difference. Our country needspeople of faith to stand up and take action. The other side is workingovertime to push an ANTI-faith, ANTI-family agenda, but I believe we can turnthe tide. This is our moment. Let’s show the world the power we have when weare united. Thank you for your time today and for standing alongside me.Christ is King! Harrison Butker HELP MOBILIZE CHRISTIANS PAID FOR BY UPRIGHTPAC 138 Conant St, Ste. 401 Beverly, MA 01915 Unsubscribe |Mark as Junk

name: Donald J. Trump & JD Vance
subject: (1) New connection request
body: We both want to talk to you, Friend. TRUMP Hey, it’s your all-time favoritePresident. And this is your future Vice President JD Vance. With 5 days to go,we wanted to take a minute off the campaign trail to say THANK YOU FOREVERYTHING! VANCE TRUMP We really mean that. It’s because of you and you alonethat our campaign is in the strongest position we’ve ever been in. But thiselection will come down to a handful of votes in a handful of states, and ifwe’re going to finish the job next week, we’ll need you to step up just onemore time. VANCE TRUMP Kamala has the Liberal billionaire class backing hercampaign. We have millions of TRUMP VOTING PATRIOTS like you! You’ve alwaysdelivered for us in the past, but a generous $10 donation today would gofurther than any other point in this race. VANCE TRUMP Our final FEC Deadlineis tonight at midnight, and I’m personally asking you to chip in $10 to ensureour success. You can use the secure link I set up for youHERE:hqtrump.com/eom-trump-vance-oct-2024 And if you can’t afford to giveright now, please don’t worry about it. All I ask is that you say a prayer forthe future of our country and get out there to VOTE TRUMP in 5 days. VANCETRUMP No matter what you do to show your support, please know that I WILLALWAYS LOVE YOU! MAGA Contributions to Trump National Committee JFC are notdeductible for federal income tax purposes. All contributions are subject tothe limits and prohibitions of the Federal Election Campaign Act.Contributions from corporations, foreign nationals (i.e., without "greencards"), federal government contractors, and other federally impermissiblesources are strictly prohibited. Contributions made in the name of, orrefunded by, any other person are unlawful. Paid for by Trump NationalCommittee JFC, Inc., a joint fundraising committee composed of and authorizedby Donald J. Trump for President 2024, Inc. and the Republican NationalCommittee. You are receiving this email at dpwillis67@gmail.com Trump NationalCommittee JFC, PO Box 509, Arlington, VA 22216 donaldjtrump.com Thank you forjoining Team Trump. We believe this is an important way to reach ourgrassroots supporters with the most up-to-date information regarding PresidentTrump, and we're glad you're on our team. It's because of grassrootssupporters like YOU that we've been able to consistently call out the FakeNews media EVERY SINGLE TIME they've tried to spread misinformation oroutright LIES about the important work President Trump is doing to SAVEAMERICA. Reaching grassroots supporters directly is CRITICAL if we're going toSave America from the Left. But in order to do that, we need to providesupporters with the most up-to-date information on all of our efforts. TEXT"TRUMP" to 88022 to start receiving text messages from President Trump. It'sbecause of the commitment and support from real Patriots, like YOU, that wewill SAVE AMERICA! Thank you again for your generous support. If you'd like tochange your subscription status followthis link. Privacy Policy

name: Steve Daines
subject: These folks need our help
body: Steve Daines for Senate You can make a huge impact in less than 30 seconds.Fellow American, the Senate majority will come down to just 7 races: MontanaOhio Michigan Nevada Pennsylvania Wisconsin Arizona Here's the bad news,Fellow American. Our candidates are being outraised by millions in thesestates. TAKE BACK THE SENATE ⇒ HELP 7 RACES But this isn't just about theSenate. These states will also be CRITICAL for President Trump to win back theWhite House. President Trump is polling neck-and-neck with Kamala Harris inbattleground states. If our Senate races are successful, it will help DonaldTrump DEFEAT Kamala Harris where it matters most. I know what we're upagainst, Fellow American. Democrats are raising and spending millions morethan us, but we have a better message. Kamala Harris has done NOTHING tosecure our border as Vice President. Donald Trump and a Republican Senate willBUILD THE WALL. Joe Biden and Kamala Harris were responsible for ourdisastrous Afghanistan withdrawal.Republican candidates like Tim Sheehy, SamBrown, and Dave McCormick actually have SERVED overseas. Kamala Harris andSenate Democrats want to PACK our courts with liberal judges. As President,Donald Trump and a Republican Senate confirmed more conservative judges andJustices than ANY OTHER PRESIDENT IN HISTORY. It's clear that we need aRepublican White House and Senate, but we also need your help to make that areality. The map is on our side, but the financials are not. Will you make asplit donation to help President Trump, Tim Sheehy (MT), Bernie Moreno (OH),Mike Rogers (MI), Sam Brown (NV), Dave McCormick (PA), Eric Hovde (WI), andKari Lake (AZ)? There's too much at stake to sit on the sideline with 4 daysleft. Thank you, Steve Daines TAKE BACK THE SENATE ⇒ HELP 7 RACES SteveDaines is a fifth-generation Montanan, life-long sportsman and father of fourserving the people of Montana as their Senator. Steve is committed to alwaysputting Montana first as he works to bring real change to Washington andfights for more jobs, less government and common sense solutions to get ourcountry back on track.Chip in $10 or more to help Steve today! <> SenatorSteve Daines Paid for by Steve Daines for Montana Unsubscribe

name: Tim Sheehy
subject: This could come down to 3,562 votes
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Given that Jon Tester won his first race in 2006 byjust 3,562 votes, every vote matters. Peter, If the most recent poll releasedover the weekend is to be believed, more than 23,000 voters in Montana haveyet to decide whether they will support me or my opponent, Democrat JonTester. With just four days left in the race, we’re running out of time toreach these folks before they cast their ballots. And that is not good newsfor us.In 2006, Jon Tester won his first race by just 3,562 votes; trust mewhen I tell you that every vote matters. With the Senate majority on the line,our need for further assistance is immediate and as urgent as it gets. HELP MEREACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ Given the glut of outside spending on thisrace, it is now costing our campaign $309 to reach a single registeredvoter.That means if we want to reach every last of Montana's 23,000+ undecidedvoters, we need to raise an additional $7 million. When I tell you that everydollar counts, you know I genuinely mean it. When I tell you that this racewill come down to the last vote, now you know I genuinely mean it. Please, canyou help me get across the finish line with a gift of $1, $5, $25, $75 or even$1,000 today. HELP ME REACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ For America's Future,Tim Sheehy Former Navy SEAL Republican Candidate for U.S. Senate CHIP IN TODAY“ "I SERVED AS A NAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTINGCOMPANIES IN AMERICA CREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LEDCATTLE RANCHING AND FEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, ISEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVE THEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OURCOUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FOR THE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUTSERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOT POLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BYTIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA Tim Sheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his militaryrank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense.

name: Laura Friedman
subject: Four. Days. Left.
body: Friend, I wanted to take a minute to thank you for your ongoing support. Wehave incredible momentum heading into Tuesday’s election, and we would not behere without you. Today marks the start of our final weekend of volunteeraction. This is our last big chance to make sure CA-30 voters get theirballots in before November 5th. We could use your help! Believe it or not,tens of thousands of voters have yet to submit their ballots. That meansthere's still time to have a HUGE impact. In addition to pledging your vote,you can make a meaningful difference by encouraging your friends in CA-30 tovote for Laura. That means people in the Linda Vista area of Pasadena, LakeView Terrace, Sunland, Tujunga, Burbank, Glendale, Hollywood, West Hollywood,Edendale, Park La Brea, Hancock Park, Silver Lake, Los Feliz, Atwater, WindsorSquare, Miracle Mile, Beverly Grove, and westside Echo Park! Pledge yoursupport for Laura Friedman in CA-30, and tell your friends and loved ones inthe district to vote for Laura by November 5th! name: Kevin Faulconer
subject: Lawson-Remer: Missed Meetings, Missed Votes, and Missed Opportunities to Address Our Challenges
body: Lawson-Remer: Missed Meetings, Missed Votes, and Missed Opportunities toAddress Our Challenges View this email in your browser(https://mailchi.mp/3b0f9d762537/lawson-remer-missed-meetings-missed-votes-and-missed-opportunities-to-address-our-challenges?e=784f78234b) ** DearFriend, ------------------------------------------------------------ **------------------------------------------------------------ When you’reelected to represent the people, showing up isn’t optional—it’s a basicresponsibility. When I was Mayor, I showed up every day and met with my staff,the City Council, and department leaders to ensure the City was doing its bestto address our challenges. What’s important? Showing up to work. Yet, ViceChair Terra Lawson-Remer has failed to attend a single meeting of thehomelessness task force, despite claiming homelessness is her top priority.This task force isn’t just a title; it’s a critical opportunity to address ourcounty’s homelessness crisis. Under Lawson-Remer’s watch, homelessness(https://voiceofsandiego.org/2024/05/22/homelessness-spikes-again-in-san-diego-county/#:~:text=San%20Diego%20County's%20latest%20homeless,than%20the%20previous%20year's%20surge.)and related deaths (https://fox5sandiego.com/news/local-news/homeless-san-diegans-are-dying-at-higher-rates-than-a-decade-ago-whats-behind-it/) havereached unprecedented levels. But instead of engaging, she’s missed meetingsand critical votes—neglecting her duties and abandoning core responsibilities.It’s not just her—her staff has failed to show up as well. Lawson-Remer haseven admitted that her representatives haven’t attended meetings(https://www.nbcsandiego.com/decision-2024/san-diego-county-district-3-supervisor-race-2024/3660810/) , leaving important issuesunaddressed. In any other job, failing to attend mandatory meetings would begrounds for termination. But when it comes to serving our communities, sheexpects a pass? San Diego deserves a leader who is accountable, dedicated and,most importantly, present. I understand the urgency of San Diego’shomelessness crisis and have a track record of hands-on leadership, provensolutions, and a transparent commitment to our community. I won’t sit on thesidelines or turn a blind eye to the issues that affect us all just to collecta paycheck. Let’s work to address the pressing challenges we face as acounty—together. I humbly ask for your support. Sincerely, Kevin Faulconer Tolearn more about Kevin Faulconer, go to www.kevinfaulconer.com DONATE(https://secure.anedot.com/faulconer-for-supervisor/donate) Paid for byFaulconer for Supervisor 2024 - FPPC ID 1461674 www.kevinfaulconer.com Want tochange how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences(https://kevinfaulconer.us21.list-manage.com/profile?u=c8e1915e5d9cc8e4a2f64f766&id;=cc4d093e62&e;=784f78234b&c;=13ddd5dcdd)or unsubscribe from this list (https://kevinfaulconer.us21.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=c8e1915e5d9cc8e4a2f64f766&id;=cc4d093e62&t;=b&e;=784f78234b&c;=13ddd5dcdd). https://www.facebook.com/kevinfaulconer/https://www.instagram.com/kevinfaulconer/ https://twitter.com/Kevin_Faulconerhttps://kevinfaulconer.com

name: Gretchen Whitmer
subject: We have 4 days left to make this happen
body: Fight Like Hell PAC [https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/NGP/NGP59/1/106462/images/FLHP_Primary-Logo_RGB_Full-Color.png] Team, In just four days, we have the chance to elect Vice President Kamala Harris as our next President of the United States. Out on the campaign trail, I’ve spoken with people all across the country who are fired up to elect a president who gets us — one who understands the challenges that working people face and will fight like hell to address them. I’ve also spoken to people who are anxious about what lies ahead. I get it. The stakes of this election are incredibly high, and it’s normal to feel worried about what the future holds. But as we enter the final weekend before Election Day, we must channel our anxiety into action. We have just four days left to do the work that needs to be done to win Michigan and the White House for Vice President Kamala Harris, so let’s get to work! This weekend is our LAST chance to reach and turn out voters for Vice President Kamala Harris on the scale we need to win this election. Will you power our work to deliver Michigan’s 15 electoral votes to Team Harris-Walz by chipping in $15 today? name: Sarah Long, Movement Labs
subject: We’ve got plans for January
body: It's November 1st – and we're leaving these last five days in your hands. So,jump in where you can – send some texts, join a phonebank, and remind yourfriends and family to cast their ballots. Because we've got a lot of plans forJanuary: investing in a green energy economy, paid family leave for all,building affordable housing, and strengthening our right to vote – but we needgood leaders in place from city council to the Oval Office to get it done!We're excited, we're nervous, we're all of the feelings, but when pollsfinally close, we'll be able to say we left it all on the field. name: President Trump
subject: Friend, this is not goodbye!
body: We have four days to go. If everyone reading this chips in $4, then we’ll have4 years in the White House.          | | | | |  --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/fb/fb9c6d45-479d-4f91-a02d-7dbf2cb6d4d1/classic-white-logo-slimmed-down.png) | ---  # **THIS IS NOT GOODBYE!** We have 4 days to go.  ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/71/71428f98-4376-410b-b789-0a0f3d03b438/4-days.gif) We have 4 days until the most important day in American history. And if everyone reading this chips in just $4, _WE’LL HAVE 4 MORE YEARS IN THEWHITE HOUSE!_ There’s ZERO time to waste. **_In the minutes it takes you to read this message, thousands of votes willhave been cast._** **Will you rush in just $4 now to fund our FINAL Get-Out-The-Vote TRUMPBLITZ?>**  RUSH IN $4 We’ve come so far together, and I could’ve NEVER done it without you. In these final moments, I know I can count on you the most. **_Please chip in just $4 today.>_** WE WILL MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!  RUSH IN $4 Thank you,  ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/b0/b028923f-aa71-493e-a406-a3ae3dd63e4b/trumpheadshot.png) ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/cb/cb3fa8bb-6df3-4771-a7a6-1eb7fa1da014/trump-signature.png) Donald J. Trump 45th President of the United States **PS: I also really hope you will pledge to donate again before the pollsclose.>** It would mean the world to me if you could pledge to give again. If you can’t,don’t sweat it and make sure you uncheck the first box. RUSH IN $4 | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/10/10cd0096-0965-4373-8732-fe72b64c4165/swamp-the-vote.png) President Trump will NEVER SURRENDER in his fight to SAVE AMERICA. But hecan’t do it alone. It’s going to take all of us, working together, to pull offa MASSIVE victory this November that’s TOO BIG TO RIG! The only way to ensure that is by beating the far left liberals at their owngame – by voting before Election Day! body: ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏If you’d like tounsubscribe, click here.[https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/9_07fM1dnEmqdVR1wv8kcQ2?unsubscribedata=G%2B%2FTOuJy3Ah8dMgfR4uPZ1lCqxGJE%2Fu0b6Wr9HEkMhcGL2h2ByJmHEUxfHEhrW%2FF%2FuHA0M%2FN9%2BcjhuhXUNn7O91604kcqYJGVq7z2iypDvm2FOSHuV9JW3ZCE0Ww%2BUEjm1BerugE7cysptSlZu0cN3LPRNNlsqSG6LgM3ZXn1i5Wi2mx9HtTjg0rdZ3iFdH1%2FFcz4fhAxR80dBzTe9fqa1vZ6bz2KP16ezuEQSmnUVjvWHf4HvH9%2B3Gsoi5HfH20P3ys%2F2OuH5zR2tbGSqUNSZIzHHDlP%2FOhgdCpbrwSCrC7uUEcFwGA4zqaC0aYWXZINtmxqpCRoI8acBIe7gQNtkEoWCFoFloaQjgoUOfC3a3I79ykco9brCQhKTudu8QX9LZhFmsrdSC1594mzJ5Jz45r%2F9kiRtFDTGzRqXE%2BA1E%3D]# [#] Hi Peter, As we stand on the cusp of the 2024 Election, I find myselfreminiscing on the windy path that led me here, in Congress representing myhome district. When my boys were young, my husband and I were both workingfull-time. As soon as I got off the night shift from the Chapel Hill PoliceDepartment at 7am, I would go straight to my sons’ classrooms to volunteer.Not only did this serve as an opportunity for me to spend more precious timewith my children, but it opened my eyes to the social disparities affectingstudents firsthand, especially Black and brown kids, in the classroom. Icouldn’t stand by as students were being underserved, so after doingeverything I could do as a volunteer — I ran for School Board. On the SchoolBoard, I fought tooth and nail for better funding for our schools. Buteventually, I knew I had to run for Orange County Commissioner to makeconcrete changes. As Orange County Commissioner, I championed the constructionof two schools, two senior centers, and affordable housing initiatives — butknew the next step to securing long-term progress for our children’s andcommunities’ future was running for State House. I championed legislation forwomen, voting rights, and environmental protection. But, when I could donothing more as State Senator, I ran for Congress. I got into this line ofwork in pursuit of building a better life for my community and followed myheart throughout every single step. Now, there’s still SO much more I can do.In just 4 days, you can send me back to Congress and keep building progressfor NC-04. If you’re with me in this fight, will you chip in $ or more rightnow to get out the vote and defend my seat?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-nov24?amount=] If you've storedyour payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process now.DONATE $ » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-nov24?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE $ »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-nov24?amount=&express;_lane=true]DONATE $ » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-nov24?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE $ »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-nov24?amount=&express;_lane=true]DONATE $ » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-nov24?amount=&express;_lane=true] OTHER AMOUNT »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-nov24] I’m so grateful to have youalongside me on this journey, Peter. — Valerie[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-FOOTER24] CONTRIBUTE »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-FOOTER24] Paid for by Foushee forCongress Valerie Foushee for Congress PO Box 16446 Chapel Hill, NC 27516United States If you would like to unsubscribe, click here[https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/9_07fM1dnEmqdVR1wv8kcQ2?unsubscribedata=G%2B%2FTOuJy3Ah8dMgfR4uPZ1lCqxGJE%2Fu0b6Wr9HEkMhcGL2h2ByJmHEUxfHEhrW%2FF%2FuHA0M%2FN9%2BcjhuhXUNn7O91604kcqYJGVq7z2iypDvm2FOSHuV9JW3ZCE0Ww%2BUEjm1BerugE7cysptSlZu0cN3LPRNNlsqSG6LgM3ZXn1i5Wi2mx9HtTjg0rdZ3iFdH1%2FFcz4fhAxR80dBzTe9fqa1vZ6bz2KP16ezuEQSmnUVjvWHf4HvH9%2B3Gsoi5HfH20P3ys%2F2OuH5zR2tbGSqUNSZIzHHDlP%2FOhgdCpbrwSCrC7uUEcFwGA4zqaC0aYWXZINtmxqpCRoI8acBIe7gQNtkEoWCFoFloaQjgoUOfC3a3I79ykco9brCQhKTudu8QX9LZhFmsrdSC1594mzJ5Jz45r%2F9kiRtFDTGzRqXE%2BA1E%3D]You can also click here to donate [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/vf-em-fr-FOOTER24] .

name: Trisha Calvarese
subject: emergency meeting
body: My team just wrapped up an emergency fundraising meeting. | _Unsubscribe_ ![](https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP50/1/111662/images/Calvarese-Logo-Email-620x115.png.png)  Peter, My team just wrapped up another emergency fundraising meeting. We’re just 4 days away from election day, and Lauren Boebert has raised over $4 million from corporate PACs and her special interest donors. **With less than 11 hours until our critical fundraising deadline, we just checked ActBlue – and our grassroots fundraising has slowed _way down_. ****If I’m going to send Lauren Boebert packing and take back the House for Democrats, I’m counting on a surge of donations from people like you right now.** Lauren Boebert only won by 546 votes in 2022, and the polling shows we can finish the job and send her packing this November. But if we miss our fundraising goal now, we will have to cut our campaign budgets – and risk another two years of Lauren Boebert. **I’m not giving up, because I know I can count on you to help me win. If we defeat Boebert and flip this seat blue, Democrats are basically guaranteed to take back the House. So I have to ask:Please, will you make a donation to my campaign right now – every dollar you can afford before my critical fundraising deadline at midnight tonight – to help me defeat Lauren Boebert, turn this seat blue, and take back the House for Democrats?** _Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation through ActBlue:_ | | | **DONATE $10** ---  | **DONATE $25** ---  | | **DONATE $35** ---  | **DONATE $50** ---  | | **DONATE $100** ---  | **Other Amount** ---  We could not have gotten this far without grassroots donors like you, but Ineed your continued help now.I am so grateful for everything you do,Trisha  ********Paid for by Trisha 4 ColoradoTrisha 4 Colorado PO Box 630633 Highlands Ranch, CO 80130Contributions or gifts to Trisha 4 Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Matt Cartwright for Congress, Election Countdown
subject: Things are about to get very real.
body: Peter – We’ve made it to November, and Election Day is right around thecorner. We’re *officially* counting down the days until polls open, whichmeans we’re really ramping up our final Get Out the Vote (GOTV) plan to reachas many voters as possible before it’s too late. Right now, our team isworking overtime, knocking on doors, handing out campaign literature, andhaving last-minute conversations with undecided voters to let them know what’sat stake in this year’s election. These are the efforts that make all thedifference, and we need to keep them fully funded until the last ballot iscast. But we can’t do it alone. We need your help to ensure that every door isknocked on, every piece of literature is handed out, and every conversation ishad to educate voters all across northeastern Pennsylvania. Will you chip intoday to keep our GOTV efforts going strong until Election Day? Every dollarwill help us power this final push toward victory. So please – don’t sit thisone out! → https://secure.actblue.com/donate/email-cartwright-q4-2024 Let’smake sure we leave it all on the field and send a loud, clear message at theballot box. Thank you for standing with us in these crucial final days. Onwardand upward to victory, Matt Cartwright for Congress In 2022, Matt Cartwrightwas one of only 5 Democrats to win a House race in a district that DonaldTrump carried in 2020. He's gearing up for another tough re-election, and heneeds your support to keep PA-08 blue. Rush a donation right away to help Mattprotect his seat. name: Colin Allred for Senate
subject: Seriously, just $5
body: Peter, we have an important question: Can you chip in just $5 between ColinAllred and Defeat Boebert PAC to help Colin hit his daily $500,000 goal so wecan defeat Ted Cruz and keep our Senate majority? CHIP IN $5 → We’re sorryto be so frank with you, Peter, but here's why that $5 is more critical thanever before: - Ted Cruz won by just 2.6% in his last election. - Experts arecalling him the most vulnerable GOP Senator in the country. - FIVE polls showColin STATISTICALLY TIED right now. - And if we win here in Texas, Democratsare virtually guaranteed to hold the Senate. Seriously, just $5 can make aHUGE difference to our grassroots campaign. We know it might not sound likemuch when you think of the tens of millions Cruz has raised. But it adds up!If everyone reading this chips in $5, we'll reach our $1 MILLION goal in amatter of minutes, and we'll be that much closer to beating Ted Cruz andprotecting the Senate. So please, don't wait: Will you split a donation ofjust $5 between Colin and Defeat Boebert PAC so that Colin can keep up withTed's millions, reach voters in every corner of Texas, pull ahead in thepolls, and help Democrats protect the Senate? In a race this close and thisexpensive, we can't get to the finish line without supporters like you, Peter.→ If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your splitdonation between Colin Allred and Defeat Boebert PAC will go throughimmediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN$500 OTHER AMOUNT Thanks for fighting with us. – Colin Allred for SenateDONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Blue Senate Alert
subject: The whole country is watching ...
body: Right now, friend, all eyes are on Florida. Top Democrats know that the tidesare turning in Florida's race, which will make or break our one-seat Senatemajority — and with 4 DAYS left to Election Day, they're throwing their fullsupport behind Debbie Mucarsel-Powell to flip Florida blue: "Florida's race isgoing to be a lot closer than people think." — SEN. CHUCK SCHUMER "I'mwatching the Florida Senate race closer than most. To pick up a Senate seat,that's our best hope." — JAMES CARVILLE "We have to elect Debbie Mucarsel-Powell to the U.S. Senate. This is your chance, Florida." — FRMR. PRESIDENTBARACK OBAMA Will you help them power Debbie to victory in Florida by rushing$5 now?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2464-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Now that Debbie's within STRIKING DISTANCE ofRick Scott in the polls, we have to strike while the iron's hot to help hertake the lead. Scott barely won in 2018 by 0.12% of the vote, and with a 35%approval rating, he's the least popular Republican in Florida! But with hisambitions to follow Mitch McConnell as the next GOP Majority Leader, he'salready spent over $15 MILLION of his own personal fortune to stay in powerand flip the Senate red. And since he spent over four times as much to winlast time, we know there's plenty more coming to stop Debbie's progress inthis final leg of the race. That's why Debbie can't afford to fall short ofher FINAL $4 MILLION grassroots fundraising goal ahead of Election Day. It'sthe only way she'll be able to withstand Scott's attacks and win — so we'recounting on your immediate support to close the gap. Please, friend, Democratslike Chuck Schumer, James Carville, and former President Obama are going allin to help Debbie win — and we urgently need you to join them. Rush $5 or moreright now to help Debbie reach her daily goal, flip Florida blue, and save ourDemocratic Senate majority.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2464-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 — Team Debbie -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Sen. Jacky Rosen
subject: There’s no sugarcoating it:
body: Hi friend, it’s Jacky again! I’m on speakerphone with my campaign managerright now, and I need your immediate help.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5359-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 There’s no sugarcoating it: We’ll have to makesome serious budget cuts if we can’t raise another $85,385 today. We alwaysknew this campaign would be difficult. I’m the only first-term incumbentrunning for reelection in a battleground state and the only Jewish womancurrently serving in the Senate, so I’ve been a top GOP target for months.Especially after Nevada’s last Senate race came down to just 7,928 votes (lessthan a 0.77% margin and fewer than 5 votes per precinct), Mitch McConnell andnational Republicans have been determined to unseat me – and they’re spendingover $75 MILLION to do just that. The only way we made it this far was with apowerful grassroots team, fueled by the generosity of folks like you. So I’msorry to ask again, but I’d really hate to lose momentum with early voting inNevada ending tonight. If you have anything to spare, please dig deep and chipin to my campaign today.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5359-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you so much! This grassroots team is goingto make the difference between winning and losing on November 5th. Jacky-------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Thanks toyou, we hit our fundraising goal, and, for that, I can’t thank you enough. Ourcampaign has been a true community effort from day one, and that community isstronger than ever. name: Andrea Salinas
subject: Thank you
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinas-email?refcode=email-header[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinas-email?refcode=email-header] Friend,before we dive headfirst into the last few days of this race, I just wanted totake a moment to say thank you. I know we emailed you — a lot — asking foryour help leading up to our last end-of-month fundraising deadline. And thetruth is, we really needed the help. Our end-of-month goals are alwayscrucial, but this last one was the most important by far. Hitting our Octobergoal makes the difference in having the resources we need to reach undecidedvoters and get out the vote every day for the next four days. And thanks toyou, we didn’t just hit our goal, we surpassed it. Now, we have just four daysleft. That’s four days to reach every undecided voter in OR-06 and tell themwhat exactly we’re fighting for in this race: protecting abortion rights,defending democracy, and putting working families ahead of special interests.Friend, we need all hands on deck in these next four days. If you’ve beenwaiting for a good time to chip in, now is the time to join our movement todefend OR-06.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinasq42024?refcode=email_110124_thank-you&amounts;=5%2C25%2C50%2C75%2C100%2C250%2C500] If you've saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:Donate $5 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinasq42024?refcode=email_110124_thank-you&amounts;=5%2C25%2C50%2C75%2C100%2C250%2C500&amount;=5&express;_lane=true]Donate $25 →[secure.actblue.com/donate/salinasq42024?refcode=email_110124_thank-you&amounts;=5%2C25%2C50%2C75%2C100%2C250%2C500&amount;=25&express;_lane=true]Donate $50 →[secure.actblue.com/donate/salinasq42024?refcode=email_110124_thank-you&amounts;=5%2C25%2C50%2C75%2C100%2C250%2C500&amount;=50&express;_lane=true]Donate $100 →[secure.actblue.com/donate/salinasq42024?refcode=email_110124_thank-you&amounts;=5%2C25%2C50%2C75%2C100%2C250%2C500&amount;=100&express;_lane=true]Donate $250 →[secure.actblue.com/donate/salinasq42024?refcode=email_110124_thank-you&amounts;=5%2C25%2C50%2C75%2C100%2C250%2C500&amount;=250&express;_lane=true]Other → [secure.actblue.com/donate/salinasq42024?refcode=email_110124_thank-you&amounts;=5%2C25%2C50%2C75%2C100%2C250%2C500] I’d be lying if I said thisis going to be an easy race. If the polls are any indication, this election isgoing to be close . But with this incredible grassroots team by our side, I’mmore fired up than ever to work hard and win this race. Thank you for yoursupport, friend. I’m glad to have you on our team. - Andrea This email wassent to: dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Hilary Barrett
subject: Today is the LAST day for in-person early voting
body: With only days left in this election, it’s time to dig deep and finish up strong. | | | | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/092/966/original/NVDP-Logo.png) ---  Thank you, team.We truly cannot do this without you. Your grassroots support is powering ourGOTV efforts.****Today is the LAST day for in-person early voting.****With only days left in this election, it’s time to dig deep and finish upstrong. 1. Vote early (if you haven’t done so yet) and talk to your friends and family about **_voting early at any early vote center by 7PM today._** 2. Have a few hours to spare? **_Volunteer from anywhere to help us reach every last voter!_** 3. **_Chip in for our GOTV fund._** I know we just asked but Trump is back in Vegas and with just four days left in this election and polls as close as they are right now, we cannot afford to get outspent now.Chip In ---  We’re locked in a dead heat where hold over the House, the Senate, and thePresidency are on the line here in Nevada.This is the most consequential election in modern history and our votes willdecide the future of reproductive freedom, our democracy, and more.We cannot thank you enough for being with us, friend.LFG, Hilary Nevada is a critical battleground state for Democrats to keep the Senate andWhite House in 2024. Unlike Republicans with their war chest full of darkmoney, we rely on grassroots supporters for the resources needed to win. --- | Contribute --- Make it Monthly  ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/839/original/NVDP-Misc-Footer-Image_MerchPromo.png) ![Like onFacebook](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/092/711/original/Facebook-Icon.png) ![Follow onTwitter](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/092/714/original/Twitter-Icon.png) ![Follow onInstagram](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/092/713/original/Instagram-Icon.png) --- www.NVDems.com | Paid for by the Nevada State Democratic Party, NVDEMS.com, not authorizedby any candidate or candidate's committee. --- Nevada State Democratic Party 2310 Paseo Del Prado, Suite A120 Las Vegas, NV 89102 | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. To update your email address, change your name or address, or to stop receiving emails from Nevada Democratic Party, please click here.  ---  ![](https://click.actionnetwork.org/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b3/yUGnkhhXTQO3zSXY5PlCjA/ho.gif)

He's running to be a championfor working families and build an economy that benefits everyone. I really need your support right now to help overcomethe gap and supercharge our final GOTV sprint.
