name: Kevin Lincoln
subject: Worried you’re sleeping on this
body: Kevin Lincoln for Congress Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t godown, communities won’t get safer, and government overreach won’t be reeledin. I’m worried you’re sleeping on this, fellow American. Democrats have beenleading in the Generic Congressional Ballot for three months now, meaning moreAmericans would rather send a Democrat to represent them in Congress than aRepublican. We can take back the White House and the Senate, but if we losethe House – which we only hold by a handful of seats –we can’t get anythingdone. Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t go down, communities won’tget safer, and government overreach won’t be reeled in. That’s why yoursupport for Republican victories in target battleground seats is so critical.We can’t miss out on real chances to flip vulnerable Democrat-held seats likethis one in CA-9. SEND A MARINE TO CONGRESS ➞ I’m fighting tooth and naildown the home stretch, and I need your help to close the deal. As a MarineCorps veteran, former pastor, and current Mayor, I’m ready to bring serviceand leadership to Congress to get our country back on track. But I need yourhelp. Don’t sleep on this. Flip this seat, protect our Republican HouseMajority, and secure the future of our country by chipping in to support mycampaign today. For America, Kevin Lincoln Veteran, USMC SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Meet Kevin Lincoln My name is Kevin Lincoln, and my story, is theValley’s story. I am a 3rd generation Stocktonian, raising a 4th generation inthe city I love. I’m the grandson of Mexican immigrants, and my stepfather isan Army veteran. Like many Stocktonians, my family has overcome economicsetbacks. My own father struggled to survive on these streets, and was at onetime, homeless. But I never let adversity define me. I joined the Marines andserved in the White House Military Office, assigned to Marine One. I graduatedcollege while working full-time and raising a family. I’ve worked in corporateAmerica and served our community as a pastor, and as a non-profit leader. I’mblessed with a beautiful wife, Bonnie, and two amazing children. I’ve lived alife of service, but the greatest honor of my life has been giving back to mycommunity, through serving as Mayor of my hometown, Stockton. SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Like, Follow, and Subscribe! Kevin Lincoln is a former member ofthe U.S. Marine Corps. Use of his military rank, job titles, and photographsin uniform does not imply endorsement by the Marine Corps or the Department ofDefense. PAID FOR BY KEVIN LINCOLN FOR CONGRESS We'd hate to see you go but ifyou'd like to unsubscribe, click here.

name: Indiana GOP
subject: The Final Push Towards Victory!
body: <> <> Final Push Towards Victory! Friends, We’re in the final push for thiselection! Now is the time to ensure Republicans get out and vote. Our work hasbeen building toward this moment, and every single vote matters in securingvictory. Last week, we celebrated surpassing 400,000 voter contacts, and nowwe’ve hit over 450,000 contacts through door-to-door efforts and phonebanking. Let’s keep this momentum strong through Election Day! Make sure yougo out and vote and bring friends and family with you! On Election Day itself,we encourage everyone to participate in a phone bank with local parties orvolunteers in your area to help make those last-minute contacts. If you wantto help out please reach out to your local party leaders to get involved! ForElection Night, you’re all invited to join us at the JW Marriott as we watchour hard work in action! If you plan to attend, please RSVP toRSVP@indiana.gop . Just a reminder: Election Night will also see the close ofour Bourbon Auction , so please share the link with anyone who may beinterested! The tour has beenfantastic for building excitement and giving our candidates a chance to speakwith Republican Hoosiers across the state. For more information or to RSVP forone of our bus tour stops, please contact Alex Hickner atahickner@indiana.gop. The Indiana Republican Party,along with multiple Republican candidates, are keeping things rolling with thesecond weekend of the 2024 Indiana GOP Freedom and Opportunity bus tour. name: Nella Domenici
subject: Schumer now buying NM
body: Nella for Senate They’re funneling out-of-state dollars into New Mexico to buy up precious advertising time during the final weeks and days before Election Day. Friend. Chuck Schumer and the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee are now jumping into this race to rescue endangered career politician Martin Heinrich. They’re funneling out-of-state dollars into New Mexico to buy up precious advertising time during the final weeks and days before Election Day. They know they were completely caught off guard when I entered this race and have been watching nervously as we’ve gradually caught up to Heinrich in the polls. Now, they can’t stand to sit by any longer and are frantically trying to stop our upward momentum. With New Mexico being one of the smallest states and cheapest media markets in the 2024 fight for the Senate, the money they’ve raised from West and East Coast liberal elites stretches much further here,which means they can do A LOT more damage with much less. But that also means your support goes much further here, and I’m asking you to help rebalance the scales and prevent Schumer and his deep-pocketed allies from buying this election at the last minute. We’ve never been so close to flipping a “safe blue” state, and I need every bit of support you can send down the home stretch. Whether it’s $5 or $500, every dollar donated at this point in the campaign helps us reach and win over undecided voters in this race. Let’s keep up the fight! Nella Domenici Republican for Senate ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Tammy Baldwin
subject: Sacrifices.
body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4435%2E35263%2EbzyJWt ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE Peter, I have a personal story I’d like to share with you. Growing up, I was diagnosed with a serious illness and spent three months in the hospital. When I got better, my grandparents, who raised me, wanted to make sure I was protected in case I got sick again. But they couldn’t find any insurance policies that would cover me in the future. Not from any insurer. Not at any price. That meant my grandparents had to pay for my health care out of pocket, and they had to make significant sacrifices to do so — all because I had a pre-existing condition. I saw my grandparents stay up late at night, worried that I might fall ill again and that they wouldn't be able to afford my care. No one should ever have to go through that. But my story is not unique, Peter, and I knew they weren’t the only ones. That’s why I got into public service. I’m one of 133 million Americans who have the label "pre-existing condition" attached to our care — and before the Affordable Care Act was passed, many of us could be denied coverage. Now, insurance companies can no longer discriminate against someone based on their pre-existing condition. I championed health reform and wrote the amendment to allow young people to stay on their parent’s insurance plan up to age 26. And when I meet with young people across Wisconsin, almost every hand in the room goes up when I ask who is on their parent’s health insurance. So, you can imagine my frustration whenever Republicans attack our health care and threaten protections for folks with pre-existing conditions — including my opponent Eric Hovde, who called my amendment a “stupid idea” and said young people on their parent’s health insurance need to “grow up and move on.” If Eric Hovde flips this seat and secures the Senate majority for Republicans, the ACA will be on the chopping block and countless Americans could find themselves in a place where insurance companies are putting profits over people. That’s not right. And that’s why I need your help to defeat him. [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-nov24.ANyQo7&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241101_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1004&akid;=4435%2E35263%2EbzyJWt ]I’ve fought against Republicans’ efforts to repeal the ACA before, and I won’t back down now. Peter, will you make a donation to my reelection campaign to support my fight to protect and expand access to affordable health care? Your support is critical in this fight.Thank you for standing with us. name: Rebecca Cooke
subject: All gas, no brakes
body: We’re working through the weekend, Peter. I was raised on the values of givingmaximum effort until the very end. My team and I have been all gas and nobrakes owning the ground here in our district, making sure every single voterknows there’s a real option for them on Tuesday. It’s so important that wecontinue working until the polls close to send a message that we have what ittakes to flip this seat blue, like it had been for 26 years. Together, we candeliver for all Wisconsinites. I know we can take back Wisconsin's 3rd at thepolls. From calls, to door knocking, and everything in between, we’re leavingno stone unturned. Will you chip in $3 to boost our final weekend’s GOTVefforts? Donate >>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cooke-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-aThank you, Peter. name: Brianna
subject: I would love to see your “I voted 🇺🇸” sticker
body: Peter, One of my favorite parts of election season is running into someone whois wearing their “I voted” sticker. If I’m in the grocery store and catch aglimpse of a fellow shopper with a sticker, I’ll give a little thumbs up fromacross the produce section. I’ve even been known to shout, “I like yoursticker!” to a stranger as they pass on the sidewalk. And, Peter, if I see youout at a bar and you have your sticker on — game over. Next round on me.Voting feels good — we should celebrate our democracy. But right now, we alsohave to do everything we can to PROTECT it. And this year that means more thanjust voting. Extreme MAGA Republicans pose a critical threat to our democracy.They are actively undermining redistricting reforms, electing ElectionDeniers, and threatening mid-decade map redraws. Please make a donation todayto the NDRC to help protect fair maps, combat ongoing gerrymandering, andprepare for upcoming redistricting battles.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_IVotedSticker_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-IVotedSticker_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-IVotedSticker_&utm;_campaign=IVotedSticker] I believe, as I know you do,that this democracy is worth standing up for. Thanks so much, Brianna BriannaShamsuddoha Director of Mobilization P.S. In my home state of Michigan, it’sthe first ever presidential election with early voting. You know what thismeans: More Michiganders voting!! AND EXTRA DAYS OF STICKERS! And this year,the Michigan Department of State hosted a sticker design contest. The winningdesigns are AMAZING and are being handed out at early vote locations acrossthe state. Search for them online — the wolf is my favorite. (Feeling inspiredby the energy we’re seeing this year? name: Madeleine (via Kristin for Wisconsin)
subject: Why I’m biting my fingernails right now
body: Team – With Election Day now just four days away and our final Get Out TheVote weekend launching tomorrow, there’s a lot going on here at HQ. But that’snot even why I’m reaching out right now – because before then, I have anotherdeadline I’m worried about. In just a few hours I’m hoping to wire some moremoney to re-up our TV ad buys and get Kristin’s message in front of hundredsof thousands of voters before Election Day on Tuesday. I need to ask you tochip in $ to help us out https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241101-ads?amount=&refcode;=KL_ATA_EM_FR_Ads_241101_T1_2, but I wantedto take just a second to explain why and what’s at stake. If your experienceis anything like mine, right now your TV, your phone, everything you’ve got isbeing flooded with ads about the upcoming election. That’s because these adswork – and especially in races like ours, they can make all the difference. Weknow that the elections this year are going to be incredibly close. Thepresidential election and the House alike are neck and neck, and just a fewvotes could be the difference between sending Kristin to Congress to fight forour rights as the first pro-choice OB/GYN to serve, and watching Tony Wied getsworn in in January to help put money in the pockets of his wealthy friends.These final days are a crucial opportunity for us to reach people where theyare – at their homes, on their phones, at work, and everywhere in between –and remind them to get out and vote for Kristin on Tuesday. So I urgently needyour help to make sure I can place this ad buy today. subject: Did you see me on MSNBC?
body: Click here to stop receiving emails about Jon Tester's Senate campaign inMontana from us. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/TH6jNlvmHkWLixoO_CJ0wQ2] Hey —it’s Jon. I did an interview with Lawrence O’Donnell on MSNBC, where we talkedabout Montana’s Senate election.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_tester?refcode=em20241101mid2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=99aae5e1-8b98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_tester?refcode=em20241101mid2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=99aae5e1-8b98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]BeforeI share more, can you make a split donation of any amount to our campaigntoday to help us build resources to turn out the voters we need to win? Agenerous group of donors just agreed to match every donation — but only forthis email.[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_tester?refcode=em20241101mid2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=99aae5e1-8b98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Here’s what I said to Lawrence: I’m in the fight of my life to defendMontana’s Senate seat—and we need more grassroots support to win. It’s nosecret that Mitch McConnell is determined to defeat me. He personallyrecruited a wealthy out-of-stater to run in this race, and his buddies arespending nearly $90 million to smear my record. I hate to say it, but thatspending is working: Polls are tied. Now we have less than three weeks untilMontanans start voting. You can bet Mitch McConnell’s buddies will throweverything but the kitchen sink at us to win this race. I’m working torepresent rural communities and defend our Montana way of life, but I can’t doit alone. If we want to win this race, then our campaign needs moresupport—fast. name: Kamala Harris
subject: Make no mistake, ours is a people-powered campaign. I am relying on your $10 contribution today to win this election and fight for the promise of America.
body: $10. That’s the donation I am asking you to split between my campaign and TimKaine’s campaign. I’ll explain more, but if that is all you need to hear, youcan make a donation at this link below:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala] If you've saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala?express_lane=true&amount;=10]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala?express_lane=true&amount;=50]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala?express_lane=true&amount;=100]DONATE OTHER [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala] In four days,Virginia will decide who they want as their next U.S. Senator and their nextPresident. Ultimately, this election is about two different visions for ournation. One focused on the future . And one focused on the past . Tim Kaineand I believe in a future where every person has the opportunity not just toget by, but to get ahead. Where no child has to grow up in poverty. Whereevery worker has the freedom to join a union. Where every person hasaffordable health care, child care, and paid leave. Where every senior canretire with dignity. But Donald Trump and his extremist Republican allies wantto take our country backward. They intend to cut Social Security and Medicare,to give tax breaks to billionaires and big corporations and to make workingfamilies foot the bill, and end the Affordable Care Act. America has triedthese failed policies before. We are not going back. Generations of Americansbefore us led the fight for freedom. Now, the baton is in our hands. Toprotect the right to vote. To get assault weapons off of our streets. Torestore reproductive freedom, reversing Donald Trump's extreme abortion bans.Tim Kaine has spent his entire career fighting to improve the lives ofeveryday Virginians, and he knows there is more to be done. If you are readyto join us in the fight for freedom and opportunity for all, please split adonation of $10 to our campaigns. Because when we fight, we win.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala] Thank you and take care,Kamala Kamala Harris Vice President of the United Stateshttps://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala] CONTRIBUTE[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-kamala] Paid for by Kaine forVirginia Kaine for Virginia P.O. name: John Sarbanes
subject: Sarah will be a champion for Maryland
body: I am proud to endorse Sarah Elfreth to represent Maryland’s 3rd CongressionalDistrict. CONTRIBUTE (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-sefc-q4-2024-em?refcode=BLU_EM_SEFC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=25) For years, I’vebeen impressed with Sarah’s relentless and effective leadership on the issuesthat matter most to our constituents. From working tirelessly to restore andprotect the Chesapeake Bay to delivering historic investments to Marylandclassrooms and students, Sarah has always fought to give our communities thetools they need to succeed in a dynamic economy. And with your public declaration of support before I step off that stage,we’ll put an _**END to Kamala’s campaign!**_ **So with 4 days left I need to know: ARE YOU ENDORSING DONALD J. body: Please: If there was EVER a time to pitch in a few bucks before an election,it's right here and right now. This election is too close to call. KimberlyGuilfoyle asked. Sean Spicer asked. Sarah Huckabee Sanders asked. Now we'refollowing up ONE LAST TIME because our final deadline is just hours away – andaccording to the latest FEC reports, Conservatives got annihilated infundraising! She cut a $15 million check to destroy down-ballotConservatives. Now we’re facing our final monthly deadline and we’re coming upshort. The Democrats are so close to winning enough battleground races to takecomplete control of our country. We’re fighting back with everything we’ve gotbut we desperately need your help. YOUR SUPPORT will help keep our ads on theairwaves. YOUR SUPPORT will send emergency resources to key swing states.YOUR SUPPORT will make the difference between victory and defeat. Please: Ifthere was EVER a time to pitch in a few bucks before an election, it's righthere and right now. This election is too close to call. As of now, the futureof America relies on Patriots like you stepping up before the deadline. Thefinal cutoff is closing in. We’re trailing dangerously behind. But you canhelp save the day as long as you step up now. Last Call: Please Donate Here >>Thanks for all you do, Official Republican Communication It's House MajorityLeader Steve Scalise. name: Tony Vargas
subject: my heart just sank
body: Ireceived an emergency phone call that made my heart sink. Kevin McCarthyjetted into Nebraska to pick up a massive campaign check and swiftly sabotagemy chances of unseating Don Bacon. I’ll repeat that: Unless I can respondASAP, our chance to kick Don Bacon out of office and win back the House forDemocrats will be ripped away in an instant.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tvargas2024-email?amount=15&amounts;=15,50,100,250]I hate to alarm you, but if I get buried under McCarthy’s cash, my chance towin could be over. I refuse to let MAGA Republicans buy Bacon another term inpower. But I only have until 11:59pm today to raise $1,500 to counter theirattacks. So I’m asking: Is there any way I could count on your immediate $15to rescue our historic chance to win this race? I have never needed your helpmore than I do in this moment. >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tvargas2024-email?amount=15&amounts;=15,50,100,250]I can’t overstate how important your support is. I’m running an honestgrassroots campaign, and the next 9 hours will determine if I can fight back.But at this very moment, McCarthy is single handedly buying Bacon’s way tovictory. If I can’t fight back against this MAGA cash -- and fast -- my chanceof flipping this seat and defeating Bacon will evaporate. Thisfight is personal. The American Dream made Tony’s story possible. He refusesto sit on the sidelines while others struggle to achieve the same dream. Thisfight is also high stakes. name: Jon Tester
subject: You don’t need ten fingers to know right from wrong.
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/losecruz_emailjune?amount=25[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/losecruz_emailjune?amount=25] Team—it’sJon. Can I have a moment of your time? It’s important. Voting has alreadystarted in Montana—and there are just days until Election Day. This is it.Make a split donation of $10 or more before midnight -- between my campaignand Lose Cruz -- to help me fight back against Mitch McConnell’s attacks,reach as many Montana voters as we can, and win this race.[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/losecruz_2024-tester] When I was a kid, Ilost three fingers on my left hand in a meat grinding accident in my family’sbutcher shop. I don’t even remember putting my hand in there— but I can damnsure remember pulling it out. But here’s the truth: You don’t need ten fingersto know right from wrong. My multimillionaire opponent Tim Sheehy is wrong forMontana. He wants to return health care to “pure privatization”, rip awaywomen’s freedom to choose, and transfer off our public lands. Tim Sheehy is arich out-of-stater who doesn’t know the first thing about Montana values. Buthe’s already dropped $2.5 million of his personal wealth to defeat me, andthis race is too close for comfort. Election Day is almost here, and I needyour help to fight back against his attacks. Split any amount now -- betweenmy campaign and Lose Cruz -- to help me continue defending our Montana way oflife >> [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/losecruz_2024-tester] Thanks forreading. 🤙 Jon http://secure.actblue.com/donate/losecruz_2024-tester[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/losecruz_2024-tester] LoseCruz Be sure tofollow us! name: Tim Sheehy
subject: We’re getting pummeled
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it isnow costing our campaign $309 to reach a single registered voter. FellowConservative, If the most recent poll released over the weekend is to bebelieved, more than 23,000 voters in Montana have yet to decide whether theywill support me or my opponent, Democrat Jon Tester. With just four days leftin the race, we’re running out of time to reach these folks before they casttheir ballots. And that is not good news for us.In 2006, Jon Tester won hisfirst race by just 3,562 votes; trust me when I tell you that every votematters. With the Senate majority on the line, our need for further assistanceis immediate and as urgent as it gets. HELP ME REACH EVER LAST UNDECIDEDVOTER→ Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it is now costing ourcampaign $309 to reach a single registered voter.That means if we want toreach every last of Montana's 23,000+ undecided voters, we need to raise anadditional $7 million. When I tell you that every dollar counts, you know Igenuinely mean it. When I tell you that this race will come down to the lastvote, now you know I genuinely mean it. Please, can you help me get across thefinish line with a gift of $1, $5, $25, $75 or even $1,000 today. HELP MEREACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ For America's Future, Tim Sheehy Former NavySEAL Republican Candidate for U.S. Senate CHIP IN TODAY “ "I SERVED AS A NAVYSEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICACREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING ANDFEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FORTHE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOTPOLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA TimSheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense.

name: Abigail Spanberger
subject: Trump will be in Virginia tomorrow
body: Peter, Donald Trump plans to host a rally in Virginia tomorrow – one of hislast big rallies ahead of Election Day. With just days to go, he’s not lettingup, and he is continuing to say that Virginia is in play this November.However, if the 2023 Virginia elections taught us anything, it’s thatVirginians are rejecting extremism and want leaders who can bring peopletogether to get things done. They’re tired of the division. We’ve seen what aTrump presidency looks like – chaos, dysfunction, and attacks on ourdemocracy. He led assaults on voting rights, successfully overturned Roe v.Wade, trusted the word of Vladimir Putin over the reports of U.S. intelligenceofficials, and falsely claimed that the 2020 election was stolen. Will youcontribute to my campaign for Governor and help us send a strong messagebefore Trump lands here tomorrow that Virginia won’t stand for his extremeagenda? name: Jane Fonda
subject: I’m back from the road with a special thank you.
body: Hi — After weeks of traveling across the country — fundraising for VicePresident Kamala Harris, rallying support for our JanePAC-endorsed climatechampions, and speaking to voters about what’s truly at stake in this election— I’m finally back home in California, just in time for the final stretch. Onthe ground this past month, I met people who are fired up and ready to electleaders who are prepared to use every power available to address the climatecrisis. Every state brought unforgettable moments, each one a reminder thatour future is worth fighting for. In Washington State, I joined volunteersfighting a Big Oil-backed initiative that could strip away crucialenvironmental protections. In the battleground state of Arizona, I went door-to-door to support candidates for local office and reminded folks what’s atstake if Donald Trump and his allies down-ballot win. And in Michigan, Italked to voters face-to-face and shared a hug with a woman who answered thedoor with tears in her eyes. We talked about why this election matters sodeeply, and it reminded me exactly why I’m in this fight. The hope and energyout there are real, and it’s kept me going through this whirlwind electionseason. YOU have kept me going. As a small way of saying thank you, I’d liketo send a couple of signed postcards from my journey after Election Day. Ifyou can chip in to this email — even just $5 — you might find one in yourmailbox as a token of my gratitude. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email-postcard?amount=5] If you've saved your payment information withActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: DONATE $5[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email-postcard?express_lane=true&amount;=5] DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email-postcard?express_lane=true&amount;=25] DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email-postcard?express_lane=true&amount;=50] DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email-postcard?express_lane=true&amount;=100] DONATE $250[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email-postcard?express_lane=true&amount;=250] OTHER AMOUNT[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email-postcard] Onward, Jane FondaP.S. – Not able to chip in right now? name: Jonathan Nez
subject: Don’t let big money silence us
body: Hi Peter, With just days to go, Eli Crane’s billionaire allies are pouringmoney into attack ads, blanketing the airwaves with misleading claims about meand our movement. If we get outspent now, we’re at real risk of falling behind— and we’re counting on you to help us keep pace. Today, I’m asking you tohelp us stand up to the dark money flooding our district by chipping in $25 orwhatever you can to keep our ad on the air. name: Colin Allred
subject: Ouch!!
body: Friend, I've taken some big hits before – and I've got a plate and two screwsin my neck from my time in the NFL to prove it. But falling short of my$500,000 daily fundraising goal in what is turning out to be the bestopportunity to fire Ted Cruz also hurts. Right now, we have a chance to makesure Ted Cruz takes the biggest hit of his career – and create massive changein Texas and across the country – but I can't do it without your help. name: Hung Cao
subject: The end of the road
body: Fellow Patriot, I’m afraid we could be at the end of the road. I don’t mean tobe too negative, but Tim Kaine has a MASSIVE war chest, and I just don’t knowif we can overcome it. This is CAPT Hung Cao. I’m not a career politician likeTim Kaine. I’m a husband, a father, and a 25-year combat Naval Captain. I’malso running for Senate in what could be the biggest political upset inVirginia’s history I’m running against a 30+ year incumbent who has spent hisentire life serving Washington's special interests. Let’s just cut to thechase: I can’t do this alone. Can you pitch in to support my campaign? PITCHIN NOW I won’t lie, this is going to be an uphill battle, but I know thatwith you on our A-Team we can win this seat and take back the Senate. Our teamis gearing up for the upset of the century, and we want YOU to be a part ofit.Please, will you pitch in now to make sure we have the resources we need towin? SAVE OUR COUNTRY My wife and I are raising our children to grow up intohonest men and women, so you can trust that I’ll keep my promise to put ourCommonwealth and our country first in everything I do. In Liberty, CAPT HungCao USN (Ret) Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, jobtitles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense. name: Jon Tester
subject: Why I’m asking for $12 today
body: Folks, I have a big favor to ask: Will you make a split donation of $12 (theprice of one of my signature flat-top haircuts) between my campaign andSherrod Brown's to help us reach 50,000 grassroots donations before ourmidnight deadlines? Montana’s Senate race will be won by a handful of votes,and my team needs even more resources to stand up to the millions of dollarsoutside groups are throwing my way.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sb4tester?refcode=jtk3571-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thousands of folks have chipped in since welaunched this campaign. And whether you’ve given $5, $50, or $500, I couldn’tbe more grateful to have your support. Your donation helps us show pundits andmy opponent that we have grassroots momentum on our side. Trust me, I know howfar a few bucks can go: My flat-top haircut costs just $12. In allseriousness, we’ve got our work cut out for us. Outside groups are spending upa storm to defeat me. My multimillionaire opponent has already cut hiscampaign $2.6 million from his own wallet. And virtually every election expertranks this race a toss-up. It would mean a lot to have your support in thisrace, because every donation goes a long way – even $12. So, will you split$12 or more to help us reach our goal so I can bring this race home? We’ve gotonly four days until the election, so let’s get it done.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sb4tester?refcode=jtk3571-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thanks for your support. – Jon -------- Thisemail was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: weekend update
body: | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/Xa2dbb79e-f940-450b-9e8e-79e696070381/368d17ff-e836-4168-8049-c5f0900fbbf9) | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/a2dbb79e-f940-450b-9e8e-79e696070381/a638be21-8513-42b1-9bfc-5f974022c80e.png) --- | | | | |  --- | _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes andDemocratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for ourdemocracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish tohear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- |![](https://default.salsalabs.org/a2dbb79e-f940-450b-9e8e-79e696070381/a723711d-f191-4057-ba9a-2cf352ca1e21.png)Peter let's get one thing straight: The comments made about Puerto Rico atDonald Trump's rally this weekend were NOT a joke. They were racist,insulting, and entirely unacceptable. Ya no mas. Any person or party whoespouses this kind of vile rhetoric against other humans — let alone citizensof the United States — is unfit to run the White House. And anyone who wouldtie themselves so closely to a candidate who does, like Rick Scott, has nobusiness in any position of power — especially in Florida. Please split $15 ormore between Blue Amp Action now to help me reach my $10 million end-of-monthgoal and build the resources to retire him from the Senate. --- | | DONATE → --- | And what's more, Peter, is that they know full-well that what they're doingis wrong — and they're terrified of facing the consequences. How am I so sure?Well, when I went to vote yesterday, I had the displeasure of running intoRick Scott myself, as he rallied Miami Republicans in a misguided attempt totry and intimidate me for social media clicks. As soon as he saw me there, hesped off in his chauffeured getaway car. Disappointing? Yes. Surprising?Hardly. It's just who he, Donald Trump, and the GOP are: Bigots, cowards, andlosers. First, Rick took a note out of Trump's playbook when he refused todebate me. Then, he comes to my home district and doesn't even have thecourage to face me, not to mention answer for his puppet-master's despicableattitudes. Now, he's panicking, and desperately trying to placate Florida'slarge Puerto Rican population, whose votes he's courting to win and stay inpower. The best way he could earn our forgiveness now is by leaving my peoplein peace, starting by staying out of politics entirely. Sadly, cowards likehim don't have the decency to do the right thing and leave us be. But with themassive fortune he used to buy the 2018 election, he won't leave without agroundswell of Florida voters saying ya no mas, too. And with just 4 days leftin this race, I won't galvanize the movement to unseat him if I can't make mycrucial $10 million goal by midnight on Thursday. In short, I can't bring himto account at the ballot box on Election Day without your grassroots support,tonight. Will you please rush $15, or anything you can spare to split withBlue Amp Action and help me flip Florida blue, retire Rick Scott, and stop theGOP's hatred from getting ahold of the Senate majority? --- | | DONATE → --- | --- | | | Let's get this done. Debbie --- | | |  --- | | |  --- | --- | | |  --- | | | | |  --- | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/a2dbb79e-f940-450b-9e8e-79e696070381/bdd7c5f5-7de1-4347-b64e-b4284329efec.png) | Cliff Schecter President, Blue Amp Action Amplify Good  ---|--- | | |  --- | | Follow Us | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_twitter2.png) | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_linkedin.png) ---|---  | **Blue Amp Action PAC** PO Box 8384, Cincinnati, OH 45208 --- | Having trouble viewing this email? View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | | Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

name: Sam
subject: Beth’s trigger finger
body: While our campaign is out talking to voters, Beth Van Duyne has been tweeting.Beth Van Duyne tweet with picture of her holding a gun - "This entire whitedudes for Harris thing cracks me up. I have more testosterone in my triggerfinger than Tim Walz has in his whole body" DONATE(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-sec-q4-2024-em?refcode=BLU_EM_SEC_2024-11-01_3&amount;=25) Pandering to MAGARepublicans, Beth Van Duyne took a picture of her posing with an assaultweapon. This is what Beth is best at. Instead of getting things done forTexas, Beth Van Duyne has been tweeting and pulling far-right stunts. We needa new generation of leadership in Congress. I will put aside partisanpolitical games to get things done for North Texas. Can you donate right nowto end Beth Van Duyne’s career in Congress? name: Derek Tran
subject: Here's a reminder of why we’re in this race.
body: This race has not been easy. We have had to fight tooth and nail againstattacks from outside money like Elon Musk and Mike Johnson’s far-right PAC. Myteam is fending off attacks and racing to reach voters before Election Daythis week . But here is the thing: I’m in this race for families like yoursand mine. I’m in this race to protect democracy and reproductive freedoms. I’mfighting to lower prices and make healthcare affordable for families likeyours. I’m running to put people over politics. I’m in this because I knowCA-45 deserves better than Michelle Steel. With four days until Election Day,it’s important to remember why we are fighting – and to double down ourefforts in this final stretch. So, friend, will you help me stay in thisfight? name: Letitia James
subject: "Speaker Hakeem Jeffries" has a nice ring to it!
body: Peter, we're facing a critical moment for New York – and for the entirecountry. With Election Day just FOUR DAYS AWAY, the stakes have never beenhigher. While I'm fighting hard to keep our state safe from far-rightextremism, we need progressive leaders in Congress to help me protecteverything we stand for. That's why I'm asking you to split a donation betweenmy campaign and Jobs Education and Families First (JEFF PAC) today.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/james-for-ny-24-jeffries-pac?refcode=jtk1713-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Right now, HakeemJeffries and his Democratic colleagues are fighting to take back the House andsecure a blue majority, which will require winning in a number of highlycompetitive districts in New York. Just imagine the impact of having HakeemJeffries as our next speaker of the House, leading the charge for real changefor all of us. But to make that happen, he needs progressive champions like mefighting alongside him – and fearless fighters like you, Peter. With extremistRepublicans trying to chip away at our rights, New York must remain astronghold for our shared values. Hakeem and I are fighting to make sure everyNew Yorker and American has that, but we need you by our side if we're goingto succeed. So will you split a donation between my campaign and JobsEducation and Families First (JEFF PAC) before midnight to help us protect NewYork and flip the House blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/james-for-ny-24-jeffries-pac?refcode=jtk1713-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Together, we can build abetter New York. name: Pramila Jayapal
subject: A moment of light and possibility 🎇
body: [https://act.pramilaforcongress.com/go/892?refcode=em20241101-4478-footer&t;=1001&akid;=4478%2E420207%2EstGsbt]Pramila Jayapal Peter, This week, South Asians across the world arecelebrating Diwali, a festival that speaks to the deepest hopes of ourcommunity. Also known as the Festival of Lights, it’s a moment ofillumination, of connection, and of profound possibility. And this year, itjust so happens to coincide with an election in which we’ll have the chance toelect the first-ever South Asian as President of the United States. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-4478&refcode2;=4478_420207_stGsbt&akid;=4478%2E420207%2EstGsbt][IMG] On election night in 2016, Kamala Harris and I broke barriers together.I became the first South Asian woman ever elected to the House ofRepresentatives, and she became the first South Asian woman ever elected tothe Senate. Now we stand at the brink of an even more transformative moment.It’s not just a political milestone. It's a testament to the journey ofgenerations of people who have worked, dreamed, and persevered to get us tothis moment. Our community's story is one of resilience — of voices thatrefuse to be dimmed and of traditions that continue to shine brightly acrosscontinents. We see this in the vibrant celebrations happening in homes andcommunities across the nation. In the glow of clay lamps, in the warmth ofshared meals, in the sparkle of joy that connects us. To our diverse SouthAsian community — Hindus, Muslims, Sikhs, Christians, Jains — this is a momentto honor our collective strength. To recognize the challenges we face, thefears that sometimes shadow our experiences, and also the power we have touplift, to support, and to create meaningful change. As we gather with familyand friends, let us recommit ourselves to a future of true belonging. Whereevery voice matters, where every story is heard, where our collective lightcan transform our shared landscape. [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-4478amount=3&refcode2;=4478_420207_stGsbt&akid;=4478%2E420207%2EstGsbt]If you’re with us in the fight to build that future, consider splitting adonation between my campaign and Kamala Harris today. We need your support toget out the vote and elect the first South Asian president on Tuesday. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-20241101-2?amount=3&refcode;=em20241101-4478&refcode2;=4478_420207_stGsbt&akid;=4478%2E420207%2EstGsbt]Contribute From my home to yours, Happy Diwali, Peter. With hope andsolidarity, Pramila Jayapal Contribute to Pramila Jayapal:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-footer?refcode=em20241101-4478-footer&t;=1002&refcode2;=4478_420207_stGsbt&akid;=4478%2E420207%2EstGsbtThis email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is the most important wayfor us to reach you about opportunities to get involved. If you need to removeyourself from our email list, click here to unsubscribe: You can unsubscribefrom this mailing list at any time:http://act.pramilaforcongress.com/cms/unsubscribe/unsubscribe/?akid=4478%2E420207%2EstGsbtPaid for by Pramila for Congress.

Exercising your right to vote is the cornerstone of ourdemocracy, and being involved in the democratic process at every level isequally important. I know your contributions to this election extend farbeyond just casting a ballot, which is why I want to extend my heartfeltgratitude to all the volunteers, supporters, and donors who have powered ourcampaign. To put all this hard work into perspective, just last week, Idelivered over 7,000 handwritten postcards to the post office, and in total,our campaign has sent out more than 50,000 hand-addressed letters andpostcards. Reflecting back, I am truly inspired by the remarkable supportwe’ve received from Republicans, Democrats, and Independents as I seek torepresent all of us in District 28. https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saHave A Plan To Vote Be sure to verify your polling location by clicking thebutton below. If you have a completed mail in ballot be sure you deliver it tothe County Office Building (542 Forbes Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15219) before 8:00PM on November 5th. POLL FINDER(https://www.pavoterservices.pa.gov/Pages/PollingPlaceInfo.aspx) Help onElection Day We have 26 polling locations open for 13 hours each day (from 7AM to 8 PM). If you can spare a few hours to distribute campaign information,please reply to this email, and we’ll coordinate a convenient time and placefor you. https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saPick Up Your Election Day Supplies If you’ve signed up to assist on ElectionDay, please stop by the Republican office to collect your instructions,supplies, and a Shaffer T-shirt. Our office is located at 120 Church Rd,Wexford, PA 15090, and will be open during the following hours: ● Friday(11/1): 3 PM - 6 PM ● Saturday (11/2): 1 PM - 9 PM ● Sunday (11/3): 2 PM - 9PM ● Monday (11/4): 11 AM - 8 PM If you are unable to pick up your items,we’re happy to deliver them to you. Just call or text Connor McDonald at724-355-2045. Election Night Celebration: Join us for our Election Night Partyat the North Park Clubhouse, starting at 8:30 PM after the polls close onTuesday. The clubhouse is located on Route 8, across from Richland Mall (nearShop ‘N Save/Kohl’s) at 5301 Ranalli Rd, Gibsonia, PA 15044. If you plan toattend, please reply to this email to assist us with our planning.https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saThank you once again for your incredible support. name: Team Grothman
subject: How will you remember 2024?
body: Friend, In January of next year, you will either be looking back with joy -knowing that you helped push Republican candidates across the finish line - orwith regret that you sat on the sidelines for our nation's most crucialelection in a generation. This is our final weekend before Election Day. Ourvolunteers will be out in full force. Can Glenn count on you to donate just $5to help us k nock on doors, make last-minute phone calls, and contact as manyswing voters as we can this weekend? Every single swing voter contacted couldbe the one that helps President Trump and Republicans up and down the ballotwin. Thank you in advance for your support. Team Grothman P.S. President Trumpand Kamala Harris are deadlocked in the polls. If you can't donate even $5 dueto Joe Biden's awful economy -will you consider even a $1 donation by clickinghere? Box 1215 Fond du Lac, WI 54936 You arereceiving this email because you expressed an interest in Glenn Grothman.Click here to unsubscribe. Paid for by Glenn Grothman for Congress

name: Tim Walz
subject: Let’s leave it all out on the field
body: Folks, this is Tim Walz. I couldn't be prouder to be on this ticket and tohelp make Kamala Harris the next president of the United States. There’s a lotmore I want to say, but before I continue, I’m hoping you’ll split acontribution between Tina Smith and our campaign today. With just four daysleft in this election, we need to leave it all out on the field. Everycontribution will make a huge difference.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?email=dpwillis67@gmail.com]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your splitdonation to Tina Smith and the Harris-Walz campaign will go throughimmediately: CHIP IN $10 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?express_lane=true&amount;=10&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com] CHIP IN $25NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?express_lane=true&amount;=25&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com] CHIP IN $50NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?express_lane=true&amount;=50&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com] CHIP IN$100 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?express_lane=true&amount;=100&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com] CHIP IN$250 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?express_lane=true&amount;=250&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com] ANOTHERAMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?email=dpwillis67@gmail.com] Growing up in a small town like Butte,Nebraska, you learn to take care of each other. The family down the road maynot think, pray, or love like you, but they are your neighbors and you lookout for them. Now we know that Donald Trump, JD Vance, and MAGA Republicanshave a different vision of America. When they talk about freedom they mean thegovernment should have the freedom to invade every corner of our life. Take itfrom a small-town guy: they know nothing about what working people need.That's not what we do in Minnesota. We don’t attack our neighbors’ rights. Wewelcome everyone in, and we lift each other up. My friend Tina Smithunderstands this. And she works hard every day to ensure Minnesotans’ voicesare heard in the United States Senate. That’s what this campaign is about:working together to build a future where everyone has the opportunity not justto get by, but to get ahead. Where workers come first, health care and housingare human rights, and the government stays the hell out of your bedroom. Butwe need you in this fight with us. Will you split a donation of $10, orwhatever works for you right now, between Tina Smith and our campaign so wecan continue working together and defend our values up and down the ballot inNovember? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24?email=dpwillis67@gmail.com&amount;=10] Four days to go. Let’s leaveit all on the field. Tim Walz Governor, Minnesotahttps://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tsm-em-harris24]___________________________ Paid for by Tina Smith for Minnesota Tina Smithfor Minnesota PO Box 14362 St. Paul, MN 55114 United States unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/waoR0e7lX0uLW5LEbBO87Q2?unsubscribedata=jcSOCrNuNWmPUV%2Fmf06H5VlrrW32DF1ToSBJf4ZRKRvquoqy9Ib%2BSLG3s2FEN3MQgb4Kd7YWz2yCT1drBHNPYbzI7GWFrKX%2Fv81BD4%2B9qOBQBtiOG%2Fixd9TcHz6CM5fEUMAzHKGvmKd9OI%2FvTIo4Ce5tYFF7yn5p9F2yGG8V8alHZIpdOF2pCyacYb%2FjpqhGH7PDB5PKgVH19VeXUzHaLOuRBic6hb%2Bcve7omQKqabeMT6uBfnFLn0NoAm%2BD9RCa2M7pb1ctFd0Hj3PRd3gm62g1UWJPXzu0%2F2ldFzsH5XL4mLvRGGUMNhpFvMG%2FEh%2FYqRhd4r6sOi8R3ei8GaznN%2F2T0nW7F063NxGXGXd%2F%2BzsVDzScdxC2xJ1dCvg0D68stA21uuLoWTxiSjk1DMeOJ%2BloYoUU7xNeUFDZD%2BSx60s%3DContributions or gifts to Tina Smith for Minnesota are not tax-deductible.Privacy Policy [https://tinaforminnesota.com/privacy/]

name: Ballot Confirmation Audit
subject: Just 4 days – that’s ALL we’ve got until the election
body: Confirm your ballot >> How many days left do we have, Peter? Just 4 days –that’s ALL we’ve got until the election. name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: yes, it really is *that bad*
body: I barely slept a wink last night, friend. Yesterday evening, my finance director called me up for an emergency meeting — and yes, the news really was *that bad*: We fell short of our $10 MILLION end-of-October goal. The only way we change that is by raising $894,208 over the next two days — and since voters head to the polls in just four days, closing that gap is non-negotiable. Will you please split $10 or more now between my campaign and Kirsten Gillibrand's to ensure I have the resources to flip Florida blue? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_dmp?refcode=jtk5613-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 With the Democrats' razor-thin Senate majority at stake, NBC News and The Washington Post both confirm that all eyes really are on my race to flip Florida blue. And thanks to your support so far, I've steadily chipped away at Rick Scott's dwindling lead, to the point where polls show this race is statistically TIED. But Rick Scott and his corporate special interests have realized they can no longer take this race for granted. Now that they're scared, they're outspending us nearly 3-to-1 on MASSIVE ad buys attacking me across the Florida airwaves. So we have to fight back against this sudden swell of pro-Scott spending and ensure our people-powered message reaches as many voters as possible in this final stretch to Election Day. Rick Scott can tap his massive personal fortune to pull out all the stops in Florida's insanely expensive media market. But unlike him, I'm running a people-powered campaign — and according to my finance director, we won't have the funds to fight back without a SURGE of grassroots support tonight to make up the projected shortfall. Now more than ever, friend, I need your help: Will you please split $10, $25, or anything you can spare right now between my campaign and Kirsten Gillibrand's? I can't get back on track to retire Rick Scott and keep the Senate majority blue without you. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_dmp?refcode=jtk5613-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 I'm so grateful I can count on supporters like you — thank you. name: Mucarsel-Powell, Debbie
subject: unstoppable
body: Friend, we are on the cusp of achieving one of the greatest upsets in Americanpolitical history: defeating Rick Scott, flipping Florida blue, and sendingonly the second-ever Latina to the U.S. Senate. None of this would be possiblewithout you, friend. Thank you. The grassroots movement we've built isunstoppable — and you can see our momentum just about everywhere. FormerPresident Barack Obama announced his support for my campaign (you can watchthat ad here, by the way!), and I couldn't be more humbled to have hisendorsement.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gclfhK7FfB8&t;=6s&refcode;=jtk2465-fr-text Wehave to elect Debbie Mucarsel-Powelll to the U.S. Senate.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2465-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250&express;_lane=true I was also featured in Ellemagazine. You can check out their piece on my candidacy, and how the fight forabortion care in Florida is central to this year's election, here.https://www.elle.com/culture/career-politics/a62267372/debbie-mucarsel-powell-florida-senate-race-abortion-interview-2024/?refcode=jtk2465-fr-text Will thefight for abortion care help Debbie Mucarsel-Powell win in Florida?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2465-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250&express;_lane=true I've also been hitting theairwaves across cable news, speaking directly to Floridians and the Americanpeople about how Rick Scott has failed us and how this is our single greatestopportunity to send him packing. I am now one point behind Rick Scott—we canwin this race, but I need everyone. And then, what political pundits wouldhave thought impossible only a year ago happened: A poll showed us just asingle point behind Rick Scott, and Democratic leadership — the DSCC and theDNC — rushed investments into Florida to help us pull ahead and win! But RickScott is doing what Rick Scott always does: spending from his own fraudulentlymade fortune to cling to power. He's so terrified by our momentum that hedropped a staggering $10 MILLION on TV ads against me. $10 million at the dropof a hat, friend. In the final days of this race, it's never been more clearthat we can win in Florida and pull off one of the greatest political upsetsof all time. But it's this grassroots movement — including you, friend —against Rick Scott's millions. That's why I'm counting on you and the rest ofthis team to help me raise $4 MILLION before my LAST fundraising deadlineahead of Election Day. Please rush a donation of $5, or whatever you canspare, right now to help me fight back against Rick Scott's attack ads, win inFlorida, and protect our Democratic Senate majority! We are within strikingdistance, and your immediate support will make all the difference in ourability to pull ahead and win.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2465-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250&express;_lane=true Thank you, friend, for yourunwavering support in this race. — Debbie -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Shawnna Bolick
subject: Have you voted?
body: http://www.BolickforArizona.com?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID Dear FreedomFighters, As you can imagine, I am ready for November 5th to be here-- it'sless than 4 days away. The Bolick Brigade has put in the time and we know ourhard work is paying off because our targeted voters are returning their earlymail-in ballots. We have been stopping by voter's houses, making phone callsand texting them to return their ballots. In the process, we have beenreminding early voters to take their mail-in ballots to the closest openvoting center or to simply vote in-person between now and Election Day becausethe deadline has passed ensuring timely delivery of early ballot back to thecounty in time to be processed. If you still have an early mail-in ballot youwould like to return, you can still drop it off at an open voting center orplace it inside the nearest drop box. Today, is the last official day of earlyvoting. Under state law, if you need to cast a ballot after today and beforeElection Day, the county has designated a few emergency voting locations(https://elections.maricopa.gov/voting/where-to-vote.html?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID) on November 2nd and 4th betweenthe hours of 9am and 5pm. This year's Arizona ballot is two pages long anddouble-sided(https://youtu.be/EYzM7Ihmz4s?si=Ql3EfHbUoviWkgSP&mc;_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID), so be sure to set aside enough time to research how you will vote beforegoing to the nearest polling location with your ID. If you vote in-person youshould have received a lengthy sample ballot last week. I received my sampleballot last Wednesday in the mail and then I voted early in-person at ASU-Westthe following day. I tracked my ballot. It took two days for Maricopa Countyto receive my ballot and earlier this morning my signature was finallyverified and my ballot was counted. In Maricopa County, the tabulation centeris understaffed by several hundred during early voting according to a localnews report. Maricopa County's ballot processing is working in 24-hour shiftsto get everything tabulated, working around the clock 24/7 due to heavyturnout. If you would like to keep an eye on the Maricopa County ElectionsDepartment you can watch their live feeds(https://elections.maricopa.gov/news-and-information/live-video-feeds.html?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID) showing signature verification,early ballot processing and ballot tabulation. If you live in Maricopa Countyand you still haven't made a plan on where to vote, you can search for alocation HERE (https://elections.maricopa.gov/voting/where-to-vote.html?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID) . If you'd like to help ourcampaign make phone calls or texts to voters, please email my campaign(mailto:info@BolickforArizona.com?subject=I%20can%20call%20or%20text%20voters).(mailto:info@bolickforarizona.com?subject=make%20calls%20or%20texts%20to%20voters)If you'd like to volunteer with us this weekend(mailto:info@BolickforArizona.com?subject=volunteer%20this%20weekend) as wecontinue targeting Election Day voters, we will put you to work. If you havetime to help us electioneer(mailto:info@bolickforarizona.com?subject=help%20us%20electioneer) between nowand Election Day at the polls, let us know. Thanks again for your continuedsupport! Take care, Shawnna Donate (https://secure.anedot.com/vote-bolick-statesenateld2/donate?exitIntent=true&mc;_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID)Volunteer (https://bolickforarizona.com/get-involved?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID)============================================================ ** Twitter(https://twitter.com/ShawnnaLMBolick?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID) **Facebook(https://www.facebook.com/Bolick4Arizona?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID) **Website (https://www.bolickforarizona.com/?mc_cid=9193bbd4cb&mc;_eid=UNIQID)PAID FOR BY VOTE BOLICK. AUTHORIZED BY SHAWNNA BOLICK. Copyright © 2024 VoteBolick, All rights reserved. If you want to mail a donation check, our mailingaddress is: Shawnna Bolick c/o Vote Bolick 610 E. Bell Road 2-142 Phoenix, AZ85022 This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com(mailto:dpwillis67@gmail.com) why did I get this?(https://bolickforarizona.us7.list-manage.com/about?u=3214fdbd528e32d06cf84fc86&id;=5a6e10b8f9&e;=a7ab36849c&c;=9193bbd4cb)unsubscribe from this list (https://bolickforarizona.us7.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=3214fdbd528e32d06cf84fc86&id;=5a6e10b8f9&t;=b&e;=a7ab36849c&c;=9193bbd4cb)update subscription preferences (https://bolickforarizona.us7.list-manage.com/profile?u=3214fdbd528e32d06cf84fc86&id;=5a6e10b8f9&e;=a7ab36849c&c;=9193bbd4cb)Vote Bolick . c/o Shawnna Bolick . 610 E. name: Jon Tester
subject: Brand new poll
body: Can I tell you a story about my family farm, folks?(https://act.protectvoting.org/go/83568?t=1002&akid;=17874%2E878179%2ERFLm4a)In 1910, my grandfather came to Montana. He found a piece of grassy land, tooka look at it, and said, “This is the place.” And that’s where the farm began.He farmed the land until the early 1940s, and then passed it down to my folks.In 1978, my wife Sharla and I took over the farm and we’re still here today,three generations and more than 40 years later. We’ve made a lot of progresshere — Sharla and I built a new home, several steel buildings, and morestorage. The truth is, I love this work. Yes, it makes for early mornings andlate nights during planting and harvest seasons — but it also keeps megrounded, and it gives me perspective on the issues we face every day. When Ithink about climate change, I’m thinking of folks on farms like mine,struggling with catastrophic droughts or historic levels of flooding. When Ithink about reforming the USPS, I’m thinking of the people in ruralcommunities across Montana who rely on timely mail delivery for theirmedication or Social Security checks. And when I think about infrastructure,I’m thinking of the rural towns near mine that need access to affordable,high-speed internet. These aren’t abstract issues or talking points. They’revery real challenges that deserve real solutions, and that’s what I’m fightingfor in Washington. I spend every single day trying to do right by workingfamilies, farmers, students, and veterans here in Montana and across thecountry. I’m running for reelection because there’s still work to be done.Just like my parents and grandparents on the family farm, when I commit tosomething, I see it through. Can you make a split donation of any amount todaybetween my campaign and Voter Protection Project to help me keep up the fightin Washington?(https://act.protectvoting.org/go/83568?t=1003&akid;=17874%2E878179%2ERFLm4a)I’ll leave you with one last truth about farming: Some years you get the rightamount of rain, and things work out really well. Other years, you get a wholelot less. That means it’s important to be prepared for any outcome, and tohave a support system by your side when things get difficult. We don’t knowwhat this campaign will look like, or what Republicans will throw our way overthese final few months. But with your support, we’ll be ready. I appreciateanything you’re able to pitch in. Thanks for your help, and I hope I make youproud. — Jon ------------------ Paid for by Voter Protection Projectwww.protectvoting.org Not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. 401 2nd Ave. S, Ste. 303, Seattle, WA 98104 Click here to requestfewer emails: https://act.protectvoting.org/signup/fewer-emails/?t=1001&akid;=17874%2E878179%2ERFLm4a Click here to unsubscribe:https://act.protectvoting.org/unsubscribe/unsubscribe/?akid=17874%2E878179%2ERFLm4a

subject: Vote for my Grandpa!
body: Peter, Elyssia here! You might not know me, but you probably know my grandpaHung Cao. He’s running for Senate in Virginia, and I’m so so proud of him!Hung is fighting for the American Dream so that I can grow up in a countrywith endless opportunities. name: Sherrod
subject: about this weekend
body: Team, there are just 4 days left until Election Day – which means we need toturn out every voter we possibly can in this final stretch. We have a massiveget-out-the-vote plan for this weekend, but unless we reach our ambitious $3million goal before the Election Day, we'll have to scale back. That's why I'mpersonally asking: Will you chip in $10 now split between my campaign and theOhio Dems to help us reach voters in these critical final days and win thisrace? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/odp-email-240802-brown?amount=10&refcode;=ODP_ATA_EM_FR_Brownsplit_241101_T1_2FiveThirtyEight just reported that Ohio is now the only toss-up in the battlefor Senate control. Here's what that means: - This race is Democrats' onlychance to hold on to the Senate, so Republicans have outspent us 3-to-1 toflip it red. - My opponent's one-point lead is within the margin of error, sothe work we put in between now and Election Day will have a HUGE impact on theoutcome of this race. - Falling short of our $3 million goal could cost usthis seat and the Senate. With all that being said, I need your help. We’rerunning out of time to raise the resources we need to reach undecided votersand defeat my Trump-backed opponent. Every dollar could really make or breakthis fight, so I have to ask: Will you please rush $10 or more to splitbetween my campaign and the Ohio Dems to help us reach our final fundraisinggoal, win in name: Jill Stein for President
subject: New Billboards Design Just In!
body: Peter, Our billboards have been very successful and so many people had greatfeedback on the design that we decided to revamp and redouble the effort.We’ve raised nearly $70,000 of our $100,000 goal and now we have billboardsrunning in 40 key states across the nation including Michigan, California,Texas, Georgia, North Carolina, Florida, Wisconsin, Pennsylvania, Arizona, andNew Hampshire. Peter, so far the money we have committed to billboards hasresulted in 248,000 blips that appear for 8 seconds and over 1,784,000 peoplehave seen them. With just a few days left in the election, if we raise theremaining $30,000 of our goal, we can supercharge this effort with a newcampaign with a new billboard design: The good news is that we can get a newcampaign launched today if everyone who gets this email donates just $2.40 ormore. It will mean that our billboards can reach tens of millions MORE peoplein target states! Time is running out. Please, chip in today: DONATE NOWThank you for your support. Let’s take this fight for people, planet, andpeace over the finish line. The Jill Stein/Butch Ware 2024 Team P.S. Do youhave questions about how to vote for Jill Stein in your state? Simply put, it’s never been moreclear that Raja is exactly the kind of leader we need to keep in Congress.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/raja-email-2024?amount=14] That’s why I’mproud to stand by Raja, Peter. name: Kristin Lyerly
subject: An OB/GYN's take on Project 2025
body: Peter, As a doctor, I choose my words very carefully — the wrong explanationof a procedure or delivery of a diagnosis risks real harm to patients. So knowthat I say this with all sincerity: Project 2025 should make us all afraid. Ifyou haven't heard, Project 2025 is the nearly 1,000-page plan for Republicansto attack our freedoms, wreck our health care, undermine a century ofnonpartisan civil service, and more. I'll explain more — but if you want tostop Project 2025, we need to win WI-08. Will you split a donation between mycampaign and Katrina Christiansen right now? Chip in $15 now >> Chip in $25now >> Chip in $50 now >> Chip in $100 now >> Chip in another amount now >> Ofcourse, as a woman who is an OB/GYN, I immediately went digging for whatProject 2025 would mean for reproductive freedom. What I found is horrifying.Project 2025 would… Create a national abortion database — including creepyinformation like a mother's state of residence, something no politician has aright to know Overrule medical experts at the FDA — Project 2025 would reverseapproval of the abortion pill which the FDA has ruled safe and effective Baneven using the words abortion, gender equality, and reproductive health infederal rules, regulations, and legislation — imagine the impact on things asmonumental as anti-discrimination regulations And MAGA has a plan to make itall happen by firing dedicated civil servants and replacing them with peoplewhose primary qualification is loyalty to Trump. It's disturbing, dangerous,and downright un-American. I'm determined to make sure Project 2025 neverbecomes reality. Will you split a donation between my campaign and KatrinaChristiansen to send me to Congress, where I promise to send it straight tothe trash? Thanks for being a part of this team, Kristin Lyerlyhttps://www.facebook.com/katrinaussenate[https://www.facebook.com/katrinaussenate ]https://www.instagram.com/katrinaforussenate/[https://www.instagram.com/katrinaforussenate/ ] katrinaforussenate.com[https://www.katrinaforussenate.com/] Friends of Katrina Christiansen P.O. Box833 Jamestown, ND 58402 United States Paid for by Friends of KatrinaChristiansen Katrina Christiansen is tired of career politicians who putspecial interest cash above the needs of hardworking families. That’s whyshe’s running for U.S. Senate to ensure no family has to choose between payingfor essential medication and putting food on the table. Katrina doesn’t take apenny of Corporate PAC money, so she’s relying on support from grassrootsdonors to fund her campaign and compete with Republicans’ deep pockets. Willyou chip in any amount before midnight to help Katrina defeat Republicanspecial interests and flip this seat for everyday North Dakotans?
