name: John Thune
subject: All eyes are on Ohio
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate I’ve already transferred $4 million to help folkslike Bernie, but he needs folks like you to step up to take on a 50-yearcareer politician in Sherrod Brown. Peter, I’ve been crisscrossing the countryto do everything I can to help the team get across the finish line this fall.One of my most important stops: campaigning in Ohio with Bernie Moreno.President Trump and a Senate Republican majority will end the disastrousBiden-Harris agenda, but we cannot win a Senate majority without winning inOhio. Will you join me in supporting political outsider, Bernie Moreno?Bernie Moreno is the type of Senator we need in Washington. He’s lived theAmerican dream - and wants to make sure our grandkids have the sameopportunities he had when he came to America at the age of five. He hasn’tmade a career as a Washington insider - just the opposite. He’s anentrepreneur who built a successful business from the ground up. ThisNovember, we’ve got a great map—unlike anything we’ve seen in a fewdecades—and with high-quality candidates like Bernie, I know we can win backthe Republican majority in the Senate. But here’s the bad news, Peter.Democrats like Sherrod Brown are outraising us by millions. I’ve alreadytransferred $4 million to help folks like Bernie, but he needs folks like youto step up to take on a 50-year career politician in Sherrod Brown. Even just$10 can make a difference when it comes to the millions Sherrod Brown israising from every liberal in the country. We have got to change the courseof this country and put an end to the dangerous Harris-Schumer-Brownagenda—and that begins with doing everything we can to help Bernie Moreno winin Ohio and elect a Republican majority in the Senate! Thanks, John ThuneSenate Minority Whip Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Moreno fights for theAmerican Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born in Bogota, Colombia. Atage five, his American Dream began when he moved to the United States with hisfamily. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18. Through his relentlesswork ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, he turned the first cardealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of the largest dealership groupsin America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value and transformationalpotential of blockchain technology, before it received mainstream attention,and moved much of his volunteer time and investment dollars into the space. In2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to be quite successful as Bernieserved as Chairman of the Board. After a long, successful career, Bernie soldmost of his business to begin focusing on his calling: protecting the Americandream for another generation. Solving our country’s problems requires commonsense. In Washington, Bernie will fight to shrink government, protect ourfreedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party from taking our data and land, andalways put America First. Ohioans are done with politicians who talk a biggame and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. to get work done – just likehe always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ON SOCIAL MEDIA Paid for byBernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hateto see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Tim Sheehy
subject: Total spending has reached $243 million
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Given that Jon Tester won his first race in 2006 byjust 3,562 votes, every vote matters. Peter, If the most recent poll releasedover the weekend is to be believed, more than 23,000 voters in Montana haveyet to decide whether they will support me or my opponent, Democrat JonTester. With just four days left in the race, we’re running out of time toreach these folks before they cast their ballots. And that is not good newsfor us.In 2006, Jon Tester won his first race by just 3,562 votes; trust mewhen I tell you that every vote matters. With the Senate majority on the line,our need for further assistance is immediate and as urgent as it gets. HELP MEREACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ Given the glut of outside spending on thisrace, it is now costing our campaign $309 to reach a single registeredvoter.That means if we want to reach every last of Montana's 23,000+ undecidedvoters, we need to raise an additional $7 million. When I tell you that everydollar counts, you know I genuinely mean it. When I tell you that this racewill come down to the last vote, now you know I genuinely mean it. Please, canyou help me get across the finish line with a gift of $1, $5, $25, $75 or even$1,000 today. HELP ME REACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ For America's Future,Tim Sheehy Former Navy SEAL Republican Candidate for U.S. Senate CHIP IN TODAY“ "I SERVED AS A NAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTINGCOMPANIES IN AMERICA CREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LEDCATTLE RANCHING AND FEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, ISEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVE THEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OURCOUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FOR THE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUTSERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOT POLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BYTIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA Tim Sheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his militaryrank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense.

name: Gwen Walz
subject: I am kindly asking folks like you to chip in for the first time today. Will you make a $47 contribution to elect Kamala and Tim and defeat Trump?
body: We can turn the page on the chaos and division of Donald Trump. | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) ![](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/950/644/original/gwen_walz_square.jpg) Four days, Peter. Just four days to determine the next four years. **We can turn the page on the chaos and division of Donald Trump -- but not without your help reaching every last voter and getting them to the polls.** So I am kindly asking folks like you to chip in for the first time today. Will you make a $47 contribution to elect Kamala and Tim and defeat Trump? It wasn’t that many weeks ago when Tim got a call -- _the call_ \-- from Vice President Harris asking him to join this ticket. Ever since then, it’s been a whirlwind. I have traveled across the country meeting all different kinds of voters: proud Democrats who vote frequently, folks who are still deciding, folks who don’t vote in every election -- and yes, Republicans. **Everywhere I go, people are fed up with Donald Trump and fired up for Kamala and Tim’s new way forward.** But I won’t mince words, Peter. We remain the underdogs in this race. Nothing less than our very democracy is at stake. And we must win. In an election as close as this one, grassroots supporters like you will make the difference. With time running out, please give your first $47 to power our critical voter outreach efforts in these final days. _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ | | $47 >> --- | $75 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---  Thank you. It is a privilege to be with you in this fight. It truly is.Thank you,Gwen          * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being asupporter. But Peter, we don't want to bother you. If you’d like tounsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. name: Melissa Joan Hart
subject: This '90s witch is all in for Gloria Johnson 🧙‍♀️
body: 👋 Hey there, It’s Melissa Joan Hart here — you might know me from ClarissaExplains It All or Sabrina the Teenage Witch . But today, I’m just reachingout as a mom and a Tennessean who wants to see real change happen in ourstate. That’s why I am all in for Gloria Johnson. Gloria is exactly the leaderTennessee deserves, but she needs all the support we can give. Will you joinme and chip in a few dollars to power her campaign in these final days?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] So, let’s talk about why thiselection matters — in plain, simple terms. Gun violence is something no familyshould ever have to fear, yet it’s a reality we face every day. If you’re likeme, you’re done with the routine of “thoughts and prayers” without action andwant leaders who will actually do something tangible to make our communitiessafer. Gloria Johnson is exactly the leader we need in the U.S. Senate toachieve real solutions. Not many politicians know what it’s like to be insidea school when the theoretical threat of gun violence becomes reality. Gloriadoes . She spent decades as a public school educator, and she confronted thatthreat firsthand. Gloria is not afraid to stand up and demand policies thatwill protect our kids, our schools, and our communities. But she’s up againstMarsha Blackburn, a senator who’s consistently sided with special interestsand blocked common-sense gun safety measures. With only four days untilElection Day, Gloria’s team is working around the clock on their GOTV effortsto reach every last voter. They’re calling, texting, and getting the word outacross Tennessee — but they need our help to keep it going strong and win thisrace. So, I’m asking — will you chip in a few dollars of any amount today topower this final push? Every bit of support helps them mobilize Tennesseansand brings us all closer to real change.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] If you’ve saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:DONATE $5[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=5]DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=10]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=25]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=100]DONATE $250[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=250]OTHER AMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] Thank you! -Melissa Joan Hart -------------------------- Gloria Johnson is running for theU.S. Senate because Tennesseans deserve leaders who care. For too long,elected officials like Marsha Blackburn have done absolutely nothing to makeTennesseans’ lives better. The only interests they’ve cared about are specialinterests. The only people they’ve championed are their donors. Gloria willadvocate for real solutions to protect our communities from gun violence, makehealth care more affordable and accessible for all of us, secure access to theballot box, and defend reproductive rights. There’s a movement afoot forchange — join us. [https://www.votegloriajohnson.com/] DONATE TODAY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?amount=25&refcode;=email_footer]DONATE MONTHLY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?recurring=true&refcode;=email_footer]Follow along: Text GLORIA to 23299 FACEBOOK[https://www.facebook.com/VoteGloriaJohnson/] TWITTER[https://twitter.com/VoteGloriaJ] INSTAGRAM[https://www.instagram.com/votegloriaj/] Paid for by Gloria for TennesseeContributions or gifts to Gloria for Tennessee are not tax deductible. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: We just can’t catch a break
body: Friend, I have an urgent update. FOR MONTHS, our team defied the odds – and polling showed me on track to win Nevada’s battleground Senate race. THEN, Donald Trump started ruthlessly attacking me and national Republicans poured tens of millions of dollars into this race to defeat me. Mitch McConnell’s super PAC even announced another surprise $6.2 MILLION ad blitz for the last 2 weeks of the election. NOW: A new poll was released that shows me TIED with my far-right opponent – in the race experts say will decide Senate control. I can’t sugarcoat it: this is the worst case scenario for Democrats. Everything from abortion rights to protecting our democracy is on the line in this race. But Republicans have the upper hand in Nevada – and they are on the path to flipping our state red, taking back Senate control, and electing Donald Trump. Nevadans are already voting, so we need to turn this around RIGHT NOW. I just met with my senior advisors and we set a goal to raise $500,000 by midnight tonight. But time is running out, and we’re still falling short. Please, I swear I wouldn’t ask if it wasn’t important. Can you split $5 or more to my campaign and Raphael Warnock RIGHT NOW so we can win in Nevada, defend our Senate majority, and keep Donald Trump out of the White House? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/warnock-for-georgia_email-rosen?refcode=jtk5462-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you. I couldn’t do this without you. Jacky Rosen -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Mark Warner
subject: I’ve spent a lot of time with Tim Kaine
body: Derek, I’ve had the honor of being Tim Kaine’s friend since we met at HarvardLaw School in 1980. For over 40 years, I’ve watched him wholeheartedly serveVirginia, first as mayor of Richmond, then as my Lieutenant Governor, andlater Governor, before serving together in the United States Senate. Thismeans I’ve spent a lot of time with Tim and gathered plenty of intel on him.So as I sat down to write this email asking you to support Senator Kaine’s re-election campaign, I found myself wondering exactly what I should say to youto assure you that Tim is the right choice to represent Virginia in Congress.And then it dawned on me: I want to tell you the top 3 things that annoy methe most about Tim Kaine. First off, Tim is way too nice! As a former civilrights attorney and missionary, he’s spent his entire career committed tosocial justice, being driven by the value of kindness and the belief that itcan change peoples’ lives. And he’s a genuinely good guy on top of that.Second, he’s ridiculously good at playing the harmonica. Seriously, he carriesthem in his briefcase, just in case a jam session breaks out on the Senatefloor. Third and finally, and I’ve said this before, he’s a deeply optimisticperson. Sometimes I can be a glass half-empty kind of guy, but Tim’s alwaysseems about ⅔ full. We need someone like Tim Kaine in the Senate. Tim’s valueof kindness and decency is what drives his undying dedication to serving thepeople of Virginia. And in a Congress plagued by partisan division, Tim’srelentless optimism keeps him from giving up in the crucial fights to protectvoting rights, safeguard a woman’s right to choose, and more. Now theharmonica… that one might not always translate to his work as a Senator, it’sjust really great to watch. The thing is, Tim’s seat could very well determineif the GOP takes control on Tuesday. Republicans are working overtime to ousthim and take back control of the Senate. So I’m asking you today if you cansplit a $5 donation between my campaign and Tim Kaine’s so we can send him,his kindness, impressive harmonica playing, and optimism back to the Senate?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?amount=5&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1 Ifyou've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation willbe automatically split between Tim Kaine and Mark Warner: EXPRESS DONATE $5https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?express_lane=true&amount;=5&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1EXPRESS DONATE $10 https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?express_lane=true&amount;=10&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1EXPRESS DONATE $25 https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?express_lane=true&amount;=25&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1EXPRESS DONATE $50 https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?express_lane=true&amount;=50&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1EXPRESS DONATE $100 https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?express_lane=true&amount;=100&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1DONATE OTHER https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?express_lane_other=true&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1I know Tim very well, and I know he’s not done building a Virginia that worksfor all. Help re-elect Senator Kaine and defend our Democratic Senate majorityby splitting a contribution today >>> https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?amount=5&refcode;=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1 Thankyou, Mark Contribute https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw-email-240528-kaine?refcode=MW_ATA_EM_FR_Kainesplit_241101_T1_1 ---- Friends ofMark Warner 1490-5A Quarterpath Road #213 Williamsburg, VA 23185 United StatesTo unsubscribe, go to: unsubscribe: https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/2Buh_-FbSkCM8ZUa-iiD5Q2?unsubscribedata=TR0MtEc6xaoG7SLnux5O2KQbXLJPt2%2FuNy2jUZMmKgz%2BD2innsxDKR3omYmOXCo6%2FJh44r3DrCgxLGhQeJmQLh8khb6WuNiorL%2BgBo%2Fysa3ffagHAVrsgb5C8Zp2HQlsBClSCZhrkqbw07wVP6PXxu8bTeX85QiM9sbZCsGUasRi0caCa5TR5A87ToDBLdhC6JcQ4Z2okmQHkj9J2bR7C%2F1XDdxSELZwmF0PoK%2B%2FGnXxlz30E8FULrZ%2FJQ2UjnY4ffDWWO4myYhBTWJKl%2FpG8svsTgJLkbXw3a0V6w1iPgLWpymHoxwHJZF%2FqIEabvx9RZMvaRtPC84A%2B2dNzcua%2FpyDBNCzomv1xrNaEfu5uabNx%2BiO1KXsE5W%2FtRrUXPC595tud8agFNC85d8eCA0n5rvnoOHisUYz%2Fij8QwVgbLU%3DPaid for by Friends of Mark Warner

subject: Final plea from a DOZEN top Republicans
body: The Democrats are so close to winning enough battleground races to takecomplete control of our country. We’re fighting back with everything we’ve gotbut we desperately need your help. Vivek Ramaswamy asked. Lara Trump asked.Donald Trump Jr. asked. Michael Whatley asked. Mike Pompeo asked. KellyanneConway asked. John Kennedy asked. Kimberly Guilfoyle asked. Sean Spicer asked.Newt Gingrich asked. Sarah Huckabee Sanders asked.                                                                                                                                                         Tulsi Gabbard asked. VivekRamaswamy asked. Lara Trump asked. Donald Trump Jr. asked. Mike Pompeo asked.Michael Whatley asked. Kellyanne Conway asked. John Kennedy asked. NewtGingrich asked. Kimberly Guilfoyle asked. Sean Spicer asked. Sarah HuckabeeSanders asked. Now we're following up ONE LAST TIME because our final deadlineis just hours away – and according to the latest FEC reports, Conservativesgot annihilated in fundraising! As a direct result of falling behind, we maybe forced to SLASH our voter contact budgets and pull our ads OFF THE AIRWAVESin the final days of the election!This is an emergency, but don’t take ourword for it – here’s how Axios broke the news: At this point, we desperatelyneed all Patriots to pitch in a few bucks right now or the Democrats couldtake complete control. That’s why Majority Leader Steve Scalise cut thisfinal plea for help before it’s too late: Last Call: Add $250 Here >> LastCall: Add $100 Here >> Last Call: Add $50 Here >> Last Call: Add $35 Here >>Kamala Harris just bragged about raising $1 billion. She cut a $15 millioncheck to destroy down-ballot Conservatives. Now we’re facing our final monthlydeadline and we’re coming up short. The Democrats are so close to winningenough battleground races to take complete control of our country. We’refighting back with everything we’ve got but we desperately need your help.YOUR SUPPORT will help keep our ads on the airwaves. YOUR SUPPORT will sendemergency resources to key swing states. YOUR SUPPORT will make thedifference between victory and defeat. Please: If there was EVER a time topitch in a few bucks before an election, it's right here and right now. Thiselection is too close to call. As of now, the future of America relies onPatriots like you stepping up before the deadline. The final cutoff is closingin. We’re trailing dangerously behind. But you can help save the day as longas you step up now. Last Call: Please Donate Here >> Thanks for all you do,Official Republican Communication It's House Majority Leader Steve Scalise.I’m respectfully asking you to fill out my ELECTION YEAR CHECK-IN at yourearliest convenience. It’s important. I want to have your goals, yourconcerns, and your priorities in mind before I do anything else. What wouldyou like me to keep in mind when I'm taking on the Radical Democrats? name: Steve Garvey
subject: The most important week
body: What matters most right now is that we do whatever we can to fund a campaignthat can win. That’s the most important thing. Winning this race.                                                                                                                  Peter, I have animportant message that I didn’t think I’d be sending you today. In just amoment, I am going to ask you to make a contribution to my campaign for U.S.Senate. November 5th isdays away, and I’d really appreciate the chance toexplain why this request — especially today — is so critically important.Here’s the truth: Right now, we have a week of media buys to pay for — themost important week of the entire campaign. And if we don’t raise what we neednow, we will be forced to give up the airwaves and let Adam Schiff and theDemocrat-machine backing him up run their attacks on me unopposed. Whatmatters most right now is that we do whatever we can to fund a campaign thatcan win. That’s the most important thing. Winning this race. Not just for thesake of winning, but because of what it would mean to substitute my presencewith Adam Schiff’s in the Senate. That’s a reality I don’t think any of uswant to consider, but it’s what will happen if we come up short. Now, time isrunning out. So, this is the part where I ask, one more time, and very humbly:Can you please use this link to make a donation to my campaign for U.S. Senatein California before Election Day? These emails are how we fund our campaign,and I really need you to chip in and help prevent us from falling behind.DONATE $35 DONATE $100 DONATE $500 DONATE $50 DONATE $250 DONATE $1000DONATE $35 DONATE $50 DONATE $100 DONATE $250 DONATE $500 DONATE $1000OTHER AMOUNT Thank you Peter, and God bless, DONATE <> PAID FOR BY STEVEGARVEY FOR U.S. SENATE PO Box 532389 Los Angeles, CA 90053-2389 Unsubscribehere

name: AOC
subject: I’ll tell you what I believe:
body: [1]Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez for Congress We live in a constant state ofinjustice. We are always struggling against systems of mass incarceration, ofextreme income inequality, of late stage capitalism. Those conditions doexist. But one thing that I think is important is that we must mobilize for anaffirmative vision for this country — we can’t just mobilize on fear. We needto be clear about what the stakes are. We do. But I don’t believe in a ‘fearonly’ approach. I’ll tell you what I believe: I believe in a bare minimum. $15minimum wage needed to be passed several years ago. I believe in guaranteed,improved, and expanded Medicare to every single American. We can’t give up.I’ve been in that place when I was a waitress. I did spend some time giving upand being cynical and saying, “F*ck this.” And you know what it got us?Nothing. Depression, cynicism, and a sense of purposelessness. Giving up is aprivilege that people just can’t afford. Movements wax and wane. And there aretimes when it feels like our power is waning, and it’s really easy to take ourball and go home. But the strength of a movement really depends on thedurability of it, and the commitment to it. That black pill of cynicism is thedeath of movements, not the birth of them. In solidarity, Alexandria [https://act.ocasiocortez.com/go/14659?c0=aoc-email-20241101.DCJTFE&refcode;=em20241101-7501-P_FND_RES_GND&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1001&akid;=7501%2E2526796%2ERSo1sN]Help us continue the fight by making a grassroots donation. [https://act.ocasiocortez.com/go/14659?c0=aoc-email-20241101.DCJTFE&refcode;=em20241101-7501-P_FND_RES_GND&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1020&akid;=7501%2E2526796%2ERSo1sN]Contribute $5 This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is the mostimportant way we keep in touch with people like you, so thank you for readingto the end. Small donors like you keep us going. To contribute via check,please address to Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez for Congress, PO Box 680080,Corona, NY 11368. name: Montana Senate Update
subject: Tim Sheehy lied about his military service.
body: Derek—it’s Shelbi, Jon Tester’s Campaign Manager. I just made atough decision that you need to hear about immediately. According to severalrecent reports, Tim Sheehy lied about his military service. 1. On the campaigntrail, Sheehy claimed he had a gunshot wound in his arm from combat. Butaccording to the New York Times , public records, and firsthandaccounts—including a Navy SEAL who served with Sheehy—his gunshot wound wasfrom accidentally shooting himself in the arm in Glacier National Park. 2.Days later, NBC News released another bombshell report stating Sheehy liedabout being “medically discharged” from the Navy. It’s shocking—and Montanansmust know the truth but we’re running out of time. So I made the difficultdecision to launch more television and digital ads today. The money isn’t inthe budget yet—but with polls in the margin of error, running these final adscould be enough to break the tie in Jon’s favor and win this race. I need youto split an immediate donation to help us fund these last-minute ads. name: Steve Daines
subject: I’ve been getting calls and texts all day...
body: Steve Daines for Senate They can see the WIN in sight, but they are paying offmassive bills to try and keep up with the money their Democrat competitors arespending. Hey Fellow American, I’ve been getting calls and texts all day fromsome of our top battleground Senate races. They can see the WIN in sight, butthey are paying off massive bills to try and keep up with the money theirDemocrat competitors are spending. We have just FOUR more days left, and theyneed every ounce we can give them to pull off a win. Right now, their focus ison get-out-the-vote efforts to make sure everyone casts their ballots. Theseraces will come down to every counted vote. I told them I would do everythingI could do to help. So, here’s what I’m asking. Will you chip in $4 to each ofthese 4 candidates below? Eric Hovde (WI) Bernie Moreno (OH) Mike Rogers (MI)Dave McCormick (PA) Your $16 donation will help them reach ONE more voter inthese critical final days. And if I can get 7,000 people to chip in $16, wecould win the Senate. Our days of being able to help are numbered. Let’sleave nothing on the table. God bless, Steve Daines NRSC Chairman Senator (MT)Steve Daines: "I've watched a lot of Montana Senate races, House races, andgovernor races over the years.This is the most intense ground game operationand the most far-reaching that I've seen in many election cycles. It's a door-to-door type of persuasion, as well as a lot of phoning, and a lot of digital.I think well-run ground games win elections." Steve is committed to always putting Montana first as he works tobring real change to Washington and fights for more jobs, less government andcommon sense solutions to get our country back on track.Chip in $10 or more tohelp Steve today! <> Senator Steve Daines Paid for by Steve Daines forMontana Unsubscribe

name: Rick Larsen
subject: The GOP will seek “massive reform” to the Affordable Care Act
body: This month, we have spent a lot of time campaigning, talking about next week'selection, and emphasizing the urgency around taking back the House. HouseSpeaker Mike Johnson's comments this week are a prime example of why Democratsneed control of the House. This week, during a GOP campaign event, SpeakerJohnson indicated that if Republicans gain control of the presidency in 2024,they will pursue "massive reform" to the ACA as part of a "very aggressive"first 100-day agenda. The Affordable Care Act (ACA) has been a lifeline forWashingtonians, improving health outcomes, offering financial security, andenabling equitable access to health care across diverse communities in thestate. Make no mistake: the Chaos Caucus still wants to undermine criticalhealth care programs and unwind health insurance regulations and safeguardsdespite the overwhelming support for the program. ACA enrollment has hit ahistoric level, with 21.3 million people opting for ACA marketplace coverageduring the Open Enrollment Period. This statistic includes more than fivemillion people — about a fourth — who are new to the ACA Marketplace and 16million people who renewed their existing ACA coverage. With enrollmentreaching a record high and millions of American families relying on the ACAfor coverage, it simply does not make sense that the Chaos Caucus' agenda isto repeal this landmark legislation. Rolling back the ACA would not just ripaway critical care from the 21.3 million folks using Marketplace plans — but45 million Americans could lose their health insurance provided through otherprovisions of the ACA . Think young adults afforded the option to stay ontheir parents' plans until age 26, people suffering from pre-existingconditions that could legally be denied care, and more. We cannot let thishappen to the millions of people relying on the ACA. We must take back theHouse next week. Our final weekend Get-Out-The-Vote canvassing efforts starttomorrow. Will you make a contribution to support our last field events beforeElection Day? Donate: [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-rick-larsen?refcode=2024-11-01-aca&recurring;=&amount;=&amounts;=,,,,&refcode2;=951ff45b-9d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]The far-right's eagerness to roll back health care in America — to a time ofrunaway corporate profits, coverage denials, and politicians inserting theirextreme ideology between you and your health care provider — is not new.Extremists voted upwards of 50 times to repeal the ACA. Time and again, myRepublican colleagues in the House propose a budget that would destroy thislife-saving legislation. We will not let that stand.I believe health care is aright. As always, we are going to fight back for Washingtonians and themillions of Americans who benefit from the provisions of the ACA. That is whyI voted to reduce premiums for ACA members and am actively working to expandaccess to high-quality, affordable health care that fits Northwest Washingtonfamilies' budgets. That is why I am continuing to work to lower the costs ofprescription drugs. I voted to reduce prescription drug costs by lettingMedicare negotiate drug prices, by imposing a tax penalty if drug companiesincrease their prices faster than inflation, and by capping the price ofinsulin at $35 per month. Millions of Americans are counting on us. This isthe type of policy-making that has a tangible impact on Northwest Washington,and we must protect the ACA in Congress. Your support now means I can continuethis important work in 2025. Will you help me do just that with a contributiontoward our final canvassing effort before Election Day?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-rick-larsen?refcode=2024-11-01-aca&recurring;=&amount;=&amounts;=,,,,&refcode2;=951ff45b-9d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Together, we can make this happen. Rick Paid for and authorized by Citizens toElect Rick Larsen. This email was sent by Rick Larsen[https://www.ricklarsen.org]. Citizens to Elect Rick Larsen PO Box 326Everett, WA 98206 United States Email is an important way for Rick Larsen tokeep supporters like you informed about critical issues and to build a winninggrassroots campaign. Too much email? Switch to our less email option here[https://takeaction.ricklarsen.org/a/want-less-email?contactdata=UUYAJXrqIf88pjhIqSUi8g5WTlHtquytb4To3tLTwMLDxKP3IFZDf4vonsJUJnU+]. name: Ted Cruz
subject: Why is my race so close?
body: Don’t let an Open Borders Radical win Don’t let an Open Borders Radical winPatriot, As you know, I’m in a razor close race against liberal Democrat ColinAllred. That’s why I’ve been barnstorming the state and sending so many emailsasking for help. I truly appreciate all you’ve done to support my campaign.But I still need help-this race is still too close! Why is my race so close?Unfortunately, one reason is that my opponent Colin Allred is untruthful, andis attempting to hide his radical liberal views from Texas voters. It takes alot of time and money to set the record straight… For example, on the borderAllred now claims to love border security, and belatedly says he wants to finda solution to the Biden-Harris border crisis, but that’s not how Allred votedin Congress… In Congress, Allred was an Open Borders Radical who voted AGAINSTthe interests of Texas and FOR open borders lawlessness numerous times: Allredvoted AGAINST the Secure the Border Act. Allred voted AGAINST denouncing theBiden Administration’s immigration policies. Allred voted AGAINST condemningthe Biden border crisis and the tremendous burdens law enforcement officersface as a result. Allred voted AGAINST the POLICE Act, which would immediatelydeport any illegal alien who assaults a law enforcement officer. Allred votedAGAINST the SAVE Act, which was a bill that would block illegal aliens fromvoting in U.S. elections. And perhaps most shamefully, Allred SKIPPED a voteon the End the Border Catastrophe Act… It takes a lot of time and money to setthe record straight…and of course the liberal media is working overtime tohelp Allred hide his record. If you can, please chip in $5, $10, or $25 now tohelp me call Colin Allred out before it’s too late >> Thank you! Ted CruzDONATE NOW >> Paid for by Ted Cruz for Senate 815 A Brazos, PMB 550, Austin,TX 78701 Unsubscribe

name: Sen. Jacky Rosen
subject: We absolutely cannot afford to fall behind
body: I wish I had a better update, friend. Here's the bad news: The GOP is pouringmoney into Nevada every day to defeat me and flip the state red – because theyknow this race will be close, and they know Nevada will decide both the Senateand the White House. And to make matters worse: I'm worried that Democratsaren't even paying attention to Nevada. I just checked the numbers, andgrassroots donations to our campaign are WAY behind where they need to be. Weabsolutely cannot afford to fall behind on resources in these pivotal finaldays. So please, before tonight's midnight deadline, can I count on you tochip in $5 or more now so we can keep this crucial battleground blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5360-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Folks aren't fully appreciating how close thisrace will be, friend. The polls have shown this race statistically tied formonths – and the latest polls show me losing ground. Here's why that'sespecially concerning: In the weeks leading up to the election in 2022,polling had Catherine Cortez Masto up 13 points in Nevada, yet she ended upwinning by just 0.77% of the vote – the closest margin in the entire country.That's why I have to humbly ask for your help right now: Please, give $5, $25,or whatever you can this minute to help me defend Nevada and our Senatemajority. Your gift will make a real difference right now!https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5360-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you. – Jacky -------- This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jane Fonda
subject: Let’s send these climate champions to Congress
body: Hey, Jane Fonda here. With Election Day right around the corner, I’mreaching out to see if you will join the Jane Fonda Climate PAC and PCCC insupporting a slate of climate champions in the final stretch of this criticalelection. I want to tell you more about why I’m so excited to support thesecandidates, but first, can you chip in $20 to split a contribution for thesecandidates ahead of Election Day?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_salinas-fonda-split] I’m excited to team up with the PCCC to support a slate ofincredible climate candidates running in competitive congressional races whoare committed to tackling the climate crisis, including standing up topowerful special interests like the fossil fuel industry. These candidatesneed our help: Andrea Salinas is running for re-election in Oregon’s 6thCongressional District. In Congress Andrea has been a tireless champion forour environment and the well-being of the entire Pacific Northwest. She’sfighting for a clean energy future for her daughter and all Americans. In 2022Andrea won by less than three points, so it’s critical we defend her seat thisyear. Kristen McDonald Rivet is running to flip Michigan’s 8th CongressionalDistrict. In the state senate, Kristen helped pass ambitious clean energylegislation to address the climate crisis, create clean jobs, and saveMichiganders money. She also secured funding to replace lead pipes and ensurekids have clean drinking water at schools. Dave Min is running forCalifornia’s 47th Congressional District. As a state senator, Dave chaired theNatural Resources and Water Committee and introduced legislation to terminateoffshore oil and gas leases and secured funding to improve beaches. Corporatespecial interests and far-right extremists are pouring millions into theseraces to defeat these progressive climate champions. For the sake of ourenvironment and electing a pro-environment Congress, we must have their backs.Can you help us ensure these climate champions have the resources they need towin? Your support – whether it’s $5, $10, or $50 – makes a HUGE difference inbuilding a movement to protect our planet’s health. name: Donald J. Trump
subject: Elon looks great in Dark MAGA, I know you will too!
body: Should I sign your brand-new Dark MAGA Hat?                                          | | | | |  --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/87/87617793-81db-4da2-81a1-ac4f530b13d8/black-and-white-classic-logo.png) | ---  # **_SHOULD I SIGN YOUR BRAND-NEW DARK MAGA HAT?_**  ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/f9/f928e1b7-06cd-45d6-947d-47c40c970ed9/go-dark-maga-claim-hat-now.png) CONFIRM DELIVERY Friend, After Elon wore a Dark MAGA Hat, we’re down to the last few in ALL OFEXISTENCE. And in honor of last month’s **_#1 BEST SELLER,_** I want to send the finalones out with a BANG. **_So here’s my offer to you: if you place your order before my final FEC-mandated deadline, I might add my signature and a quick personal note right onthe brim!>_**  CLAIM YOURS My campaign will NEVER get another shipment of these limited-edition beauties. These are my personal favorites, and I want to make sure the last ones go homewith a truly deserving Patriot like yourself… But I can only hold onto yours until my deadline **11:59 PM TONIGHT!** **Don’t let someone else claim YOUR MAGA HAT, act fast order before it’sGONE.>**  GO DARK MAGA Thank you,  ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/b0/b028923f-aa71-493e-a406-a3ae3dd63e4b/trumpheadshot.png) ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/cb/cb3fa8bb-6df3-4771-a7a6-1eb7fa1da014/trump-signature.png) Donald J. But hecan’t do it alone. It’s going to take all of us, working together, to pull offa MASSIVE victory this November that’s TOO BIG TO RIG! name: Katie Porter
subject: Help Democrats defend democracy in the courtroom.
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-header[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-header]https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a]Hi friend, it’s Katie Porter. We’rejust days away from one of the most consequential elections in our nation’shistory – and Donald Trump is spiraling. He’s spewing unhinged conspiracytheories. He can’t process that he lost the last election. He’s lying aboutvote-by-mail this election, trying to sow seeds of doubt just like he did in2020. And he and his allies are already gearing up to contest the results incourt if the election doesn’t go their way. That’s a big reason why my friendsat the Democratic Association of Secretaries of State just launched a fivemillion dollar fund to combat GOP legal challenges in key swing states. Theyneed grassroots Democrats like you in this fight – and your support right nowwill help Democrats defend democracy in the courtroom and stop attacks on ourelections. Can you chip in $3 now to the DASS Legal Fund?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a] If you've saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately:Chip in $10 Now [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a&express;_lane=true&amount;=10] Chipin $35 Now [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a&express;_lane=true&amount;=35] Chipin $50 Now [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a&express;_lane=true&amount;=50] Chipin $100 Now [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a&express;_lane=true&amount;=100] Chipin $250 Now [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a&express;_lane=true&amount;=250]Another amount [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dass-legal-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-2-a] Thank you, Katie Thank you for yourdedicated support of The Democratic Association of Secretaries of State -- theonly organization dedicated to electing and protecting Democratic Secretariesof States. Contributions to DASS’s legal fund will be used at DASS’s solediscretion to support its programs and activities related to vote protectingprograms in the lead-up to and after election day. DASS may use all or part ofa contributor’s funds, and disclose them as necessary, in states of itschoosing. name: Laura Gillen
subject: all eyes on our district

Republicans arepouring in millions to defend Anthony D’Esposito in the most competitive redto blue race in the country. With all eyes on our district, your support iscritical now more than ever to defeat D’Esposito. name: Brianna Carmen
subject: here’s what’s at stake down the ballot:
body: Peter, This is the last weekend before Election Day, and we need to surge ourmomentum for races happening down the ballot. Why? The Stakes – Right now,Republicans can pass Project 2025 at the state-level, set rules for elections,and control redistricting. We must stop MAGA Republicans from pushing theirdangerous agenda in state legislatures to turn a new page on our democracy andhelp elect more women of the New American Majority —Black, Brown, andIndigenous women and women of color, as well as young, LGBTQ+, and unmarriedwomen— who will pave the path for progress. name: Dan Osborn
subject: this was a very difficult decision
body: Click here to stop receiving emails about Dan Osborn's campaign in Nebraskafrom us. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/uB3EyayArUyKTBgRW_x--A2] Hello, After fivebrand-new polls showed me LEADING my opponent Republican Deb Fischer here inNebraska’s Senate race, Fischer’s campaign and Mitch McConnell's Super PACsbought over $13.1 MILLION in TV ads attacking me. Fischer and McConnell havebegun absolutely blanketing the state with TV ads, attacking me withridiculous lies. We have an opportunity to win Nebraska’s Senate seat – butonly if we can counter the lies and match them on the air. That’s why I justmade a very difficult decision and told my campaign we could begin airing moreof our own ads to fight back, even though we don’t technically have all themoney in our budget to do so just yet. We’re taking this risk because we haveto. Nebraska is now the closest Senate race in the entire country according toresearchers at Princeton University. So I made an executive decision and tooka bet that grassroots donors like you would come through and help us fill our$100,000 budget gap… We need to do everything we can if we’re going to winthis Senate seat and elect a blue-collar worker to be the 51st vote in theU.S. Senate. That means taking a few risks. But if we're going to defeatRepublican Deb Fischer and win this Senate seat, I’m counting on grassrootsdonors like you to help raise another $100,000 before our deadline at midnighttonight, close our budget gap, and ensure our new TV ads can keep running. I’mnot taking a dime of corporate PAC money. Instead, I’m relying entirely onpeople like you to fund my campaign. Please, will you rush a donation to mycampaign right now – every dollar you can afford – to keep our new ads on theair, defeat Republican Deb Fischer, and win this Senate seat?[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101pm-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=385a52d2-a098-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101pm-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=385a52d2-a098-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101pm-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=385a52d2-a098-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101pm-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=385a52d2-a098-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101pm-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=385a52d2-a098-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101pm-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=385a52d2-a098-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101pm-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=385a52d2-a098-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]There are going to be a one or two more hard spending decisions like thisbetween now and Election Day. name: Senate Conservatives
subject: Five Close Senate Races
body: Time is running out We are coming down to the wire, and there are fiveconservative Senate candidates who need your support. Please make a splitcontribution to their campaigns now. Senate Conservatives Fund will pay allprocessing fees and transfer 100% of your contributions directly to theircampaigns. Time is running out, so please take action now. All of thesecandidates can win if they have the funds to get their message out. ►Businessman Eric Hovde is running neck-and-neck with incumbent Senator TammyBaldwin in Wisconsin. One poll conducted by the Trafalgar Group even showedHovdeleading by one point. Democrats have pulled their fire alarm and arepouring money into the state to save Baldwin. ► Businessman Bernie Moreno ison the verge of defeating incumbent Senator Sherrod Brown in Ohio, who hasbeen a politician for over fifty years. Rasmussen Reports has Moreno up by onepoint, while theWashington Post has his down by one point. This is the bestchance we've had to defeat Brown in years. ► Senator Ted Cruz is theDemocrats' #1 target this year, and they are dumping millions of dollars intoTexas to turn Texas Blue. His opponent, Rep. Colin Allred, is a Kamala Harrisliberal who is desperately trying to hide his record. The Hill/Emerson Collegepoll showed Cruz leading by only one point. ► Conservative former TV newsanchor Kari Lake is surging in Arizona and only trails liberal Ruben Gallegoby four points. But apparently, she's too conservative for Mitch McConnell,who refuses to spend the party's money to support her. There's still time forher to win in a state where President Trump is expanding his lead. ► Armycombat veteran Sam Brown is rapidly gaining on incumbent Senator Jacky Rosenin Nevada. Republicans are doing exceptionally well with early voting, andBrown only trails by three points, according to the latest Rasmussen Reportspoll. ELECTION COUNTDOWN SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES DONATE NOW Change inWashington means changing the people we send there. Senate Conservatives Fund300 Independence Ave SE Washington, DC 20003 Text SENATE to (877) 838-9388 toreceive exclusive updates and invitations. Senate Conservatives Fund is agrassroots organization that promotes conservative policies and helps electconservative candidates to the U.S. Senate. SCF was founded by former SenatorJim DeMint to help the grassroots change Washington. Contributions to theSenate Conservatives Fund are not deductible as charitable contributions.Contributions from corporations or foreign nationals lacking permanentresident status are not permitted. Federal law requires us to report the name,mailing address, occupation and employer for each individual whosecontributions aggregate in excess of $200 in a calendar year. Not paid for attaxpayer expense. PAID FOR BY SENATE CONSERVATIVES FUND AND NOT AUTHORIZED BYANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE. SENATECONSERVATIVES.COM Unsubscribe

name: Mark Takano
subject: What else needs to be said??
body: Peter, Election Day is just 4 days from today. I know people usually think ofCalifornia as a solid blue state, but there are some extremely competitiveraces happening right now: from Will Rollins against MAGA Ken Calvert (thesame Republican who OUTED ME in the 1990s) , to Derek Tran against MichelleSteel (recently called the most competitive toss-up election in the country).So what else needs to be said? There is so much work left to be done — doorsto knock, undecided voters to speak with, and ads to fund. IF we let up ourefforts for a single moment, MAGA Republicans will be almost guaranteed to winin this 50-50 election… BUT IF we band together in these next 4 days, fightback with everything we have, and don’t let a single second go to waste, thenI know in my soul that we will be victorious on November 5th. That’s why I’mreaching out to you today, Peter: Can I count on your support of just $7 tohelp flip the MAGA House and save our fragile Democratic majority? The fate ofour democracy depends on the actions you take over the next 4 days! »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=7] $15,000 PRE-ELECTION DAY GOAL! CHIP IN $7 TO FLIP THE HOUSE! »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=7&amounts;=10,25,50,100]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: CONTRIBUTE $7 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=7&amounts;=3,7,10&express;_lane=true]CONTRIBUTE $10 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=10&amounts;=3,7,10&express;_lane=true]Or a custom donation »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=15&amounts;=3,7,10]Thank you for hard work and dedication, Peter. Let’s go win this. Mark Takano----------------------------------------------- Paid for by Mark Takano ForCongress P.O. Box 5214, Riverside, CA 92517 www.marktakano.com Mark Takanorepresents the good people of California's Inland Empire in Congress, fightingfor the region's progressive priorities. He's been a voice for veterans,seniors, students, local businesses and hardworking families. But now,Republicans have captured a slim House Majority. The leadership of progressiveDemocrats like Mark will be critical to holding Republicans accountable andensuring the healing of our country during this challenging time. name: Hung Cao
subject: Knock knock knock
body: Knock, knock, knock. It’s the scariest sound you’ll hear when you live in acommunist country. It’s the last sound my parents heard when their fatherswere taken away. It’s the sound of always living in fear, and it’s my family’sreal-life story. We escaped from Vietnam just days before Saigon fell to thecommunists, and we were given a new life in the most generous country onEarth. America saved my life, and I dedicated my life to paying her back. Igraduated from the United States Naval Academy and served for 25 years in NavySpecial Operations in Iraq, Afghanistan, Somalia, and Pakistan and 40 othercountries around the world. I love this country - but right now, it’s taken adark turn. Now, the knocks are coming from Joe Biden’s Department of Justice.Sending two dozen armed agents to arrest a pro-life activist in front of hisfamily. Raiding gun shops and seizing records from law-abiding gun owners.Arresting his challenger in the next election. And he’s doing it all whilereal criminals are free to roam our streets. We are losing our country. Youknow it. But you also know we can save it. I’ve been all over the world.Believe me when I tell you, if America fails, there is nowhere else to go.It’s time to save America while we still have a chance. I’m Hung Cao, retiredNavy Captain, and I’m running for the United States Senate. If you’re all-into defend the greatest country on Earth, join our team today. JOIN THE TEAM -STAND WITH ME TODAY I still believe America can be the land of opportunity,Fellow Patriot. And as someone who owes their life to the American Dream, Ihave an obligation to fight back against those who have trampled on it. Weneed REAL fighters. Not politicians, not bureaucrats, and not keyboardwarriors acting tough in custom made suits. If we’re going to preserve ourfreedoms, we can’t be intimidated. We must be fearless. It’s time to fight forthe American greatness that lies within us. Join our team today - because Iknow you haven’t given up on America yet either. JOIN THE TEAM - STAND WITHME TODAY Let’s win this. In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao, USN (Ret) Former NavySpecial Operations Candidate, U.S. Senate (VA) TEXT HUNG TO 21412 JOIN TEAMCAO! Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense. Unsubscribe.

name: Hung Cao
subject: The end of the road
body: Fellow Patriot, I’m afraid we could be at the end of the road. I don’t mean tobe too negative, but Tim Kaine has a MASSIVE war chest, and I just don’t knowif we can overcome it. This is CAPT Hung Cao. I’m not a career politician likeTim Kaine. I’m a husband, a father, and a 25-year combat Naval Captain. I’malso running for Senate in what could be the biggest political upset inVirginia’s history I’m running against a 30+ year incumbent who has spent hisentire life serving Washington's special interests. Let’s just cut to thechase: I can’t do this alone. Can you pitch in to support my campaign? PITCHIN NOW I won’t lie, this is going to be an uphill battle, but I know thatwith you on our A-Team we can win this seat and take back the Senate. Our teamis gearing up for the upset of the century, and we want YOU to be a part ofit.Please, will you pitch in now to make sure we have the resources we need towin? SAVE OUR COUNTRY My wife and I are raising our children to grow up intohonest men and women, so you can trust that I’ll keep my promise to put ourCommonwealth and our country first in everything I do. In Liberty, CAPT HungCao USN (Ret) Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, jobtitles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense. name: Ruben Gallego
subject: We did not come this far to lose to Kari Lake
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] When I was in Iraq, inurban combat, we had a special knock we’d use when we were surrounded byinsurgents. The comfort in that knock was knowing that while danger was allaround you, the person on the other side of the door was friendly — someoneyou could depend on. I’ve never been afraid to ask for help when I needed it.And right now, I’m knocking. I’m coming to you for help. Kari Lake is on theoffense. With just a few days until voting ends, she has a resource advantageover us. She’s got more money to spend, and she is funneling all of it into amassive surge. She’s outspending us on television in one of the most importantregions of the state. But I refuse to let her win. I did not swear an oath tosupport and defend the Constitution to lose against someone who has spreadmore lies and disinformation about our elections than any other politician inthe country after Trump himself. If you’re with me, donate $20.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] I did not lose some of mybest friends in combat to cede the democracy they fought for to Trump, Lake,and the MAGA Right. This election is bigger than just who controls the House,the Senate, or the White House. It is about ensuring our democracy survivesfor our kids and our grandkids. If you’re with me, donate $20.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] In the toughest times ofmy life, I have been incredibly fortunate to have the support I needed to getthrough. My mom, my sisters, my community, my Marines. In this campaign, Ihave you. And we did not come this far to lose to Kari Lake. I can’t overstatehow important this is: Please, make a split $20 donation with Tim Kaine todayif you are ready to help me win this campaign for U.S. Senate, hold our SenateMajority, and defend our democracy.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] If you’ve saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: DONATE $20[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego?express_lane=true&amount;=20]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego?express_lane=true&amount;=50]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego?express_lane=true&amount;=100]OTHER [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] I’ll never back downwhen it comes to our democracy. Thanks for sticking with me as I finish thefight. name: Susan
subject: one more time ahead of the weekend
body: Peter, I’ll try to keep this quick, but I wanted to reach out one more timeahead of the weekend. Election Day is only four days away, and that means weonly have four days on the ground here in PA-07 to knock on as many doors aspossible and talk to as many voters as we can. This is our final weekend, andthese last days are crucial for reaching undecided voters. Republicans aren’tletting up on their attack ads and spending, so we need to fight back in thefinal days. Will you contribute to help us get out the vote and set the recordstraight on Republican attacks against me in these final FOUR days untilElection Day? body: Everything we've worked for is at risk, friend: First, national Republicanscame after me as their TOP target for defeat. name: Justice Democrats
subject: BREAKING: Squad members are putting pressure on Biden
body: [1]Justice Democrats Breaking news, Peter: Justice Democrats incumbents Rep.Rashida Tlaib, Cori Bush, Ilhan Omar, and Summer Lee are putting pressure onPresident Biden to explain why his administration deployed U.S. troops toIsrael without congressional authorization. [https://go.justicedemocrats.com/signup/petition-20241101-us-troops-israel/?source=em20241101-36115&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDY ]Prem Thakker:NEW—Reps. Rashida Tlaib & Cori Bush are pressing Biden to explain unauthorizedinvolvement of US armed forces in Israel's military activity. They warn amember can force a vote to remove troops from the region. André Carson, IlhanOmar, Summer Lee joined. Our progressive champions for peace are leading theway on this issue once again by holding this administration accountable forignoring the law and continuing to enable right-wing Israeli Prime MinisterBenjamin Netanyahu’s genocide against Palestinians. Despite the War PowersResolution of 1973 requiring Congressional approval to send troops to war,President Biden has provided Israel with U.S. soldiers on the ground, as wellas billions of dollars worth of weapons and bombs used to carry out warcrimes, all while Israel has largely blocked food and other humanitarian aidfrom reaching Palestinians in need — which violates federal and internationallaw. In their letter to the President, Rashida, Cori, Ilhan, and Summer madeit clear that he “cannot continue to ignore the law without Congressionalintervention,” and warned that a member of Congress can introduce a resolutionand force a vote to remove U.S. forces from Israel. [https://go.justicedemocrats.com/signup/petition-20241101-us-troops-israel/?source=em20241101-36115&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDY ]Stand with ourprogressive leaders and join them in their fight to hold the Bidenadministration accountable: sign on to support their letter now → [https://go.justicedemocrats.com/signup/petition-20241101-us-troops-israel/?source=em20241101-36115&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDY ]Sign On Fromintroducing the ceasefire resolution last year to sending this letter toPresident Biden, Justice Democrats members are giving it all they’ve got toend the genocide, bring home the hostages, and promote peace instead ofviolent escalation in the Middle East. In solidarity, Justice DemocratsContribute to Justice Democrats:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/justicedemocrats?refcode=em20241101-36115-footer&t;=1002&refcode2;=36115_1203867_5ZvhDY&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDYThis email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is the most important wayfor us to reach you about opportunities to get involved. name: Debbie, me
subject: I'm putting my record up against Rick Scott's
body: Friend — by now, with just 4 days until Election Day, I hope you have a goodsense of who I am and the issues I believe are so important. But I thought alittle reminder would be helpful, especially contrasted with who Rick Scott is🤢. Maybe it will even motivate you to make your very first online donationbefore tonight's fundraising deadline to ensure I can defeat Rick Scott!https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2476-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 First and foremost, I'm everything I am todaybecause of my mother. She brought my sisters and me to America when I was just14. Mom knew we had to get out of Ecuador, which was transitioning todemocracy after suffering under a military dictatorship. She knew America wasthe key to a better life. Well, with a whole lot of hard work (includingworking in a doughnut shop to help my family get by), long hours, and a ton ofhope, we were able to win our American dream. My story is what inspires me togive back to this incredible country and state that gave me so much. Afterputting myself through college, I worked for several nonprofit organizationsacross Florida, helping to protect our wildlife and preserve our coral reefs.Rick Scott, on the other hand, banned saying the words "climate change" whenhe was governor of Florida, and the League of Conservation Voters gave him awhopping 0% score last year. During my time working at Florida InternationalUniversity, I spearheaded a new program to expand affordable health careaccess to more Floridians. But Rick Scott has voted to repeal the AffordableCare Act more times than I care to count. And who can forget he committed oneof the largest Medicare frauds in the history of our country. Eventually, Ihad the honor of serving my community in the U.S. House of Representatives,where I became the first South American immigrant to be elected to Congress!In the House, I wrote the bill to expand seniors’ Medicare Advantage coverage,worked with Republicans to provide economic relief to families and smallbusinesses, and secured $200 million for Everglades restoration. I'm proud ofmy record — but can Rick Scott say the same, friend? He has used his time inoffice writing the plan to end Social Security and Medicare, attempting toundermine our elections, attacking our rights, and making it harder forworking families to get ahead. As a result, Rick Scott's approval ratings withFloridians are underwater. Even a large percentage of Republicans don'tapprove of him! Now, polling shows me statistically tied with Scott, and injust 4 days, we can defeat him and protect our Democratic Senate majority inthe process. But with Rick Scott outspending me 3-1 on the airwaves, it'sgoing to take a surge in grassroots support from people like you to trulydefeat him. So please, rush a donation of $5 or whatever you can to send me tothe U.S. Senate and give Floridians the true leader and public servant wedeserve!https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2476-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jon Tester
subject: Tied with Tim Sheehy
body: | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/X68678553-96e8-42b4-9281-157e96a29561/368d17ff-e836-4168-8049-c5f0900fbbf9) | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/68678553-96e8-42b4-9281-157e96a29561/a638be21-8513-42b1-9bfc-5f974022c80e.png) --- | | | | |  --- | _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes andDemocratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for ourdemocracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish tohear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- |  Peter — it’s Jon. I’m in the toughest race of my life to win Montana’sSenate seat, and a brand new poll has me tied against Tim Sheehy.![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXe-vdsceM3RCQJXWg-eamF118DHUd_7ajuYiy7oVL3SePEMX_RCRJxQajUIZKCvnhubgAwveL58y4eE4qMPxpwY_y6fRgQWGbHy9TrWpYIEx4TAymFaEffstylEbgiVV-wMbMg0YujNlAD-OmekEtaJNzY4?key=ENBiXSBu33tyTs9k-rKaA5FD) I can feel that themomentum is on our side and we can't afford to waste a single second of itover these next four days. I need you now more than ever: Will you split adonation of $25 to help us finish these final days in the best possibleposition to win this race? After seeing this new poll, generous donors arematching every donation to this email dollar-for-dollar >> --- | | SPLIT A $25 DONATION --- | Look, I’m no stranger to tough elections — I won my first Senate race byless than one percentage point. But I’ve never run a race like this. MitchMcConnell is making it his #1 mission to defeat me. His big money buddies havepoured in millions of dollars to boost their handpicked candidate, and floodthe airwaves with attacks against me — right as Montanans vote. But this newpoll shows that if we put in the work these last 4 days, we can break the tieand defeat Tim Sheehy. My team says we raise about $25K from emails like thisone. I think we can do $60K right now — but I need your help to get there.Peter, will you rush a matched donation of $25 (becomes $50) before midnight? --- | | SPLIT A $25 DONATION --- | Thank you, Jon --- | --- | | | | |  --- | | |  --- | --- | | |  --- | | | | |  --- | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/68678553-96e8-42b4-9281-157e96a29561/bdd7c5f5-7de1-4347-b64e-b4284329efec.png) | Cliff Schecter President, Blue Amp Action Amplify Good  ---|--- | | |  --- | | Follow Us | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_twitter2.png) | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_linkedin.png) ---|---  | **Blue Amp Action PAC** PO Box 8384, Cincinnati, OH 45208 --- | Having trouble viewing this email? View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | | Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

name: Keith Ellison
subject: If you’re considering sitting out this election because of Gaza
body: Peter, I suspect the majority of you reading this email have already voted orhave made a plan to vote for Kamala Harris for President and Tim Walz for VicePresident. If so, thank you, and please sign up for a GOTV shift athttps://www.mobilize.us/2024mnvictory/! You don’t need to read this email anyfurther. But I am aware some of you may be considering sitting this electionout, or voting for a third-party candidate, because you strongly disagree withKamala Harris about Gaza. This email is for you. Please read on. We have manythings in common. Like you, I am outraged by the suffering in Gaza: themassive and indiscriminate loss of life, the displacement of millions ofpeople, the deliberate destruction of hospitals, the use of food as a weapon,all of it. Every nation, including Israel, has the right to defend itself, andall hostages must be released now. But no nation, including Israel, has theright to collectively punish another people, including the people of Gaza. Butthat is what has happened, and like you, I believe American policy has notdone enough to stop it. Now to Kamala Harris. Kamala Harris has said she’s fora cease fire. She’s said she’s for more humanitarian relief now. She standsfor international human-rights laws, and she has the active support of membersof Congress who are insisting on the enforcement of international human-rightslaw. And she has publicly called out Rudy Giuliani’s violent rhetoric aboutPalestinian children at Trump’s racist Madison Square Garden rally. And as shesaid in her speech in Washington on Tuesday night, she will listen toeveryone, including people who disagree with her. I’ve known her for years, soI know from personal experience that this is true. On the other hand, DonaldTrump, who put in place the illegal Muslim ban as president, has said he’lllet Benjamin Netanyahu “finish the job.” Donald Trump, whose own chief ofstaff says he is a fascist, has promised to deploy the military againstconstitutional protest and be a dictator on Day One. So if you care about thepeople of Gaza — and the right to protest about Gaza — you don’t want DonaldTrump in power. Now I doubt any of you reading this email plan to vote forDonald Trump. But — and this is critical — if you sit this election out, or ifyou vote for a third-party candidate who will not win, you are letting DonaldTrump get one vote closer to power. Donald Trump in power will increasesuffering in Gaza and the world. If Kamala Harris is elected, we will havesomeone in the White House who will use the powers of the presidency toalleviate suffering at home and abroad, not increase it. Just as importantly,we will have someone in the White House with whom we can be in dialogue, notsomeone who will turn our country against us. Don’t take only it from me.Senator Bernie Sanders supports Kamala Harris even though he stronglydisagrees with current Gaza policy, because he believes that Kamala in theWhite House is the best chance to change that policy. Hear more:https://x.com/berniesanders/status/1851040553745432775?s=42 Georgia State Rep.Ruwa Romman supports Kamala Harris for the same reason. Hear more:https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/political-commentary/ruwa-romman-harris-dnc-gaza-uncommitted-vote-1235144105/ Nada Elmikashfi of Wisconsin, a SudaneseAmerican and Muslim activist and political organizer who supports the peopleof Gaza, supports Kamala Harris because she believes that supporting Harris —and not a third-party candidate — is the only way to keep Trump from makingeverything she cares about worse and harming far more communities than herown. Hear more: https://x.com/nadaelmikashfi/status/1851465420097585482?s=10And former President Jimmy Carter, who brokered the Camp David accords and hasworked tirelessly for more than 40 years for a comprehensive peace in theMiddle East that includes dignity, opportunity, and self-determination forPalestinians, supports Kamala Harris. I strongly encourage you to listen tothem. And finally, even as Gaza is first in many of our thoughts, even more isat stake in this election. Racial justice, abortion rights, climate change,and economic fairness: it’s all on the ballot, along with the very soul ofthis country. Trump’s racist Madison Square Garden rally leaves no more roomfor doubt about that. For the sake of all the people that would bear the bruntof Donald Trump’s deliberate cruelty, and for the best chance of building abetter future for the people of Gaza, the Middle East, the United States, andthe world, I am asking you not to sit this out: I am asking for your vote forKamala Harris for President and Tim Walz for Vice President. - Keith Preparedand paid for by the Keith Ellison for Attorney General committee, PO Box17224, Minneapolis, MN 55417 Keith Ellison for Attorney General PO Box 17224Minneapolis, MN 55417 United States If you believe you received this messagein error or wish to no longer receive email from us, please unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/rnmAh_BZp0CUaBw6XYl7Xw2?unsubscribedata=2W3VAJdw0Km2QlWjWSNn5jILNXUrlnEvliKA4k45I5pVyuqoBa4Y3UFm3BhbuqHtqqYrTIxbuJjziosllmOXfejlaoFG7D3AFDxJQG93VgilTx6DNsKdZMq%2FC2O3PQ%2F7BSpw91OasYmadv2hVJ%2F4elgiqlhVrEn8xl2lKfAyhd87jzDY6fFGwvfYWo7%2BOwui6dGaOsBEWAoyDu%2BaV7KBvNKX8hASP2M4qjbsfyGIzPQ7TxfTZTFaQgp3IYTwE9WBLAlxcSLEA5OK5pJjTWRqM6PnUTx%2B%2BQtqhSH6S%2B5v6nmHFpYEVkzLQ0tDTItkioUCjKTmQHt%2Bg9VoP1RJTtAVnAuUK8ObOKuEtRLoGf9z8Vv%2B9lwyIdQN0jkW8gZoR6D0H3taZ70cUxj55pabsOMrgUZPOCStGYjYt%2B55QwokiuMqRzJHxx8BVU5cxIFJ4Thh.

name: Katie Porter
subject: What you can control
body: [ https://act.katieporter.com/go/10?t=1001&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Truth to Power PAC Derek, A lot is happening this week—it may be the moststressful week of the year. With the stakes so high, it is human nature to beworried, even if you can’t control what’s happening. Put that restless energyto work, and focus on what you can control. At this stage in campaigns, theonly thing that matters is voter contact. Here’s how you can help: 1. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241101?refcode=em20241101-39253&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&refcode2;=39253_3422442_4ZkRXw&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Chip in: Your donation helps campaigns keep up their communications untilpolls close. Campaigns make projections based on how much money they thinkthey’ll raise; if they have a shortfall, they may have to scale back the paceof their advertising. [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241101?refcode=em20241101-39253&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&refcode2;=39253_3422442_4ZkRXw&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Donate to a campaign you care about, or chip in to Truth to Power to help usget our endorsed candidates over the finish line. 2. [https://act.katieporter.com/go/21197?source=em20241101-39253&t;=1002&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Volunteer: Knocking on doors is the best, most effective form of votercontact there is. If you have a couple hours to spare before Election Day,sign up for a canvassing shift or two. How many people we’re able to get tothe polls in California swing seats could decide which party controls theHouse. [https://act.katieporter.com/go/21197?source=em20241101-39253&t;=1003&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Visit mobilize.us to find volunteer opportunities near you. Even though I’mnot on the ballot this November, I’ve still been raising money and knocking ondoors for candidates in California I believe in: [https://act.katieporter.com/go/21197?source=em20241101-39253&t;=1004&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw][IMG] I know that elections have a way of making folks lose perspective.During my first campaign, I briefly thought that an unexpected package on mydoorstep could be a secret Republican tracking device. (It was actually myson, with my credit card, ordering himself an Xbox without permission.) Myadvice to avoid being overwhelmed: spend a day door knocking and then takesome well-earned time for self-care. Thank you for all you do—Truth to Powerhas only made it this far with grassroots supporters like you. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241101?refcode=em20241101-39253&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&refcode2;=39253_3422442_4ZkRXw&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Please, if you can, will you consider donating today to keep us going?
