name: John Thune
subject: me and Bernie
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate I’ve already transferred $4 million to help folkslike Bernie, but he needs folks like you to step up to take on a 50-yearcareer politician in Sherrod Brown. Peter, I’ve been crisscrossing the countryto do everything I can to help the team get across the finish line this fall.One of my most important stops: campaigning in Ohio with Bernie Moreno.President Trump and a Senate Republican majority will end the disastrousBiden-Harris agenda, but we cannot win a Senate majority without winning inOhio. Will you join me in supporting political outsider, Bernie Moreno?Bernie Moreno is the type of Senator we need in Washington. He’s lived theAmerican dream - and wants to make sure our grandkids have the sameopportunities he had when he came to America at the age of five. He hasn’tmade a career as a Washington insider - just the opposite. He’s anentrepreneur who built a successful business from the ground up. ThisNovember, we’ve got a great map—unlike anything we’ve seen in a fewdecades—and with high-quality candidates like Bernie, I know we can win backthe Republican majority in the Senate. But here’s the bad news, Peter.Democrats like Sherrod Brown are outraising us by millions. I’ve alreadytransferred $4 million to help folks like Bernie, but he needs folks like youto step up to take on a 50-year career politician in Sherrod Brown. Even just$10 can make a difference when it comes to the millions Sherrod Brown israising from every liberal in the country. We have got to change the courseof this country and put an end to the dangerous Harris-Schumer-Brownagenda—and that begins with doing everything we can to help Bernie Moreno winin Ohio and elect a Republican majority in the Senate! Thanks, John ThuneSenate Minority Whip Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Moreno fights for theAmerican Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born in Bogota, Colombia. Atage five, his American Dream began when he moved to the United States with hisfamily. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18. Through his relentlesswork ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, he turned the first cardealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of the largest dealership groupsin America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value and transformationalpotential of blockchain technology, before it received mainstream attention,and moved much of his volunteer time and investment dollars into the space. In2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to be quite successful as Bernieserved as Chairman of the Board. After a long, successful career, Bernie soldmost of his business to begin focusing on his calling: protecting the Americandream for another generation. Solving our country’s problems requires commonsense. In Washington, Bernie will fight to shrink government, protect ourfreedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party from taking our data and land, andalways put America First. Ohioans are done with politicians who talk a biggame and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. to get work done – just likehe always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ON SOCIAL MEDIA Paid for byBernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hateto see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Ron Wyden
subject: Don’t let this get lost on you
body: I was horrified by the rally Donald Trump's campaign held over the weekend atMadison Square Garden. It was a hate-fest of disgusting rhetoric aboutimmigrants, Puerto Ricans, Black Americans, Jews, Muslims, and anyone the MAGAmovement deems their enemy. It also wasn't lost on me that House Speaker MikeJohnson attended and gave a speech, after which Trump later thanked him andominously declared: "our little secret is having a big impact, he and I have alittle secret, we will tell you what it is when the race is over." Whetherthat means Johnson is ready to legislatively implement Project 2025, orwhether he's planning to have the House deny a free and fair election, I can'tsay. But I can say that Mike Johnson giving his seal of approval to adisgusting rally and him being praised by Donald Trump as cooking up a secretplan with him shows that we cannot afford to have him as Speaker again comeJanuary. With only 4 days left, the state of play for control of the Houseremains as close as ever — and flipping the 5th District here in Oregon fromred to blue remains one of the biggest steps we can take toward gaining aDemocratic House majority. Polls have OR-05 a statistical dead heat, andRepublicans are launching one desperate attack after another to try and stopJanelle Bynum. We must ensure that Janelle has the resources to finish thisrace strong and beat out Republican incumbent Lori Chavez-DeRemer. So will yousplit $11 right now for Janelle and myself? We plan on leaving it all on thefield for this critical House race – one with major national implications.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-bynum-split?refcode=2024-11-01-jb&recurring;=&amount;=11&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200&refcode2;=f2be11d1-a798-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Onward, Ron Paid for and authorized by Wyden for Senate. name: Kamala HQ
subject: We need EVERYONE to contribute today
body: Here's where we're at, Peter: | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) Here's where we're at, Peter. We know the final voters we have to reach and get to the polls in battleground states. They are Democrats, but they don't vote in most elections. There are a lot of them. **But right now, we don't have the resources to turn out enough of them to win.** So, we need everyone -- yes, everyone -- to make a contribution to Kamala Harris's campaign today. If that's all you need to hear, please donate now: **https://www.kamalaharris.com/turnout** Here's some more motivation for you. In the past half hour, we've received a HUGE number of individual contributions -- all from people like you who understand the stakes of this election. Take a look: ![Contributions Over the Last 30 Minutes](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/950/101/original/Picture.png) Every single dot in that chart represents someone who has pitched in to help turn out the voters we need to win. But it's not enough. _We need you too, Peter._ We need everyone, honestly. This is an all-hands-on-deck moment for an expensive final push. $47 to help get voters to the polls -- voters we need to win. $47 to make sure Trump never returns to the White House. $47 one last time before the election. For Vice President Harris. For our democracy. Please contribute $47 to Kamala Harris's campaign now, and we will put your donation to work IMMEDIATELY to help us win this election. _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ | | $47 >> --- | $75 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---  We know what we need to do to win. Today, we’re asking everyone to step uptoday to make it happen.Kamala HQ          * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being asupporter. But Peter, we don't want to bother you. If you’d like tounsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. Wesincerely thank you for your help and support. Paid for by Harris forPresident. ---  ![](https://click.contact.kamalaharris.com/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b3/16Rv68HATdy8axnjpwLjLw/ho.gif)

name: Debbie
subject: Donald Trump is upset I called Rick Scott a snake 😅
body: If you haven't heard about this yet, you need to, Peter. Earlier this week, myopponent, Rick Scott, was at one of Donald Trump's campaign events. That's nosurprise. He's everywhere Donald Trump goes. He infamously skipped animportant Senate vote to be Trump's lapdog in the courtroom for one of Trump'scriminal trials.Pathetic. Anyway, Donald Trump gave Rick Scott a very ...interesting shoutout: It's interesting how often Trump resorts to callingother people liars — when he himself is perhaps the most notorious serial liarin modern American history. It's no wonder he and Rick Scott get along sowell. Scott has lied time and again about his record of writing the plan toend Medicare and Social Security, about supporting a national abortion ban,and even about his Medicare fraud. Lies, lies, and more lies from the snakethat is Rick Scott and his buddy, the twice-impeached, disgraced liar of aformer president, Donald Trump. The TRUTH of the matter is that Donald Trumpand Rick Scott are scared of my new ad. They are scared because they know I'mstatistically tied with Scott in the polls as Floridians are beginning to casttheir ballots. They are scared we will pull off a massive political upset byflipping Florida blue.Well, Peter, they are right to be scared. We can winthis race and protect Democratic Senate control in the process, but it simplyis not possible if I don't hit my $10 million fundraising goal to fight RickScott's attack ads and reach every Florida voter. So please, rush a donationof $5 or whatever you can to help me hit my last fundraising deadline beforeElection Day, defeat Rick Scott, and protect our Democratic Senate majority!If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: RUSH $25 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $50 IMMEDIATELY RUSH$100 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $250 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $500 IMMEDIATELY RUSH ANOTHERAMOUNT Thank you, Debbie DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This emailwas sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com . name: John, Campaign Manager
subject: It’s not too late
body: Peter, With Election Day just four days away, I know what you might bethinking: it’s too late to make a difference in Hung Cao’s race for Senate inVirginia. But as his campaign manager, I can promise you it’s NOT! Virginia’sraces are neck-and-neck down the ballot. The last few undecided voters willdecide this race - and right now, we’re on a race with Tim Kaine to reachthem. Hung’s message of saving the American Dream and defending our countryfrom socialism is resonating with voters. But Tim Kaine has us MASSIVELYoutraised, and he’s been able to blanket the airwaves and the web withdisgusting lies. Your contribution helps us run more ads, reach more voters,and set the record STRAIGHT in these final few days. Now that you know howyour money helps, will you pitch in now? Every dollar makes a HUGE differencethis close to Election Day. PITCH IN NOW Thank you, John Campaign ManagerHung Cao for Virginia Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank,job titles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense. Unsubscribe.

name: Sen. Jacky Rosen
subject: I’ve been guided by the Jewish concept of “Tikkun Olam"
body: Shabbat Shalom, friend. I only have a few minutes before my next campaignstop, but I wanted to reach out quickly. Throughout my time in public service,I’ve been guided by the Jewish concept of “Tikkun Olam,” or acting withkindness to repair the world. I firmly believe that if we all come together,we can accomplish great things and build a better world for our kids andgenerations to come. It’s why I work so hard each day – and it’s why I’mrunning for reelection. name: Michael Baumgartner
subject: You're invited to the Davenport on Election Night
body: Come watch the results and (hopefully) celebrate! ** Election night party at Historic Davenport ------------------------------------------------------------ Friends, Eleanor and I warmly invite you to join us in the Grand Pennington ballroom at the original Davenport Hotel in Spokane for a special election night party on the evening of Tuesday, Nov 5th. We’ve been on quite the journey these last eight months, and we are so appreciative of all your support. It would be wonderful to watch the results roll in and (hopefully) celebrate with you. Doors open at 6pm and I’ll be pleased to publicly address the gathering after results are known at about 8:30pm. Big thanks to Representatives Mike Volz and Suzanne Schmidt for hosting what is certain to be an exciting evening! Warmest wishes & I hope to see you, Michael Paid for by Vote Baumgartner for Congress | (509) 370-8398 | www.votebaumgartner.com Our mailing address is: Vote Baumgartner for Congress, PO Box 8508, Spokane, WA 99203 You can update your preferences (https://hotmail.us21.list-manage.com/profile?u=91b93e6889137ccb3f3fef037&id;=62bfedeea6&e;=5a45b9550e&c;=e9b00bc24a) or unsubscribe (https://hotmail.us21.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=91b93e6889137ccb3f3fef037&id;=62bfedeea6&t;=b&e;=5a45b9550e&c;=e9b00bc24a)

name: Colin (personal)
subject: asking for five bucks
body: Peter, I'm going to be blunt: I need you to chip in five bucks. We have toraise $500,000 every single day to keep up with Ted Cruz and his wealthyextremist donors. I simply can't do that without your help. Will you pleasesplit a $5 donation between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC to help medefeat Ted Cruz and protect our Democratic Senate majority CHIP IN $5 If wewin this race, I will work in the Senate to prevent a national abortion ban,protect our democracy, and fight against attacks on Social Security andMedicare. And polls show we can win – three in a row have me statisticallytied with Ted Cruz. But I’m not taking corporate PAC money like he is. I’mrelying on grassroots donors like you to power my campaign, which means wehave to hit every single goal. Today we’re falling $361,322 short, which iswhy I’m humbly asking, one more time: Will you please chip in a split donationof $5 between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC? CHIP IN $5 Thanks so much,Colin DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,

name: Colin Allred
subject: I feel it in my bones
body: With a handful of days until the election and just hours until our $500,000daily fundraising deadline, I don't want to waste any time:Will you chip in asplit donation between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC of $25 or more rightnow to power our final push to defeat Ted Cruz? RUSH MY DONATION This closeto Election Day, I know we're all having a lot of anxiety about which waythings will go. Peter, something special is happening here in Texas. We'vebeen putting in the work for over a year now, and we're seeing all of thathard work pay off in the form of real, sizable momentum. I can feel it in mybones that we are going to win. But I also know this: Our fight isn't overyet. We're running out of time before Election Day, and there is still so muchto do to counter the $40 MILLION worth of GOP attacks, reach Texans, and getevery last Texan out to vote before polls close at 7 p.m. on Tuesday. I don'twant to keep you from carrying on with your day, but I have nowhere else toturn, so I have to ask: Please, will you rush $25 or more, split between mycampaign and Defeat Boebert PAC, right now to help us meet our $500,000 dailyGOTV fundraising goal? We're just $27,426 away from reaching this criticalgoal!! If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, yoursplit donation between Colin Allred and Defeat Boebert PAC will go throughimmediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN$500 OTHER AMOUNT Thank you for your support, Peter – I'm so grateful. –Colin Allred DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Ryan Mackenzie
subject: We’re down, but we’re not out.
body: We’re down, but we’re not out. The future of America is hanging in thebalance. And it’s all coming down to this race in the heart of Pennsylvania. Anew poll just came out showing that my race is a toss-up, but it’s stillleaning to the Left. And I only have 3 days to turn this around. My opponentwants me to give up now. But I’M NOT BACKING DOWN! My name is Ryan Mackenzie.I’m a state representative, smart conservative, proud father, and Trump-endorsed candidate. Now, I’m running for Congress in the MOST CRITICALbattleground race of 2024! If I lose here in the heart of Pennsylvania, ourhopes to save this country will be DEAD IN THE WATER! MILLIONS in dark moneydonations from the DNC are being pumped into my district to stop me. I needyour help to level the playing field. If we lose this seat, it will be aDISASTER for the Republican agenda in 2024. That’s why I’m calling on you. I’mlaunching a grassroots effort to FLIP THIS SEAT! But I need your support tomake this happen. Can my team count on your support to get boots on the groundand turn the tides of this election? Even with my back to the wall, we’venever been closer to victory! We can defeat these radical left loons, but onlyif we fight together. If you chip in today I can make you this promise, I willNEVER stop fighting for this country. JOIN THE FIGHT PAID FOR BY MACKENZIEFOR CONGRESS Unsubscribe |Mark as Junk

subject: I’m truly humbled
body: I can’t thank you enough for all of your generosity over the course of thiscampaign. We CAN defend this seat and our House majority, but I need your helpone final time. Friend, As I prepare for on the ground mobilizing Republicanvoters, I can’t help but be extremely grateful and humbled. The outpouring ofsupport we’ve had over this campaign has been incredible. Even asthe radicalLeft has spent over $10 MILLION trying to defeat, we’ve stayed strong withevery challenge they’ve thrown at us. I can’t thank you enough for all of yourgenerosity over the course of this campaign. We CAN defend this seat and ourHouse majority, but I need your help one final time. This is the CLOSEST Houserace in the country, and control of the House could very well come down to us.Our majority has been the only firewall against total socialist control inthese past two years, and we can’t afford to lose it. With America’s future onthe line, can you pitch in one final time to help us WIN this race?
